title: Best Hotel
desc: It my first time check in to this hotel, and good service bytheir staff, the room & the view was good. Overall my stay is fine only for 2 day stay, will come back again here with my family when we do some holiday in sinagpore

title: Excellent service recovery
desc: Belated review as I stayed at TFH Heritage room for one night (with late checkout) in April 2021. We were given a corner room so the room and bathroom were extremely spacious. The room was generally very clean, but we found trash (likely from previous guest) hidden behind the curtains. Which brings me to my point about their service. When we found the trash I called for housekeeping, and though it was late at night, they still came quite quickly. I was expecting just one staff to come clean up, but two of them showed up to apologise. And I thought that was the end of the incident. But when I checked out, one of the front desk managers (sorry I don’t remember her name anymore!) voluntarily came up to me to offer her apologies, contact details and a Fullerton Bear! I was

title: Excellent staycation and exceptional service
desc: A staycation for my birthday and wedding anniversary, we arrived earlier than the stipulated check in time but still manage to get a room! The room was clean and comfy and the view was great! We spent the weekend enjoying the facilities at the hotel and experienced the various dining options and was impressed by the all the staff for their attentiveness and excellent service that brighten up our stay.

title: Love it... will be an annual affair for us...
desc: Love the hospitality & warm welcome from beginning to end... this staycation is a vacation very long overdue since we couldn’t travel for the past 10 months & we were afraid to step out of the house due to the pandemic... our kids enjoyed the stay so much they weren’t keen to leave the hotel to venture out for meals... our 5

title: Thank you for the great hospitality!
desc: Had a staycation with my mom at The Fullerton Hotel and I’m so impressed by the hospitality of the team. They are all so cheery and helpful and we’ve thoroughly enjoyed our stay there. Breakfast was amazing too! Will strongly recommend a stay here!

title: Overrated hotel during peak season
desc: Visited the hotel in Nov, 2 days after my birthday. Went at 10am to drop my luggage and the bellboy service was excellent, the best of the day. Completed the check in formalities and told to return at 3pm for a room. The rest of the trip gone downhill from there. Upon check in, given Quay Room. However, the room was small, and did not have a balcony. Went back to check back with the receptionist, after 1 hour, and 3 calls, no updates. Went back to the front desk, only to be told that the rooms are all full. I wonder how they allocated those rooms with balcony, as i had paid more for the quay room, to get one with better views and a balcony, only to be told nothing was available, despite coming in at 10am and signed up for their membership programme. returned at 6pm to find a

title: A very awesome place to create awesome memorries
desc: This hotel has never failed to amaze me and for me to hold my wedding ROM lunch with extended stay means a lot. Good view of the marina bay side and excellent service staff. Always helpful and a very good corrdinator to help you every step of the way (Wendy)

title: Staycation to celebrate birthday
desc: Beautiful historical building next to Singapore river where there are a few historical buildings and can get a good view of the marina bay from One Fullerton with a drink, walking distance to boat quay and Clarke quay.

title: Clean and comfortable modern hotel.
desc: Comfortable bedding and sound proof walls. Clean toilet and the toilet bowl has the Japanese wash bidet installed. Room service tasted better than the sit down buffet breakfast but the former was quite pricey. All said, it’s a great hotel and the service was prompt and good. Will return again.

title: Beautiful Place to Stay
desc: Quay Pool View room had excellent views, highly recommended for an unforgettable and romantic stay. The newly renovated rooms were very classy and clean as well. Service staff were all welcoming and approachable.

title: Family Staycation at Fullerton
desc: We thoroughly enjoyed our 2D1N stay at the hotel. The room was spacious, offered a good view and could comfortably accommodate our family (with ample space for the kids to run around and keep themselves occupied). =)

title: Fine
desc: Standard hotel. Nothing fancy. No personalized service. Check-in: It took awhile and although the afternoon tea while we waited was good, we really wanted to go swimming instead of wait for a long time before we could check in. Pool: After finally finishing the check-in process, we were able to go to the pool. Upon entry, we were informed by staff that it is crowded. Why then, would you book more people in if that is the case? Especially with covid, people shouldn't have been packed into the smaller-than-in-other-hotels pool. No attendants were present in the pool area itself. There were no food and drinks served unlike in other hotels even during covid. Restaurants: There were really only 2 restaurants for us to choose from within the hotel. In-room dining had very little

title: Can be better
desc: I’ve been to the Fullerton quite a number of times but this time was the worst. Breakfast was only passable, pool was terribly overcrowded, check in took too long. The only good points were the recently renovated, friendly service staff and kids’ experiences. More needs to be improved on for a 5 star hotel

title: Service Recovery from The DM
desc: Appreciate the service recovery rendered however felt left out when my email was not replied. It indeed surprised us that the choice of pillows were not made available to higher category room guest. Did share our take with regards to the menu selections during breakfast. Might give it a passed after the 2nd morning.

title: Christmas at the Fullerton
desc: Excellent welcome. Was looked after very well. The Christmas Day brunch was excellent. The staff really went the extra mile to look after there guests. All the staff welcomed us and went out of there way to come and talk with my wife.

title: Fullerton is Awesome
desc: Historic Fullerton classy old holel with great service! right where so much is happening every night - light show on the Fullerton itself. Close to Esplanade, Marina Bay Sands, Gardens by the Bay, Right on Singapore River with so many restaurants and bars,

title: stay
desc: great stay. pool was nice. and breakfast was delicious. check in and check out was efficient. definitely a nice hotel and good for family. room was clean and room service was fast as well but limited choices in in room dining.

title: Family stay for the staycation
desc: Good service but I'm sure could be much better. Checkin and checkout could be the same experience. If offered free upgrade should be provided but unfortunately not which was quite a disappointment. Overall I'm sure the hotel can provides better experience for the guests.

title: Birthday celebration staycation
desc: Guests was asked to leave her phone number but did not get back to guests for 2.5 hours till the staff was reminded. The room turn out to be an old room despite paying so much for a 6 * hotel. Disappointed for the hotel service.

title: Memorable visit
desc: It is a wonderful and memorable stay at Fullerton Hotel in Singapore. This is our first time staying in this hotel. The amazing heritage building with the light show on the whole building's wall was spectacular during this festive period. The customer service and room service were good. Very advanced toilet bowl and nice bathtub. We will come again on special occasions.

title: Family Staycation
desc: This is our 3rd time that we spent our Dec holidays at the Fullerton Hotel. As always, the Hotel did not disappoint. The friendliness and warmth of the staff spread the holiday cheers. Special mentioned to staff like Rafi Patani (Senior Concierge) and all at the Straits Club. The room and food was great. Location is good walkable to many restaurants and landmarks. Overall the staycay is great and the staffs there are very friendly. Would go back again and try out diff room type. Highly recommended for family that want to have a chill staycay to just enjoy and relax in & around the hotel. I am already planning to return during the March 22 School Holidays.

title: Great Stayyyy
desc: Had a great time at Fullerton! Room was very nice and clean, service was great as well. Staff were all really nice and responded to our requests very promptly. Had afternoon tea at The Courtyard and food was really great! Would really recommend :)

title: 2-Days 1 Night Stay
desc: The hotel Christmas decorations were very impressive. Checking-in and out were a breeze. Unfortunately, the breakfast was a letdown, with bacon uncooked being served and the service staff did not acknowledge that.

title: Excellent hotel services and venue for our wedding banquet
desc: We chose this hotel again to host our wedding lunch on 26 December last year as we had a wonderful experience in this hotel with Alfie and Shermaine who helped me with my wedding proposal last April. They never disappoint us by being attentive and accommodating to our requests. Big thank you to Shermaine who played an important role to decorate our wedding display tables. These really created wonderful memories for my wife and myself. Very impressed with her service! Keep up with the good work! I would also like to say big thank you to Violette, Senior catering sales manager and Paul, her boss for making our wedding photoshoot and event successful and memorable. Violette provided advices and shared her expertise and past banquet experience with us. We will always remember this

title: Wonderful staycation!
desc: Truly an enjoyable & wonderful staycation! The hotel associates were excellent - they were polite, efficient and attentive. Room is clean and well maintained which puts us at ease esp in risky times like times. Thank you!

title: Amazing Stay at the Fullerton
desc: Just speechlessly good. Food was amazing, the room was comfortable equipped with smart TV and speaker. Friendly staffs that makes me want to go back again and again, always looking forward to visiting Fullerton hotel - regardless for just a meal or for a stay.

title: Loved my stay!
desc: My friend and I enjoyed our stay at Fullerton. The staff are efficient from check-in process until check-out. They also allowed late check-out when we requested for it. The room is well maintained and too. No stains in the carpet which is evident that through cleaning is done by the staff. Breakfast is quite good too.

title: Fullerton Hotel
desc: Excellent hotel. Best service. Very good location just beside ACM and Boat Quay. Family friendly. Staff are very attentive to guests needs. the food is excellent also. would recommend anyone who is considering a stay here to book without any concerns.

title: Love my wedding anniversary celebration
desc: Staff at the hotel never fail to make the stay pleasant through their hospitality. This is our third stay within the year. They are always attentive, but never invasive into your private space. The experience is definitely a pleasure. I will like to specially commend Alson from Jade Restaurant within the hotel. He took very good care of us during the dinner on Christmas day evening and made our wedding anniversary celebration an extremely pleasant one. We will not hesitate to make a return trip to stay in the hotel or have our meal at the Jade restaurant. Thank you. :)

title: Best staycation experience ever.
desc: Had our family staycaution at The Fullerton Hotel last december. Read some negetives comments on the long wait for check in and poor customer service, and frankly, i was kind of worried about it.  Upon checking in, i must say all the above comments were uncalled for. Waiting time for check in was about 15min, and we had an extremely pleasant check in experienece with the front desk Manger, Mr Justin. He was very professional, very detailed, providing me with all the information that i need for our 3 days stay. He even run after me after I left the counter, just to remind me to utilise my package dining credit. Thumbs up to you Mr Justin. You truly deserved 10min of my time for penning this complimentary note for you.  Also special thanks to Mr Junwei, Steve and Auntie Wendy for

title: Enjoyed short holiday stay
desc: Best service by hotel staff, Clean room, Well service oriented by the hotel staffs. Easy access to all hotel facilities. Definitely going to stay there again. Worth the money spent. Too bad the lighthouse is closed due to covid on-going everywhere.

title: Christmas in Red Dot 2021
desc: Being stranded due to COVID travel restrictions, at least the hotel provide great exp. Nice and accommodative staff. Able to attain to our request. Clean bigger room with great amenities. Convenient location near MRT and landmarks

title: MY WEDDING AT THE FULLERTON
desc: Recommended for Hotel Stay and Wedding banquet Wonderful room with marina bay view Good Service , Value for money, Clean room, Special club access Nice location Overall a very good experience for my wedding.

title: Wonderful hotel but marred by pool experience
desc: Wonderful grand old dame of a hotel, excellent service all round. Sadly marred by our pool experience as management failed to install proper crowd management control measures, and did not deploy manpower to ensure all who had finished their hour-long slot exited the pool, unlike other more responsible hotels. Leading to over-crowding within the pool (disturbing in these Covid times) and a lack of deck-chairs as overstayers hogged them, leaving those who came for their rightful slot standing in wait for half an hour or more. No action taken even after staff were alerted. Dispiriting.

title: Wedding Anniversary Staycay
desc: Overall was a nice stay, in one of SG historic hotel only in room need to hv indication if items are complimentary to avoid misunderstanding and confusion especially during holiday season, peak period

title: Great experience
desc: A wonderful staycation experience for my family. Warm welcome, efficient check in and great hospitality displayed by all staff at the hotel. Look forward to staying again in the hotel when opportune. Thanks!

title: Great choice for staycation
desc: Second staycation at the Fullerton for the year. Location, room, hotel amenities and staff services 👍🏼👍🏼. We were offered a complimentary bed for my 7yo when I wrote in to update guests’ details. Highly recommended!

title: Christmas Day stay in heritage room
desc: Had very pleasant stay in this hotel. Counter staff Kate J is dedicated in serving, assisting us in registration and checking in. It’s great for kids. They offered crayons and colouring paper to kids while waiting for checking in. There is also free ice-cream for children. The in room dinning was great too. Served by staff Ling, appreciated that she make sure everything is done before leaving. Stay in on Christmas Day with festive decoration and the heritage room was superb spacious.

title: Wonderful Stay
desc: The hotel was fully booked but service was amazing and the room was lovely as expected. Check in took an hour but understandable due to peak season (ie Christmas) and staff had the foresight to seat guests in the courtyard with proper distancing while we waited. After checking in, everything went extremely well.

title: End year staycay
desc: Enjoyable stay! Service was excellent too. Just that the pillows were too soft. Probably can give us choices of pillow to choose from. Toilet seat with bidet was a plus point and on top on that the bath tub was super huge too!

title: Excellent staycation for family
desc: My teens love the room for the luxurious space (both bedroom & bathroom) and for being able to cast their mobile to the room TV. We like that the 2 rooms we had though in different layouts, were equally luxurious and cozy.

title: 2 hours to check in hotel room!
desc: Poor service during check-in. Waited two hours at the lobby area with my family. By the time we managed to check-in, it was already 6.20pm. Poor management by the hotel. Surprised to find at least 10 families in the queue, all waiting to check-in. This does not help the current COVID-19 situation with so many people crowded in the lobby area waiting to check in their rooms. Counter staff could not offer any explanation on the long check-in situation.

title: Nice experience
desc: Good experience, hotel main hall is very nice and well Christmas decorated. Staffs are friendly and helpful. Room is nice and clean, bath room is comfortable with smart toilet, my kid liked it very much. Overall is very good.

title: Fullerton hotel staycation
desc: Fullerton hotel staycation for the family over the Christmas festive season. It was a great experience for all! The children love the Christmas decorations around the hotel. The breakfast was very nice!

title: 2D1N Stay
desc: Book the room for family stacaytion. Amenities and cleanliness of room is good. Would be more than happy to visit again. Book the heritage room, was able to park the baby pram at a side without taking up walking space. Baby cot and bath tub was available too for use. Very satisfied with the stay

title: Excellent Staycation Experience
desc: Celebrated my wedding anniversary with a staycation at Fullerton Hotel and as usual, we were very pleased with the service, room and food. The staff were very friendly and approachable, and their level of professionalism is consistent throughout. Will definitely visit again!

title: Great Christmas Experience
desc: This is our first time that we spent our Christmas doing staycation. Fullerton Hotel did not disappoint. The friendliness and warmth of the staff spread the holiday cheers. Room and food was great. We keep coming back to Fullerton Hotel for its quality, value and service.

title: Great hotel but service can be improved
desc: For a start, no one helped us with the luggage and we brought a lot coz we are gonna be hopping from 1 hotel to another for 6 days. The front doorman was there but didn't help us. That was not a good start. 2nd, we waited for a long time for check in. My friend also booked on the same date and we checked in at the same time. My friend's room was not yet ready but ours was ready at 4pm. The check in staff suggested that our friend stayed in our room first and we agreed but what frustrated me was she gave a later checkout time for my friend. We pointed out that they are inconviniencing us, why are we not given the same late check out time. After discussing our points, the staff agreed to give us the same later check out time. The rest was fine. The room was good. I love that

title: Comfortable and peaceful staycation
desc: Rooms are really clean including the bathrooms. Confortable bedding and furnitures. Nice, detailed decor in rooms. Surprised with welcome messages on the TV, addressing to our names. We had rooms with nice balcony, facing river. Air in rooms feels fresh. Limited choice of food at Town restaurant, but recommend the Impossible burger meal which was great.

title: Family staycation
desc: Our stay here was great! My older kid truly enjoy the big bath tub. The hotel provided many baby friendly facilities, like the playpen/cot, baby bath tub and steam sterilizer. It was really helpful as it means lesser things to pack even when travelling with baby. Only wish that we had booked earlier on the farm tour for the family.

title: Christmas staycation
desc: It was a wonderful stay for me and my family on 24 Dec. Had also sent a note of appreciation to the GM. Want to especially commend the lady staff who had served us for our check-in. Unfortunately, I did not get her name. She made us feel very welcomed and comfortable. We are very appreciative of her nice gesture. As our check-in was delayed, she helped settle my family (2 adults and 2 children), took us to the hospitality room personally to await for our room to be ready. She also gave us a late check-out and a spacious room, allowing us to enjoy and experience the hotel and the room which my family enjoyed thoroughly during our short stay. We were also impressed with the service level from all the staff that we had encountered, including at the swimming pool and at the Town

title: 3D2N stay at a modern yet historical family staycation
desc: Didn't have a good entrance into the hotel (poor doorbell service) but thankfully that was quickly overwhelmed by other much attentive, friendly and helpful staff (check-in, food, etc). Really got the historical vibe (although place and rooms were still quite modern) in the hotel. Excellent view in the pool and in our Heritage room.

title: Wonderful stay
desc: Room is big, clean and comfy hotel Friendly staff Food is good Walking distance to mall and nearby to MRT If you like cycling this location has alot to explore (merlion, marina bay sands, F1 pitstop, garden by the bay)

title: Boxing Day Hotel Stay
desc: We are wow by the hotel room. My husband was very please with the room provided. The bed was very comfortable to sleep in. Another one not to be miss, the bath tub. Should try it out. we loved to soak in it.

title: Great experience despite tiny hiccup
desc: The staycay for our family of 4 (2A2C) turned out great, a lot better than expected. Had some issue with my reservation on extra bed 1 week before my stay and was upset with the replied I’ve gotten by a staff from Reservation. After a few calls, Thankfully another staff from the same team manage to resolved my problem. Hopefully the team can maintain good customer service & help customer resolve problem than leave them hanging. Checked in process was smooth & staff was very friendly. The night before we got a call to check in any time after 11am. We reached around 1230pm & was seated at a waiting area. Meanwhile the kids got a drawing kit( color pencils & booklets) and their personal ice card to collect free scoop of ice cream daily at certain timing. Waited about 40-50mins

title: Lovely Service Provided Even Before Checking In
desc: This is the second time we are having our staycation with Fullerton Hotel. And am extremely pleased to say that service was excellent from before we even stepped into the hotel. Why do I say so? Well, I totally forgot to make reservation for our Afternoon Tea & Evening Cocktails. Paolo was so kind enough to call me the night before & helped remind me to make the reservations with him. He was so pleasant over the phone that it made me instantly happy & excited for our staycation. When we arrived, naturally there were a lot of guests also checking in since it is a holiday season. Loved the way hotel staff guided guests to sit at a table & provided water, coloring pencils & a coloring book (to keep the children occupied) until a Check-in counter was available. Brilliant idea! We

title: Lovely place
desc: Lovely place and helpful staff. Rooms were very clean and spacious. Crowd control and SMM were done well and it did not feel too crowded. Good location. Had a lovely trip and time with my family. Cheers

title: Great and pleasant christmas staycation
desc: Overall staycation experience is really good. The check in and out process was smooth, cozy environment and very pretty christmas decor. Staffs are friendly and attentive. One of our favorite staycation hotel in sg.

title: December Staycation
desc: Pillows could use more fluff. It was flat - at least what me and my companion got. I already highlighted the other issues I had with the hotel in their survey, such as the limitations on the menus, check-in process, etc. While I understand that this might be due to the pandemic, I know some hotels that were on a better side in terms of service compared to Fullerton. I would say on the positive though that the rooms were at least well-maintained. On the relaxation side, the room is cool enough, and the sheets were just right. The spa was great as well. Their staff was helpful before and after the treatment. Overall a pleasant stay, but for the price paid and the hotel's highly-rated reputation, it could have been much better.

title: PIO’s BDAY CELEBRATION
desc: My Family especially my kid enjoyed a lot.. All the staffs were very helpful and friendly!!! The breakfast was very delightful espcecially the LAKSA! The rooms was so nice that you don’t want to go home! OVERALL IT WAS A VERY VERY PLEASANT EXPERIENCE!!! Thank you

title: Great location, value for money
desc: Expensive but you will get what you pay for. Clean, luxurious rooms. Located in the heart of the city with plenty of nearby malls for shopping and dining. Some bistros near marina bay gives excellent lazy afternoon siesta enjoying the sunset

title: Excellent Stay at Fullerton Hotel
desc: The stay at Fullerton Hotel was excellent. It had created a wonderful experience and holiday for me and family. Staff were friendly and professional. Check-in and check-out process was efficient. Will recommend to give a try.

title: A Great Experience at the National Monument
desc: I had my wedding dinner at their straits room followed by 2 nights stay at the suite. The services is really top notch, they really take great care of our guests and us. I would definitely recommend anyone to stay with them. Great experience!

title: Our Anniversary & Christmas times again!
desc: Years of stayed and celebrated our Anniversary and Christmas celebration at Fullerton, we were always having the Best feeling like ‘Home’! 4 days stayed was Superb and Enjoyable. Your Team carried out the Amazing Excellence Service. Thank you so much to Sharon Ng for your special room arrangement. And Alan, Chef Leong and Alson arranged the ‘Surprise’ Jade dinner to celebrate our Anniversary. Sincerely no word able to express our ‘Big Thanks’ and ‘Appreciation’ to your Management and Team. Difficult for us to remember everyone name, however, some names we will never forget.… We will be back 2-5 Feb to celebrate CNY! Reservation: Sharon F&B: Michael, Alson Jade: Alan, Chef Leong, Kyo, Penny, Yvonne, wei lun, wayne Straits: Nicholas, Paolo, Siti, Zep, Su Lim, Crystal,

title: Exceeded Expectations!
desc: Had a great stay here at The Fullerton Hotel and I would like to commend the awesome staffs of the Straits Club, especially Paolo, who has given such attention to detail and astounding service throughout our dining experience. We will definitely return here because of him! Many thanks to your service!

title: Love my stay!
desc: The location is perfect! Located at a historical setting which allows us to explore different places by walk. The facilities is amazing and service was beyond expectation ! It is slightly pricey but it’s value for money :) will bring my entire family to stay at the Fullerton someday again !

title: Hospitality at its finest
desc: Great location that's near tourist sights, shopping malls, food, amenities, and the stay itself was made even better by the impeccable service. Staff are obviously trained to create a most welcoming experience.

title: 5 star service
desc: I loved the place, location, food, atmosphere, and most importantly the wonderful staff, especially to Paolo and Joanne who was very accommodating during our stay. Me and my girlfriend who came to visit Singapore during this period of the pandemic had our afternoon tea and evening canapes in the Straits Club Lounge. Honestly, we had nothing but good food and great service. Definitely will recommend and share this experience with our kin and friends.

title: PH Delegation Review
desc: Good accommodation and excellent staff assistance. Highly recommended. The view and location of the hotel is also excellent for tourists visiting Singapore for the first time. Looking forward to my next booking at the Fullerton Hotel. Thank you!

title: Visit to Fullerton
desc: Overall had a good experience at this hotel, staff were friendly and very helpful. There were a lot of good moments shared there. One down side is the pillows are a little bit flat and it couldn't fit the contour of my neck so sleep wasn't the best but would visit again

title: Return visit
desc: Comfortable stay with good information passed on by hotel staffs. Approachable, attentive and did their best to facilitate requests from check in to check out. Clean rooms, plenty charging sockets, enough stools and chairs to sit around and many channels on tv. There is even music in the bathroom depending on what you tune in on the tv. And the smart toilet that warms your butt and so high tech and good to use. Convenient location and actually has different activities planned out for different days available for signing up. Also, a place that holds historic stories to its past!

title: One of the best
desc: I had a great staycay with my family. We love the ambience and the coziness of this hotel. And the staffs are all friendly and helpful. Definitely coming back for another staycay. My first time staying here and I am totally impressed. One of the best hotels I have ever stayed in.

title: Birthday celebration at Fullerton Hotel.
desc: It was an amazing experience and I had the most memorable experience. Front desk office staff Nicholas was awesome. I got an upgrade to the Marina Bay View Room plus a complimentary cake. It was the most beautiful experience in 2022 and I shall treasure this celebration and the memories.

title: Excellent Service, Beautiful Rooms
desc: It is our second time coming back to Fullerton for a staycation as we had such a great experience here. Every single hotel staff we met was warm, friendly and helpful to us. The rooms are amazing and clean and super comfortable (we booked the palladium suite) too. We'll definitely come back again!

title: Staycation
desc: Definitely worth every penny. Got the chance to stay in the heritage room because we were upgraded. I would definitely recommend to my friends and soon to my family if they will have the chance to come back toSG

title: staycation in fullerton
desc: enjoyed my stay. The hotel is in a ideal location where we can visit the surrounding sites within walking distance like the merlion, museum, food outlets. highly recommended for family for a weekend break

title: Aces Go Places - and to The Fullerton of course!
desc: We had an amazing time at The Fullerton. The Straits Club was a standout in particular - Siti, Nicholas, Crystal, Zep, Joanne. Wow guys... You made our anniversary a much more memorable one! Also a shout-out to Kate from the front desk who made the check-in process that much more pleasant! Thank you Fullerton! :)

title: Second time back to this hotel and really liked the rooms and service
desc: Second time here and we love the ambience and the staffs treatment to us and our kids! The room is really spacious for 2 adults and 2 kids below 7 years old as we could request for extra bed. The staff even told us that they would only put the extra beds nearer to evening time as that is nearer to bed time. Rather than most of the time, it was already there! We find this a nice gesture!

title: Everything was ok except charged parking
desc: Our 3D2N experience was ok, generally nice overall. One thing that ruined it for us was the complimentary parking coupon not able to scan despite it being a new coupon. Ended up being charged 20 bucks for parking. Not sure what I can do about it. The helpless feeling at that point was very unpleasant and left a bitter memory for this staycation. Given Fullerton's reputation, some proactiveness on offering things such as complimentary parking and choice of pillows to guest without us asking would have made it 5 stars for service. Or maybe I should lower my expectations of Fullerton from now on?

title: Awesomenessssss!!!!!!
desc: We had an amazing stay at Fullerton hotel! I never regret choosing this place to celebrate our 10th yr of marriage. Everything went smooth from check in/out, kudos to front office staffs! It was a fantastic experience and another memory to look back. Shout out to Paolo and Joanne of Club lounge for their hospitality and excellent world class service, Fullerton should keep them as gems and consider both as role models for hiring fnb staff. Thank you Fullerton staffs, we will be back for sure!!!

title: Great stay at the Fullerton!
desc: Great front desk staff, super friendly and welcoming, check in was abit of a wait though. Even though I didn’t tell anyone it was my birthday, front desk managed to figure it out and soon after, a slice of super delicious and fudgy cake was sent to my room! :) loved it!! The bed is also incredible, I had the best sleep ever as of recent!

title: Anniversary
desc: Everything was pleasant from the staff to the rooms. Had a beautiful view of Singapore river thanks to the upgrade given. However, my wife and I did not get a good night’s sleep because the pillows were too soft (barely any support).

title: Fullerton Strait club level 4
desc: It has been a very pleasant and great experience with Zep@ strait Club who serve us over during our 2 days stay at suit room 881. He has been very helpful and friendly and great initiatives in helping and assisting us on our needs. A great staff who put interest on his guests first. And knowledgeable too.

title: Definitely come again and again
desc: Wonderful experience for staying Fullerton , staffs warm and kindly service make me feel home . Our requirements were all satisfied. I slept very very well even purchased two pillows bring home . Look forward next staying;)

title: Lovely property and friendly staff
desc: An enjoyable stay at the Fullerton, staff is funny and room is clean and spacious. Love the automatic toilet bowl, seat is warm. A pity the pool can be quite small compared to the size of the property so the slots run out quickly or the pool can be quite crowded. Nonethless, it is a building with history hence there is nothing much they can do. Overall, it is a lovely hotel. We have enjoyed the stay.

title: An Experience Not to be missed out on
desc: Stayed in Fullerton suite about a few weeks ago under recommendation of my friend. Claudia & Mira from front office ensured checkin and checkout procedure was well taken care of. Was served by a few duty managers (Andrew, Kate, Gabriel, Revathy) through the stay, simply put service was of quality and tiptop efficiency, followups on any request made were well taken care of. Kuddos to Josie and her house keeping team including Simon for their fast response & fufillment of housekeeping requests.

title: Great view, great location but not so clean
desc: Great view & convenient location. Not recommended for families. We went for a staycation as a family. Average Service by front desk - great service by checking out staff, not so pleasant experience with checking in staff. Great service provided by staff at the restaurant where we had our breakfast. They were very welcoming and serving staff were very attentive and friendly Plumbing issues - The bathtub was not able to drained out the water. We called the helpdesk and the plumber came to fix it. Took about 45-60mins. Spider webs on fixtures. Cleaniness of the room - Given the rather positive reputation of the hotel, we expected a little more but was quite disappointed. We requested for a baby cot but it was not so clean, we decided not to use it in the end. It was torn

title: The FULLerton!
desc: Best staycation I could have imagined on a short notice! Fullerton Hotel provided me with a peaceful, luxurious, and tranquil solo staycation that puts my mind and my body in total relaxation mode. I loved everything about it, and I would definitely stay here again!

title: Very Lovely Get-away with Loved Ones
desc: Enjoyed my time with Fullerton Hotel. I've stayed with Fullerton for a number of occasions already and the service and quality of each stay have been nothing but great experience. Keep up the good job! Cheers!

title: Excellent
desc: One of the greatest property with comfort and feel as I was at Paris. Rich historical and grand, great location at a mouth of Singapore river. Hopping one day this brand name Fullerton hotel will reach beyond international.

title: Beautiful hotel but Average stay
desc: The architecture of the hotel is nice, and the rooms were clean and comfortable. However experience as a whole was not spectacular. Staff were generally friendly but they simply did what they had to. We didn't feel that anyone had went the extra mile to provide exceptional service. Room service was slow as sometimes we waited almost an hour. Breakfast at Town Restaurant was terrible. Food quality does not reflect a hotel standard at all. Any of the cafes nearby the hotel easily serves better food. We stayed to celebrate our wedding and honeymoon and initially thought to make this an annual trip, but at the price of the rooms, I feel we could have a better experience elsewhere.

title: Below average breakfast
desc: Disappointed for the below average for breakfast, lot of birds outdoor as well as swiming pool area. Otherwise, rooms are clean and comfortable, great bed and services are ok. Food quality should be improved..

title: Unforgettable memroies
desc: Our stay was comfortable and enjoyable. Our room was upgrade without me making any request. Hotel staff even called me the day before our check in to inform me that we can check in as early as 10am. The breakfast was a nice experience with friendly and attentive waiter and waitresses. However, there is room for improvement in the taste of the food and the check in process.

title: Elegant hotel
desc: A beautiful elegant hotel in the re-purposed 1928 Post Office building. It has an excellent location on the river and also Marina Bay with a warm, charming and very courteous staff. I travel to Singapore regularly and have stayed in may different hotels, the Fullerton was like a window into the old, colonial world of Singapore.

title: A Staycation Must Do
desc: After driving past The Fullerton for the last 9 years living here, we decided to treat ourselves to this historical place and we were not disappointed. The staff were like friends and we enjoyed everything

title: Hubby birthday staycation!
desc: Amazing staycation for my husband! Book this hotel way in advance in November as my hubby birthday falls on the CNY. Upon reaching, we were told to sit first and there will be someone to come and check in for us. Was given complementary bottled water while waiting & then a lady came to us for check in. Didnt catch her name but she assist us and she is the most lovely staff ever! Arrange for us a late check out too! Husband was given a slice of cake & also balloons which is so cute!!!! The room that was given to us had the most amazing view ever!!!!! Swimming pool is the best & breakfast spread is delicious. Will come back again for sure!!!!!

title: Memorable staycation
desc: Had a wonderful staycation at this hotel. Was given a cake to celebrate my birthday. Joined the tours and understood more about history of Fullerton and Clifford Pier. Would love to return again for a staycation.

title: The Fullerton Hotel Experience
desc: A great way to celebrate my son’s birthday. The food taste great! The pool with the surrounding scenery is just perfect to relax and enjoy the day. The bed and pillow combined is awesome to help you recharge after a day of enjoying the vicinity.

title: My 3D1N stay
desc: A good experience to spend my stay at Fullerton Hotel right in the heart of business district. A good location to go for morning walk. Also a good location to travel by MRT to other parts of the city.

title: Excellent
desc: Heritage Room was very spacious (I was previously at the Courtyard for my previous visit). Enjoyed both my visits. Facilities were very easy to book, staff were always friendly and accommodating to our queries.

title: Very nice decoration and have CNY feel
desc: Having a wonderful staycation at The Fullerton Hotel during CNY and nice decorations. Loved the room! It was big, clean and spacious, washroom as well. Just that pillow a bit soft but we still enjoyed the staycation.

title: The staff makes all the difference.
desc: I would like to pen down a special appreciation to your check in team and front desk staff that made my wife's Birthday celebration at your hotel so memorable and amazing. They did such an excellent job and their willingness to make our stay at your hotel unforgettable. I would like to mention, Miss.Anne and Mr.Andrew and all the reservation team that was so kind to make me and my wife feel so special on our stay at the hotel. They even allowed a late check out for us, delivered the cake and flowers that i ordered at exactly at midnight to wow my wife. In a nut shell, your staff is fantastic and are true stars of your hotel. They make all the difference compared to many hotels that i have stayed in. Kudos to your team. Thank you for being so amazing, accommodating, friendly and

title: Weekend Staycation
desc: Booked the "Every Day is Valentine's Day" package, called in to arrange the check in timing, and the receptionist explained all the details well and patiently. Submitted the in-room dining options late, but was accomodated well with no issues at all. Allowed for early check-in, and graciously gave the key an hour early with no charge since the room was already ready and unoccupied. In-room dining experience was excellent and a very nice experience. Arrangement for breakfast was done the previous day and was easy; breakfast was also a nice experience, even with the Covid restrictions, just slightly busy since "buffet" options had to be served and brought to your table, so waiters/waitress were kept busy, but they were still patient in explaining the menu and the procedure for

title: A Pleasant and Memorable Stay at The Fullerton Hotel
desc: I stayed at The Fullerton Hotel on 31 January 2022 for one night staycation with my family. To be honest, we did not really have a good first impression upon stepping into the hotel. We had to wait for about 15 to 20 minutes before proceeding to the front desk for the check-in proper. Some of the hotel staff seems a little unfriendly and unapproachable. It's probably due to the fact that they were busy as many guests were streaming in to check-in. After checking in, we went up to our room. Although the room was spacious, we were taken aback to discover a wall blocking the view in the balcony. We went down to enquire if it was possible to have a room change. We were greeted warmly by the Guest Relations Executive, Miss Mira. She empathetically listened to the issue and

title: Excellent Experience
desc: Excellent experience from check in to check out. Staff was friendly and helpful. There was no long wait and everything was efficient and smooth. Thanks for making our stay unforgettable. Looking forward to visiting again.

title: Staycation
desc: Enjoyed my one night staycation at Fullerton hotel. The staff there are really friendly and I probably would have enjoyed it more if the mattress was more firm. But I think it's more of a personal preference. My mother and I also enjoyed the afternoon tea at the courtyard, which was nice and we really enjoyed the free flow savouries, twg tea and flat white. I made use of the dining credits that came with my package on the buffet breakfast and room service. Without it, I would not spend that amount on breakfast as I felt the selection was not that extensive and probably not really worth the amount paid. Also the restrictive breakfast timings made me feel very rushed. There are a selection of food options around the hotel, so one is probably better off eating outside for

title: Good but can be better
desc: Happy stay and compliments and commendation for front desk staff, Mira on putting up a good service standards and friendly. Swimming pool water temperature abit too cold be it in the day or night. And staffs could be more friendly and cheerful. Gota learn from front desk, Mira. She really deserves a commendation and promotion.

title: Staycation
desc: Delicious food, beautiful view, kind staff, etc. Everything is perfect. I don't wat to go home. Location is close to MRT station, merlion park, museums and boat quay. So you are also able to enjoy outside. And, it is very convenient for long stay.

title: Great stay at the Historic Fullerton hotel
desc: The location is great where the hotel is so rich in history and colonial feel. We love the ambience and architecture. We went exploring a long the river. It is a stone away from Lau pa sat and Chinatown. There is so much to explore around. We walked to City Hall and pass many historic buildings, Asian civilisations museum, Victoria hall and National gallery. The room was very nice, looking through to the courtyard. The kids love the bath and we love the Japanese heated toilet seats. 😂 Breakfast at the Court was so good. The breakfast spread has both local and western. Our boys loved the breakfast so much.

title: Disappointing experience
desc: We were provided with poor quality soft pillows in the room and caused neck aches for us. There was poor signal connection from our various telecoms in our devices within the room. It caused frustration when we needed to check some stuff urgently from work. Although the hotel provided us with wifi, it is not secured hence, we were not comfortable to use it. Fullerton Hotel is one of the best hotels in Singapore but sadly, during our stay it was not impressive and it was a poor experience staying here.

title: Beyond amazing
desc: Extremely amazed by the standards and the service at the hotel. My wedding guests were all extremely happy and raves about the food. So happy I chose this hotel for my wedding. Will definitely come back each year for my anniversary.

title: Memorable Marriage Proposal!
desc: Staff were very patient and helpful with giving advice on my marriage proposal set up! And of course, the cleanliness in the room is top-notch, and it really deserves a 5-star rating, no doubt. Check-in and check-in were smooth as expected.

title: Staycation
desc: 1) Staff are polite and helpful 2) Proximity to train station is a plus point 3) Pen and memo pad should be provided besides phone for guest to jot info after making enquiries over phone. 4) Breakfast at Town restaurant is worth a try

title: Enjoyable staycation
desc: We enjoy a lot staying there for 4 nights, except for the breakfast lack of varieties. This hotel building with rich history background, it is amazing. We plan to have our staycation again in near future.

title: Fullerton Hotel
desc: Our stay at The Fullerton was sensational. The room was immaculate and the view was spectacular. I could not have asked for better service. Claudia and Andrew went above and beyond to make our stay extra special. Their attention to detail made us feel as though we were the only guests at the hotel. The lengths they took to make us feel welcome made our stay in Singapore so much better! The view from the infinity pool was breathtaking and the temperature was perfect. Jade restaurant is a must! The food was the best food that I have ever had, especially their soups and rice. The staff were friendly and couldn't do enough to please us. I will never forget our stay at The Fullerton. A big THANK YOU to Claudia and Andrew. You are a valuable assest to this hotel. I implore everyone to

title: Fullerton review
desc: I thoroughly enjoyed my staycation at Fullerton! The aesthetic of the hotel was really nice and was one of the nicest that i've visited! The staff who attended to my requests and check-in were extremely friendly and efficient. The room was also extremely clean and spacious, which allowed me and my friends enough space to do work and watch videos.

title: short and sweet staycation at fullerton
desc: the room was aesthetic and truly had a colonial style to it. despite being a courtyard room there was still a coffee machine that came along with premium coffee and also a speaker that could be easily connected to devices. the experience was definitely not what I had expected(in a good way).

title: wonderful stay at Fullerton suite
desc: I had a wonderful returning stay at Fullerton Hotel Fullerton Suite over the weekends. Service was extremely prompt and reliable by Andrew and team from front office. These include Tomiko as well as Claudia. Andrew really took good care of guests. We faced some inconveniences and Andrew and Gabriel ensured smooth follow up by housekeeping by Josephine and team. We had a good breakfast under in room dining. Daniel and the team ensured we were well fed and delivery made on time. Fullerton’s service is really tip top, i look forward to my subsequent stays ahead.

title: Great to bring a family
desc: Everything was great! Except the hotel room fridge which was faulty and we only found out the night after, which meant the breast milk we planned for our baby had to go to waste. But nonetheless Fullerton remains one of my favourite hotels along with Capella.

title: Top notch hotel and one of the best staycation we ever had!
desc: Top notch hotel and one of the best staycation we ever had! The architecture of the hotel and how well thought and meticulous in the service, food quality and efficiency. We had stayed in so many hotels for staycation and The Fullerton tops it all!

title: great customer service
desc: The best thing is their trained staffs, great service, patience, friendliness and do-whatever we can attitude. kudos to the hotel and staffs it was a family staycation for 2 days, great view and good food

title: Superb Hotel
desc: Superb stay at the Fullerton - staff was friendly, housekeeping did an immaculate job in cleaning room. Wherever you go, you’re greeted - it makes you feel welcomed and comfortable. Would totally recommend for everyone to stay here and experience it themselves.

title: Staff is the key of the success!
desc: All the staff are so helpful that makes my stay memorable. The location is superb, you can have a walk after dinner along and Singapore river, rent a bike ( anywheel) outside the hotel to go round MBS / jogging in the morning.

title: Very . Very good in all services
desc: This is my family first time stay in the Fullerton hotel. I know about same history of this building, it is a historical building. Very early time it is a museum, than E.D.B. follow is hotel. One side is singapore river, other side is major of financial and banking center . All major bank are located here.

title: Great hotel to stay at
desc: Clean and spacious room. Friendly staff. Beautiful night sceneries. Beautiful Christmas deco. Easy access to food around the hotel. Staff were quick in attending to our requests. Will visit this hotel again.

title: Our anniversary stay at the Fullerton is a memory we will treasure forever.
desc: Our stay at the Fullerton Hotel was like a magnificent dream from the time we checked in until the moment we left. Claudia and Andrew were the friendliest and most welcoming of hosts we have ever experienced. They really looked after us and even went so far as to arrange a little anniversary surprise cake and farewell gift that really made us feel special and valued. The room and the view took this romantic getaway to the next level...we were left breathless with the scenery and every element was of the highest quality. We enjoyed our swim in the infinity pool and had the most delicious dinner at the Jade restaurant. When it was time to checkout Claudia and Andrew made us feel part of the Fullerton family and it was really difficult to say goodbye to them and the hotel. We

title: Good but did not live up to reputation
desc: A decent stay but we were disappointed as the Fullerton has such a fantastic reputation. Check-in on a normal Monday afternoon took over a hour, we were offered a glass of juice during the wait. Pool is also very small for size of hotel so very crowded at all hours. Overall service was good but not very personable. We’ve done a dozen staycations over the last 18 months and this was our least favourite

title: REGULAR SINGAPORE VISITORS
desc: We are regular visitors from Australia to our son and his family in Singapore. We chose the Fullerton for a 2 night Staycation and had a wonderful time. The room, staff and location was great. We will stay here again

title: Relaxed Staycation
desc: The second time returning to this hotel. A little disappointment as I did not manage to check into the same heritage room 3 years ago. The heritage room I checked into 3 years ago was really huge, with a living room plus a bedroom. Guess this time round, lady luck was not on my side. Nevertheless, the overall experience is still quite the same 3 years ago. I like the check-in style now whereby you will be lead to a table, served with tetra pack drinking water while waiting for your turn.

title: Amazing Anniversary Experience
desc: We had a wonderful experience at The Fullerton Hotel Singapore (Premiere Quay Room). The room comes with a balcony with amazing view to Marina Bay and the newly rejuvenated room is worth paying for. Every staff member we encountered , from Concierge, courtyard and shout out to Anne & Nicholas from reception team were delightful, polite, efficient and attentive. Anne decorated our bed since we are celebrating our 3rd anniversary and ofcourse, we love it! Thank you! Looking forward to stay at Fullerton again..

title: Excellent service
desc: Food and service was excellent. Well recommended for families as well as friends who would like to go for a staycay. Whole check in and out process was smooth and hassle free. Walking distance to MRT as well as few iconic places.

title: 5 star hotel??
desc: Sad to see that all veterans good staff left! Fullerton lost his DNA. The new staff is walking around without giving any attention to customers … guest seating in lobby in bathrobe .. very nice when you hosting an important business lunch… Hope they will wake up and soon we will see the fullerton shine again like in the 90s coz now it is a disgrace especially when you receive the bill…

title: Memorable Staycation
desc: This is our first time staying in this hotel, the experience is wonderful and memorable. The overall customer service and room service were good. We definitely will visit again on our next special occasion.

title: Awesome heritage room!
desc: My 2 nights stay with my fiancée was awesome. The room were spacious and the service were great. My heritage room comes with a marina bay sands view. The toilet were very spacious. I would highly recommend this hotel. Probably the best staycation I had in Singapore so far.

title: Staycationing
desc: Book a staycation but was not given the room upgrade and tour as promised. However an hour of late check out was granted which were appreciated. If there is A guided tour around the hotel to explain the rich history of this hotel would be great as one of the reason we book it was because we would like to learn more about the history.

title: Perfect experience if not for Check In issues
desc: Hotel is conveniently located, room is nice, clean and comfortable. It was nice for taking photos with their Christmas decorations around. In general all the staff were friendly and helpful. Check in staff at counter was also very helpful in helping us to book facilities. The only area that was lacking was the staff in charge of seating us to wait for check in at the lounge. No clear information or explanations were given, and when I asked for more information about the waiting, he just told me - to wait. Only when I approached another lady staff to asked about what was going on, then was I given an explanation. It really helps much if guests were told what is happening so that we're not all just wondering and waiting?

title: Enjoyable stay and Pleasant experience.
desc: We had an overall enjoyable stay. Good service and amenities. Food was great. Access to nearby sightseeing places and more options for food was an added advantage. The Collyer Suite was spacious. Only missing part was there were no big windows ! Overall very good experience.

title: Su Lim is the best
desc: Had the chance to be served by Su Lim at The Straits Club :-) great service, great smile! Managed to speak to her after our tea breaks and realised she was on internship, all the best to you Su Lim! :-)

title: Nice family staycation
desc: Fabien at the courtyard was helpful! Nice amenities especially the pool. Clean room. Family-friendly place. Enjoyed the stay with my family very much. Great service. Nice environment. Efficient check out.

title: Decent experience and modern room interior
desc: The heritage room was rather spacious and the bathroom design was grand and big. The room however offered zero view, completely blocked by concrete walls and the small balcony was rather dirty. Still enjoyed the room interior. Bright, new and comfortable.

title: Most pleasant stay
desc: My wife and I had a wonderful time at Fullerton. Kudos to the staff. My wife and I are most impressed with the friendliness and service rendered to us at the club. The service is impeccable. We also had a wonderful dinner at Jade. Special mention to Dorothi, Crystal, Joanne, Paolo, Nicholas. We treated by friends.

title: Great room and views, but service at the main Fullerton a tad lacklustre and disappointing.
desc: My room was amazing and had a decent view of Marina Bay. But I didn’t feel like the service at the main hotel was that great. Their sister hotel, Fullerton Bay Hotel was outstanding in terms of their attention to detail however. Got to experience their service because of the dining credits given, which could be utilised at their sister hotel. I definitely felt the difference in service level once I got to the Fullerton Bay hotel. Even the doorman was so professional and friendly. I think people pay for better hotels to feel like they are at home. A home away from home experience, and sadly, this was not felt at Fullerton Hotel.

title: Review of my recent staycation
desc: The size of room is a bit small for a 5-star hotel..Car park location is not ideal. In Room Dining service is excellent although choice of menu is rather limited.. Restricted room view..Poor accessibility to the swimming pool

title: Weekend staycation
desc: Nice cozy and quiet place to relax and chill, Every staff that attended were really friendly and professional. Great place to go if you're looking to get yourself spoilt. Location just out of busy streets of town leads to a very peaceful stay.

title: Staycation on birthday
desc: Overall staycation was excellent. All the staffs were very friendly and polite. It comes with a nice and big room. My wife and boy enjoyed the stay and hotel room. Will come back again in the near future.

title: Staycation
desc: Staffs are very helpful and friendly, felt very welcoming. Very satisfy with the in room dining. The room that we stayed was clean. Overall experience was great and will definitely return for more stay in the future.

title: Birthday staycay was very enjoyable
desc: from having Chromecast on the tv, a warm toilet bowl seat, a bathtub that was well insulated & ofc a spacious room with a balcony view of MBS and in room dining for dinner and breakfast, lovely experience

title: A lovely and memorable Staycation
desc: I spent a day at the Fullerton and it was one of the most memorable hotel stays I have had in my life. The vegetarian high tea served at the Courtyard was excellent and so was the breakfast. The highlight of our stay was the pool, especially in the evening (the view was stunning!). Overall, the service was impeccable.

title: View from Room was spectacular
desc: got ourselves the marina bay view room, and it was magnificent. everything in room was perfect, except for the spoilt curtain motors which was noisy when it couldn't stop. also had hiccup for spa reservation - made prior booking but was not available when we went down. but service recovery was top notch. may consider coming again.

title: Awesome StayCay
desc: was offered an early check in and the staffs were friendly and helpful! didn’t manage to enjoy the pool, wish to have spend more time in the hotel if I need not to attend some urgent work matters. can’t wait to be back soon!

title: Grand Hotel Experience
desc: From the day before check in to the day of check out. Everything was seamless and great. Got a call from reservation department the night before check in to comfirm the reservation and early check in was offered. Which was a nice touch. Check in took about 30 minutes. But guests were offered place to sit and wait with mineral water offered. Got a free upgrade which was great for weekdays stay. Room was ready and cleaned very well. Sparkling clean. Great job Housekeeping. Dined at the Lantern which offered a bird eye and romantic view of the Marina Bay Area. Overall a marvellous stay. Would like to come back again someday.

title: Splendid as expected
desc: Came with my girlfriend for our anniversary. The room was spacious and well appointed. Dinner at Jade was incredible and highly recommended. It was an extremely pleasant stay as befitting one of Singapore's finest institutions. Would recommend it to everyone I meet!

title: 2 Days 1 Night Staycation
desc: Great location with the nearest MRT station (Raffles Place) a 5 mins walk away. Great to walk/jog around the hotel as there are many tourist sites to explore such as the Cavenaugh Bridges, Merlion Park, Asian Civilisation Musuem etc. Hotel staff were very friendly and helpful. Breakfast was a variety of local and western selection. Room at the Palladine Suite offers beautiful sights of the Singapore facade and they were clean and spacious.

title: Staycation with the little one
desc: Came back to my wedding venue for another round of Staycation. Always loved the decor design and feel of the premise. Staff were all round exceptionally friendly. Feels like home to me. Great location to get out to the marina bay area.

title: Sister's Wedding night stay
desc: We booked a room to stay after our sister's wedding and it was great. The bed was comfortable and unlike those that give backache. The temperature of the room was also perfect allowing for us to be well rested after a tiring day of fulfilling wedding events. Swimming pool was nice and service staff from check in to room service to dining were friendly and helpful.

title: Overall satisfied stay..
desc: This is the 2nd staycation for our family at Fullerton. As the 1st stay was perfect, this round was slightly lower satisfaction compare to 1st stay. Can say 100Pts and 98Pts? hahaha. However, it's still good enough and we have willing to visit again in future. We tried in-room dining this time and it was really nice experience. If you receive dining points or voucher, I like to recommend you to use it for in-room dining. ^^ Be careful. Their portion is pretty big. Do not order too many dishes at once.

title: Great location and ambience
desc: Love the rooms high ceiling, with a huge bathtub and separate stand shower, the cool automatic toilet bowl that scares my monster when the lid opens on its own. the cosy ambience, the location and the pool with great view

title: Historic and luxurious
desc: The hotel is very impressive with lots of interesting features, the staff are wonderful. Good options in the restaurant could be more varied and better quality. Overall experience was very positive. Very comfortable.

title: Amazing Luxury Hotel in CBD
desc: My wife and I stayed for 2 nights in this marvelous and beautiful hotel, filled with tradition back to 1920s, get to understand it was the General Post Office and several ministries under Straits Government. The staff are very professional and courteous, from Reception, Town Restaurant and cleaning staff. Room is very clean and stocked with necessary bathroom amenities, coffee & teas! The pool was small but very nice, I swam at 10 am and there were only 5 other swimmers (perhaps it was on a Tuesday, a weekday). The breakfast was comprehensive with much variety and individually served, for safe and hygienic purposes. However, you should ask for car park redemption ticket if you are driving there, because the rate is very high. The hotel is located in central business

title: My 2022 1st staycation - Fantastic
desc: Have a fabulous time to celebrate my 47th wedding anniversary at this property. Given an ultra spacious room with big bathroom and hugh balcony. Will return for another staycation with family again. Very fine food at Jade restaurant.

title: Anniversary Stay
desc: Decided to go on a buffet breakfast and was surprised that they gave us our photo as souvenir. First time we experienced that in a hotel! It just means that Fullerton really care and how wanted us to feel special.

title: Memorable birthday staycation
desc: The Fullerton is rich with history for a staycation to remember. My mother's 94th birthday was given a special touch by the treats and decorations arranged by well appointed staff members; the generosity of the management transformed our quiet stay of 2 nights , with 3 siblings into one filled with nice memories and images for the future generation. This is the time to book a stay as the ambience of Chinese New Year is well worth it. Thank you!

title: Luxurious hotel with very well thought out interior furnishings
desc: Had a 1 night stay-cation recently, and was very impressed throughout. From the warm and friendly service during check-in, to the luxurious and well thought out room interior. I liked that the room had a classic luxury, and yet was equipped to cater to the modern traveller, with convenient placement of HDMI connectivity to the TV, as well as charging outlets and USB ports placed on both sides of the bed. The toilet seat was even automatic and kept warm!

title: Always Deserve a 5 Star hotel
desc: Thank you staff and team of The Fullerton hotel. We have a Wonderful staycation. Warm & heart full welcome by the hotel staff & excellent customer service special from Mr. Andrew Yip (front desk - duty mgr) for the smooth check in and room with stunning view; Ms Angelina Xu received us with sweet smile and pleasant dining experience. We are happy and received a VIP service feeling like a 👸. We enjoyed our high tea and well blend of local/western breakfast in the hotel. Appreciate your kind hospitality and excellent service during our stay. Nice job & keep it up. You all well deserve a 5 star. This is the best experience hotel stay. We’ll be back on our next staycation to celebrate our anniversary again.

title: LOVE IT!!!!
desc: From checking in to checking out! Every single staff hospitality are at their top notch! I celebrated my mother’s and my sister’s birthday wonderfully! I will definitely come back again. The Fullerton Hotel is one of the most classic places I’ve ever stayed in Singapore. I can’t wait to do another staycation soon!

title: The Fullerton Hotel is a classic luxury hotel
desc: This is a classic luxury hotel with in my opinion the very best location in Singapore. The Fullerton Hotel is a sight itself. From the Hotel you can see many of the iconic landmarks in Singapore. Fullertons talanted and very well trained staff will take care of you. The pool with views over Clarke quay is really nice. Food and drinks are excellent. I really like this hotel.

title: A truly memorable birthday celebration experience!
desc: Stayed for 2 nights in a room with river view. Room was spacious and quiet. Friendly staff at check-in counter. Birthday package was great; lovely fresh bouquet of roses, nice bottle of champagne, cute teddy bear and a delicious chocolate cake which was too big for two.

title: Had a good staycation
desc: Room was clean and quiet. Good view of the surrounding central district. Bathtub is large. A pity the ceiling lights could not be selectively switched on, I'm just looking for a drink at the bar counter and have to lit up the whole room.

title: Great one night stay
desc: Friendly staff with great service. Very clean and spacious room. Able to book timeslots for pool, gym, etc virtually (so need not waste time calling up reception etc). The laksa offered in the breakfast menu was good.

title: A pleasant stay
desc: Well maintained hotel even though there is still room for improvements. Hotel staff are friendly and also quick to respond to requests. Love the feel of the hotel and the air-conditioning is amazinglu cold at all times unlike some hotels that felt really stuffy and warm.

title: Pretty good staycation
desc: The staycation with them was pretty good except that the bedding was unsuitable for me. It's too soft for me, so it caused me backaches (and I realised this way too late). Dining experience was good, the staff were all super nice and friendly, and the food was generally good.

title: The Fullerton Experience
desc: I always go back to the Fullerton and will go back again. The experience, service and quality is outstanding. The staff are amazing - friendly, supportive and willing to go the extra mile to ensure you have a great stay. Despite the many new hotels in Singapore, this one still stands out.

title: Great hotel living up to its name.
desc: Wonderful hotel in an extremely convenient location. Clean, great service, bed quality, especially baby cot definitely can be improved as my baby didn’t have a good night’s sleep. Adult’s bed is not too bad. Breakfast service is top notch, food quality can be improved :). Overall extremely satisfied.

title: My First Staycay
desc: My first staycay. I booked it solo for my birthday. Didn’t get to enjoy the facilities much expect on the very last day which is swimming. As I’ve been occupied for the past 2 days. Thought at least get a wish from the hotel but none:’( haha. It’s alright. Overall, it’s a decent stay to escape from the outside world.

title: Excellent Service as Always
desc: Always glad to stay at Fullerton. The check in / out processes are efficient, there is less of a crowd and the staff are attentive to details and always helpful. It offers the most consistent service across all staff as compared to other hotels :)

title: Comfortable Stay
desc: The stay was comfortable and staff were friendly. Enjoyed the view and food options there. Will recommend for solo staycaytion or with small group of friends. The booking facilities and housekeeping service were efficient. The stay was easy and in the room entertainment was amazing

title: Amazing stay!!
desc: Such an amazing hotel and the customer service makes it stand out by far. Would revisit again and recommend to friends. Even during covid restrictions the staff were so helpful and accommodating (especially during arrival and departure).

title: The room is excellent, but the breakfast could not make it
desc: The room is excellent, and the check-in is fast and good service, the whole experience of the stay is good, but just the minor thing is the breakfast food. I can taste the dim sum taste like frozen food same goes for the sausage. The sausage texture does not taste the same I had at the cafe. The bacon is hard, not crunchy, the scrambled egg does not taste nice, and the coffee is bad. Maybe when the food arrived not that warm anymore.

title: Immaculately performed
desc: We had a Quay twin bed room with Virtuoso privileges for 5 nights. Enjoyed access to their Straits Club lounge where we met brilliant staff; particularly Siti went extra miles for us, and she did it with a smile. Excellent value and friendliness beyond expectation. Strongly recommended.

title: Awesome
desc: A very memorable stay at one of the most iconic heritage sites of Singapore. Close to many heritage buildings and convenient to get to many food outlets. A wonderful place to stay for a short trip. Amenities in the Hotel was sufficiently provided for. Staff were pleasant and helpful.

title: birthday celebration staycation
desc: Overall the stay in this hotel is satisfied. Room is clean, king sized bed, front desk service good, location is in city area, and mrt station is within walking distance, like 5mins. Only the pillows are too soft for me.

title: Staff and Stay review
desc: Our Stay at The Fullerton Hotel Singapore was superb, the staffs were very friendly and helpful esepcially Kate Moon and Hafiz. Both were professional and go extra mile in their service. They are friendly and easy to communicate, we did not have any issues with the stay throughout, all was smooth were because of the staff. Thank You to both and The Fullerton Hotel Singapore for the wonderful Staycation ever!!!

title: Ideal spot for a quiet stay
desc: Perfect iconic place for a staycation, amazed by the sound-proof & design of the room, love how the showering area is separated from the toilet. Entire hotel is grant and clean, not much extra-mile services was required.

title: Excellent Experience
desc: We had a 5 star experience staying in this hotel. Will surely stay in the same hotel the next time I visit Singapore. The check-in process was smooth, staff was helpful, rooms were as clean as expected, view was amazing. The location is just amazing.

title: Good & Clean hotel
desc: It is a heritage hotel so one can expect the rooms to be quite different even though it is in the same category. I was given a much bigger from on my first stay last year, but a very much smaller room this time. Check in was considered smooth on a Saturday. I enjoyed the ala carte buffet breakfast. Thank you Fullerton and team for a comfortable stay once again.

title: Stay at Fullerton Hotel
desc: Enjoyed the comfortable stay. Overall service was good. Room was clean. Food at Town Restaurant was good value. Will be happy to consider staying at Fullerton Hotel again. Happy that the hotel was willing to provide free parking without hesitation.

title: Fullerton Hotel Staycation cum Birthday celebration
desc: Greatly improved on their services as compare to my last staycations. Staffs : most of them friendly and efficient, especially to spa team and special thanks to Elaine. Room : spaces and clean Bed : large and very comfortable Bath tub : large and strong water pressure can create large bubbles bubbly bath Birthday treat : a small slice of tasty chocolate cake (^-^) Steam room : noisy , need to service or upgrade

title: Awesome Stay
desc: We have taken the Valentine promo for a couple friend for a mini honeymoon treat and Fullerton just made it all possible, nothing more we can ask for- all delivered as expected and more! Highly recommended! Can’t wait to stay in Fullerton on next visit to SG!

title: Best in class, but concierge staff a little bit patronising
desc: I had a relatively pleasant 4-nights stay at the Fullerton Hotel. The balcony was very unique and the amenities in the hotel was great. However, we didn’t feel very welcomed especially at the start of the stay because the concierge staff were very unwelcoming right off the bat. Once, while making my way to the reception, a concierge staff walked really fast towards me and asked “are you a guest here?” in the most patronising tone I’ve seen from a service staff. This kept on repeating for me throughout my stay and I kept having to show them my key cards for some reason? I can safely say that most guests didn’t receive the same treatment as I did so I’m really curious as to why I was treated in such a way.

title: Jade Restraunt + Hotel
desc: Wonderful staff from Jade Restaurant, ensuring that our wedding solemnisation goes smoothly. Special thanks to the hotel for allowing us to have the privilege for early check in. Will definitely come back again!

title: First time experience to stay in this hotel
desc: The overall of my stay was good except for cleanliness of room due to allergy to dust. I hope that they will improve on that and I hope to have better impression on my stay if I have the chance to visit them again.

title: Overall great experience.
desc: Staycation cum birthday celebration for wife. Was a great stay. Room was big and clean. The in room service was fast and staff attended to request immediately even late into the night. Check out was fast and hassle free.

title: Staff and Stay Review
desc: Our stay at The Fullerton Hotel was a breeze from the check in definitely throughout our stay. We were assisted by Kate Moon at the reception who explained to me & husband regarding the bookings of breakfast and hotel facilities. Hafiz in charge of concierge assisted us with our belongings and prepared for us a cake and The Fullerton Hotel Bear as a small gift for us staying here and our honeymoon as newly wedded couple. Definitely would reccommend this hotel. A great and pleasant stay!

title: Great place for a staycation in the city
desc: Had a lovely staycation over the past weekend. Our room was very spacious, had high ceilings, and a lovely view. It was fantastic to stay in a National Monument with so much history in it. Particularly enjoyed the service and hospitality at the Straits Club led by Zep, Paolo and Crystal.

title: Lovely ambience for staycation and afternoon tea
desc: We really enjoyed ourselves at the Fullerton hotel during our staycation. Check in was done smoothly and smiles from all staff. They even guided us to our rooms. The room was cosy and had a spectacular view of the bay area.. lovely to just hang out in the room the entire day and enjoy this! We had afternoon tea at the Courtyard and the spread was delicious and so much variety. Not to mention each item was delicately made.. we could not even bear to eat it and took many photos... The ambience and atmosphere at the Courtyard was quiet and relaxing. The staff were also again attentive and would replenish our food whenever they saw it was empty. Had an enjoyable time! We would always return for a staycation and Fullerton is always the first choice!

title: Staycation with family
desc: Service is relatively good. Club lounge is fantastic. Food selection have got a wide variety. Checking out service could have done better. The rooms are comfortable, and clean. Service at the town restaurant can be improved.

title: Great stay!
desc: The room was spacious yet cosy, the bathtub was a good size as well. Service was great! Overall it was a good stay :) the staff were very responsive and accommodating. Thank you! Would recommend to friends for sure.

title: spring a surprise
desc: Fullerton like to spring a surprise every time i visit the property and the latest stay was no different. This is the defining feature that sets it apart from the other properties in town. Highly recommended if you like the serendipity of travel but can't quite travel yet. This is as good as it gets

title: Good stay
desc: Pleasant Stay and experience. was serviced by front staff Claudia that assisted with my check in. She ensured that everything was met for, including my special request for early breakfast. Hotel is clean and located at centralized area.

title: Stayca @ Fullerton
desc: Enjoyable experience. Great location, able to explore nearby Chinatown - enjoy good Nanyang coffee and visit its museum on the second floor. Hotel was clean, staff were friendly. Breakfast was just great

title: A classic hotel with superb service delivery by the loveliest of people
desc: … irrespective of Covid the Fullerton Hotel is delivering on its reputation as a classic hotel with near perfect location and superb service delivery. We are always joyful to arrive and sad to leave … a bit like home.

title: Very Very Disappointing
