Facilities ie gym were great, swimming pool was nice but not many beds and you can’t order food which was frustrating when relaxing at the weekend before leaving but equally not a deal breaker (drinks can be served). The breakfast experience was probably the worst part of the stay. It was very manic most mornings

title: Great Choice But Tweaks are Needed
desc: Fullerton Hotel was a terrific choice. Elegant property with great service in an amazing location downtown in Singapore right on the canal. Tweaks that hotel needs to make are the following: -Food needs to move up a notch in terms of sophistication. Buffet breakfast is expensive at $45 per person. There should also be an a la carte option. Salmon burger, yikes, was pieces of nova with lettuce and tomato. -Singapore can be very hot weather. Outdoor pool was too warm and they need to pump cold water into it.

title: If you want to be spoiled rotten, then stay at The Fullerton Hotel Singapore!
desc: Warning...booking a staycation at The Fullerton to celebrate your anniversary might make your other half look bad! The team really went out of their way to make sure we were well taken care of right at the start when we checked in. From Shermaine at Front Desk, to Nicholas and his team at Straits Lounge, to even our entertaining guide who charmed my in-laws during The Heritage Tour we prebooked! It certainly won me brownie points with my in laws who I invited the next day to join us for lunch. Not to mention the sweet surprises we found in our room, including a thoughtful card by General Manager Gino Tan! With its picturesque backdrop, we took countless photos by the pool to capture our memorable stay. After which we headed down to feast on an elaborate Chinese meal at JADE

title: Great to be Back!
desc: Our first trip to Singapore since the borders re-opened. Where else would we want to stay but the Fullerton! It was nice to see familiar faces and some new ones too. Siti and Paolo in the Straits Club were excellent in looking after us. Yes, there have been changes as you would expect after three years of the pandemic, but they are all for the better. We had a Quay room and a great view overlooking the Singapore River. We were told that the breakfast buffet had recently been reintroduced and it works well. There are no physical menus anymore so you have you scan the QR codes to get the menu choices. The Fullerton is well placed for the MRT and then you can go anywhere the fancy takes you. Will we go back to the Fullerton? - most definitely!

title: The most comfortable luxurious hotel
desc: Our experience at The Fullerton Hotel is nothing short of perfection. Check-in was relatively easy. When we arrived in our rooms, we were amazed at every aspect of comfort. Comfy-sized rooms, beds, bathrooms with nespresso machine, Harman Kardon speaker & power adapter to fit almost any plug you need

title: Decent stay
desc: My partner and I booked Quay room and got upgraded (thank you!), stayed for one night at the Marina Bay View Roomthe room was of decent size with balcony. Enjoyed the pool and spa facilities a lot! Breakfast spread was decent too, will be back in near future

title: Welcoming and good service.
desc: My second time staying here. Overall experience was pleasant and my family enjoyed their stay. Staff were friendly and provided us with good service. For the breakfast buffet, there was a variety of dishes. Definitely worth it.

title: Good hardware, room to improve software
desc: Second stay at this hotel and last year’s stay was way better than this year. Felt like there was a lack of warmth from staff and that service just wasn’t as 5 stars as we expect it to be. The hotel have done a fantastic job maintaining the hotel, but there’s much more to be done for the staff.

title: Bachelorette's party -- incredible service, location, view!!!
desc: My sisters threw me a bachelorette's surprise staycation at the Fullerton -- being able to stay in this iconic, beautiful heritage hotel was amazing, but what really impressed me was how well taken care of we were. My sisters told me that Shazwan from Fullerton went out of his way to make sure the surprise was well-orchestrated after they made the booking, and even after check-in, there were so many little surprises from the hotel that really demonstrated how considerate and attentive Shazwan was. It made the surprise staycation so memorable, and we had such a good time. Looking forward to coming back for another stay in the future!!

title: Lovely Hotel
desc: Wow! This hotel is amazing. If you believe in Fung Shui, I was told that everything here is according how the hotel is set up. The staircase alone is massive and beautiful. Different type of koi swim in the beautiful pond under the staircase. The washroom is so elegant. It is worth visiting this hotel if you’re in Singapore.

title: Great Short Staycation!
desc: It's a last minute booking for a long weekend in SG and to view the National Day Preview fireworks from our room for our 4 year old son. We booked a Straits Club Marina Bay View Room as that's one of the only option left in Trip.Com. Was actually looking at Marina Bay View with Balcony but unfortunately that room was sold out but nevertheless, it was an awesome staycation. We got access to the Straits Club for Champagne Breakfast, Afternoon Tea & Evening Canapés and we loved it especially my son. Check in was smooth and quick. My son got a free pass for a scoop of ice cream at Town Restaurant and a set of crayons and Fullerton colouring book! Front Desk who I didn't get his name said the room we assigned to doesn't have a full view of the Fireworks but its all good during the

title: Singapore Trip
desc: Can’t fault the hotel on accommodation and cleanliness excellent …only problem room service finishes at 11pm and you can’t get a coffee in the foyer after 5pm…breakfast was good only drawback was coffee is out of a machine so I asked for a fresh cup at the table which they did …

title: Outstanding service and professionalism
desc: Our family had started to stay in this hotel since 2015 every time we came to Singapore and most recently is on 11 of July 2022. The service is excellent and the staff are so nice, polite and professional especially full respect for their guests. The rooms are super clean and always look new to us and the entire property always smell so nice and fresh. They are so quick to fulfil your request every time we called room service and you always see the smiles on their faces. We would rate them 6 stars if I could if there is another star available to click on. If you have a late flight on the day, they are quite generous to allow you to check out late without any charges. We love it We definitely without a doubt will come back here again and again. We strongly recommend

title: Paradise in the city!
desc: Fast check in by staff into a beautiful room that is very comfortable with a fantastic view of Marina Bay Area. Bathroom is beautifully appointed and spacious. Housekeeper did a wonderful job of turning down the bed for my evening’s rest. The sun set and sun rise was spectacular as it gave a the Marina Bay Area. The reflection of lights on the Bay made it a wonderful sight! Staff at the Straits Club are very friendly and warm making it very homely with their casual talk and they offered advice on what to do during my stay. I liked the art work that are displayed around the hotel. A blend of local and modern pieces provided an interesting outlook. My room had heritages pieces that gave an interesting history about the buildings heritage. The lobby is well decorated as it

title: My Second Home
desc: Decided to book this hotel due to its proximity near my office at Raffles. Wasn't disappointed as from the point of arrival, during my staff of 7 days, it was faultless. I also enjoyed the service at the Straits Club and found all the staff at front office were friendly and help me oriented myseld and feel at home. The hotel has some strong heritage and history. Do visit the heritage trail and take the free tours when you can. The concierge will also be able to give you some great suggestions and recommendations of where to dine and have cocktails. It would be great if the management could arrange corporate shuttle services to key office areas within the business district. Lastly, please convey my appreciation to all your wonderful staffs from the Housekeeping, Front Desk

title: The best of the best! The food, the rooms, the service, the people, the location.
desc: It was our first time in Singapore and the Fullerton was the keystone in making the trip the most memorable of our lives and it defined what a 5 star experience should feel like. From the moment we walked in at dawn on the first day, the staff made us feel like special VIP guests. Rey in the restaurant was especially attentive. The hotel is spectacular from the moment you enter. We had a room overlooking the river with views of the city from our balcony on the 7th floor that I highly recommend. Sit outdoors for breakfast and enjoy a mimosa and a cool breeze before the heat gets intense. You can walk everywhere from the Fullerton, and it’s close (18 minute walk) to Marina Bay Sands, the Gardens at Marina Bay, and china town, so the location is ideal. The Fullerton has a rich

title: The Straits Club at The Fullerton is exceptional
desc: Extraordinary service and tranquility of The Straits Club makes our two recent stays an exceptional travel experience. The sanctuary of the Straits Club is created by the warm attentive and professional service of Nicholas, Siti, Crystal and Lucy. Check in and out is seamless and pleasant, early breakfasts with suburb omelette s and afternoons with a lazy class of champagne are features of our stay, and concierge service that arranged sought after dinner and car reservations are to be commended. The highest recommendation.

title: Blessed Birthday 2022 @Town Fullerton
desc: 3 years ago we had our simple wedding breakfast and short ROM at this very place. Tonight, I am celebrating my birthday and the staffs are as welcoming and warm as then. Service is top notch. Kind and helpful staffs. Would like to mention Heidi, the lady who helped us through the night. We can feel her patience and care the whole time. The chef was so kind to attend to our additional requests... And shout out to the Pinoy staffs, too! Hospitality is 💯! Overall a lovely night! Kudos to the team! Definitely ... recommended place to create memories. ❤️❤️❤️

title: Bday staycation !
desc: I celebrated my bday here since it's my first time all i can say is it's beyond my expectations . the room was so spacious very classy and nice view of the bay ! we had an amazing experience at the town restaurant special mention with this lovely staff Ms. cherry , hope, sir edgar and the rest of the team . They are very hospitable with a sweet smile despite of their business. they check on us time to time and giving an extra mile service to make sure that we have a great night with them . you make my birthday memorable 10 star for you all!! thank you so much .. ! definitely a good quality service is priceless ! will sure comeback again

title: Most amazing staycation
desc: We are soo thankful for the stay at Fullerton, everything was so well taken care of, and special shoutout to Shazwan who made the stay really pleasant because of his hospitality and sweet disposition ◡̈ My family really appreciated his attention to detail and it made our hotel stay my best one, hands down. Thank you ◡̈

title: Complement
desc: I will like to thank all the staff especilly samirah for excellent service and giving extra confortable bed, even though i only stayed for 1 night. Thanks for a good view room it was big and nice. I wil stay again if i can afford it. Thank you so much😃

title: First class accommodations
desc: From Antonio Renolayan, I had a wonderful experienced at Fullerton Hotel. I’ve stayed at several hotels in Singapore but this was on the top of the list of best stay experiences ever. They have a high quality room and high quality of service. The customer service was superb. Every staff member I encountered from reservation Mr. Valent , Director of Sales was so prompt to respond to my inquiry, the Valet, cleaning staff to the check in more importantly to Darshawn and Katie Joe who were delightful and eager to help. They went over and beyond to make my stay comfortable and enjoyable. Darshawn ensure I’m satisfied with my room and well being while I’m an in house guest. Please give him a staff award for exceptional customer service. In addition, Cristina at the daily breakfast

title: Holiday
desc: We have stayed at The Fullerton Hotel Singapore before and as much as we have enjoyed our stay before, this time was even better. The Hotel is historic and beautiful, the staff are amazing and friendly and the service is unequalled from our experience around the world. Special thanks to Chai yi, Nicholas, Ryan, Siti, Crystal and Zep at the Straits Club who went above and beyond to make our stay incredible. We now regard these people as our friends. Sall at the pool is always fantastic and all of professional and friendly staff at The Fullerton Hotel. We will definitely be back soon!! Mark Wright

title: Staycation
desc: Abigail, Bali Kumar and Ariel are very professional and friendly, they show passion at their work. We feel so welcoming and the experience in here is very pleasant and warm. Definitely will come again. Thank you!

title: Rare gem in the hotel!
desc: This is my second time staying in the hotel. I been greeted by Kate at the front desk with a smile. Even though my last stay was Jan last year, she recongise us and remember about our last visit. It feels like coming to a home. She ensure that the room has the best view and clean before handing the keys to us. The room was flawless with an amazing view. Her services is top notch perfect! Even during check out, i was served by another staff, she came to us and ask if everything is ok. She is definitely a gem of a hotel!

title: Singapore Holiday
desc: Another stay at The Fullerton Singapore, our 4th visit. It is always sad to leave the Fullerton because you feel so pampered during your stay. The staff are exceptional, friendly and never fail to go the extra mile to ensure that guests feel totally spoilt. The Fullerton is a classic colonial experience, centrally located and the perfect base to explore Singapore. My wife & I love escaping Australia’s cold winter and spending a week or so at the beautiful & friendly Fullerton Hotel in Singapore. We can’t wait to return :)

title: 21 year reunion! 5 star all the way ✨️
desc: Having spent many months working in Singapore and staying at the Fullerton, I can honestly say it's improved on greatness. We had a gorgeous view, stunning breakfast and Christine and her staff were impeccable. We even got to shower and rest before our 1am flight after checking out. While it's a lot to spend, you're worth it.

title: Excellence service!
desc: This is my first time staying in Fullerton Hotel. The services are excellence. The team at the lounge is so professional and caring :) Esp Nicholas - who remembered my meeting schedules and arranged for my breakfasts swiftly just to ensure that I have enough time for my meal and preparation for the meeting and also Crystal who gave me a memorable service - she gave me a scarf so that I won’t get cold, she remembered my favorite tea and always got me the perfect table (where the plugs are available) :)) Lastly, Juliet, the house keeping team, also saved my day by locating my missing Airpod case in the room. I literally didn’t expect that the hotel will find it (as I looked for it everywhere in the room (including the trash) lol). I really enjoyed and had a pleasant stay here.

title: Heritage building, great location
desc: Visited Singapore first time in August 22 post pandemic and stayed at this beautiful heritage hotel at the central location near financial district, While the external facade maintains its heritage character, it is quite modern internally. Had a smooth check in and check out experience, the rooms are large specious and have all the modern amenities The breakfast spread is excellent, the overall service levels are very good. The location of the hotel is excellent overlooking the Singapore river, with walking distance to financial district and Boat quay. The hotel is expensive and despite paying $ 400 we were given rooms on the internal side, overall if you like heritage building at central location it is great option in Singapore.

title: Impeccable Service
desc: This is our third time staying as a staycation hotel. We have always highly recommend this hotel to friends and family. A little hiccup at the start of this latest stay, but the senior duty manager Shazwan had promptly solved the issue and had even went the extra mile to provide a great memorable stay!

title: Best Experience Ever
desc: Had a refreshing solo staycation at the Fullerton Hotel in Aug 2022. It's perfectly located to see the amazing exhibitions and architecture in the Civic District as well as the wonderful eateries and view of the Marina Bay area all a stone's throw away. Do enjoy the free tours offered by the hotel to get an appreciation of the history and stories as well as a peek into their equally beautiful and historic sister hotel the Fullerton Bay Hotel. The room was immaculate and filled with luxurious details and concierge was thoughtful and courteous in providing information and help with reservations. Absolutely perfect experience.

title: Amazing experience at Fullerton hotel
desc: the room is so nice and the view outside the window is beautiful.And me and my friends spend some times at the pool over looking the view in the city its relaxing moment.we went to buffet for dinner and they have alot of delicious food to choose from.

title: Beautiful hotel in a great location.
desc: This was our second stay at the Fullerton Hotel. We love the old world charm of the hotel as well as the location being close to the river with lots of restaurants and raffles MRT station. All of the staff are extremely friendly and helpful making you feel right at home. A special mention must go to Sall around the pool. He always greets you with a smile and ice cold water and loves to have a chat with the guests. He is a real credit to the hotel. We stayed in a heritage room overlooking the marina. It was kept clean with plenty of towels. Maybe they could replenish the soaps etc a bit more regularly. We ate breakfast in the Town restaurant every morning and although the variety was fantastic the western style food was always cold, except for the freshly made eggs! It didn’t

title: Top notch property
desc: This is a truly high end property. I would recommend this place over MB Sands any day. Feels exclusive and does not have the swarms of tourists that you find across the bay. Very pleased with the room size and staff service.

title: What a luxurious hotel!
desc: What a luxurious hotel with historic features and classical beauty. This hotel will be the first and last classic moody hotel in this bustling city center. Esay to meet view of famous marinabay hotel at any angle within 5 min walk distance. The afternoon tea set was oppulent and accompanied by relaxing music .Great location, a walk away from trendy hotspots.

title: Luxurious stay!
desc: Hotel room was excellent, with stunning views of Marina Bay. We also had the Joyous menu at Jade Restaurant and the high tea at Courtyard Cafe, both of which were sumptuous. The service was great too. When we were having high tea, there was also a harpist playing, which added to the nice ambience.

title: Good service provide
desc: First time come visiting this new hotel’s buffet, enjoy a nice time spending with friends. Lewis provided a very good service, treat guests nice and friendly! The environment is good too, see you soon!

title: High tea
desc: We are serve by Mr. Lailikumar, he is very friendly and we are very happy to serve by him. We enjoy the high tea very well. The high tea set are well recommend. Thanks for the complimentary gift and birthday cake👏🏼

title: Pure luxury
desc: We love, love, love this beautiful and grand hotel! Our room was amazing with incredible views of Marina bay Sands and evening light show was something to behold! The food was incredible and particularly the breakfast !! I would visit again just to have the Bircher muesli which was my favourite and I wish I had asked for the recipe 😂. The staff were so helpful and kind and the man at the swimming pool( sorry cannot remember his name) but I would like to thank him for his kindness and love for Singapore! I loved chatting to him and he was so helpful making sure we had everything we needed, he was excellant! It was wonderful and I intriguing also discovering and learning about the history of this famous hotel We have visited Singapore many times but this was our first stay at

title: Truly the best service befitting this truly unforgettable stay!
desc: We had a very memorable stay at the Fullerton hotel. It is our first time staying at Fullerton and the great hospitality blew us away. Special mention to the Front Office Manager Darshan, who was very thoughtful to our needs during the stay, he was so kind to bring us around and his warm welcome and hospitality made us feel right at home. Darshan also brought us to the Straits Club where we had a taste of the lovely selection of delectables available at the Straits Club. The staff that were at the Straits Club, Jared, Crystal, Siti and Nicholas were especially warm and pleasant. Jared and Crystal recommended the best teas and checked on us throughout. The warm reception we received really left an impression on us. Thanks to all for making our stay so awesome! Everyone at the

title: Excellent service and staff saved me from misunderstanding this famous hotel (bez of my own stupid mistake)
desc: Simply fall in love immediately after entering this famous Fullerton Building at the center of the city! Every corner is full of history!!! The staff are very nice and helpful! They first surprise us by arranging special decoration inside the room (I only mentioned to the hotel restaurant that my afternoon tea is for celebrating our anniversary but I didn’t tell the room reservation!) with two lovely bears holding the balloons (and we can take them HOME!!!!) There is complimentary update and the room is clean, capacious and comfy! Thanks Kate, front desk staff, for helping me assisting me to finish an urgent document at work by printing the document hard copy for me and guide me for postage back to Hong Kong ! Excellent service. I MUST thanks Albert in the Courtyard at the

title: Great hotel and wonderful staff
desc: Great hospitality and service from the Fullerton hotel staff gives us a very memorable stay at the hotel. It starts from the Guest Relations desk when we arrive, it's a warm welcome from Kate Joe, she was very helpful and friendly, and even brought us up to the Straits Club to have our afternoon tea. Ms Sungeetha, hotel Guest Relations officer, was very thoughtful and caring, she took care of our meals at the Straits Club, really touched and appreciate. The food has a good mix of fusion and nostalgic local snacks, thus making our dinning an enjoyable and wonderful experience. The staff that were at the Strait's Club, Jared and Nicholas Wong are very pleasant and proactive, they recommended several good drinks and best teas which we have not tried before and also the Laksa and

title: The Fullerton Hotel Singapore
desc: We are delighted to thank Mr Joshua Chua & team members for excellent services for smooth and speedy checkin on 20 Aug 2022 and checking out on 21 Aug 2022 was a breeze. We have a very comfortable stay and will not hesitate to recommend this hotel to friends. Ms Tan & Mr Sim.

title: Staycation at The Fullerton
desc: My teen daughter and I booked a one night’s girls’ staycation just to chill. Upon arrival we were greeted personally and after an express check-in we were shown to our room which had a stunning view of the Singapore River (it was even better at night!). The reception staff Lucy proceeded to book our afternoon tea at The Courtyard for us and the offerings were delicious! We decided to stay in and binge watch movies and had in-room dining which was also served promptly and the pasta was done excellently. The next morning we headed to the buffet breakfast which offered a huge variety of both local and continental food - we only wished we had bigger appetites! All in all it was a lovely experience with personal touches from a wonderful team of staff (led by Mr Gino Tan) who were

title: Stay cation at Fullerton Hotel
desc: We would like to thank Lucy from Straits Club Privileges for her kind thought to give a special gift to my grand son. Also would like to say thank you to Ryan Ng who is friendly and kind when we had afternoon tea at Strait Club lounge.

title: Amazing accommodation
desc: Thank you Darshan, Lucy & Nicolas who gave us a pleasant surprise for our anniversary. Really touched and appreciate it! Staff are friendly and attentive. Amazing view. Buffet variety was a spread. Recommend for any occasion!

title: Martyn Phillips
desc: Good place to stay lovely surroundings. Great helpful staff and particularly in the Straits Club Jared great employee and most helpful. Close to some great eating places and attractions. Easy walk to Subway. Hotel is very clean and tidy. Masks have to be worn rhroughout except for eating and drinking . If I stay again I will request a room with a view as I had a high walled enclosed balcony with no view except high rises in the air.

title: Wedding Banquet
desc: Hi Fullerton Hotel Team,  I would like to compliment the excellent service that was rendered by Miss Zahera and Mr Ragu.  We held our wedding dinner banquet at Fullerton Hotel on 6th Aug 2022.  My special thanks to Zahera for taking the time to listen to all our requests during the pre event and making sure that all our expectations were met. And I mean 'all' of it really. She has shown excellent service in ensuring that all our expectations are met even to the smallest details. Her timely response and updates were greatly appreciated.  Not forgetting our amazing Mr Ragu. he has done awesome in ensuring that the event went smoothly. He was pleasant and willingly customized our last minute requests without batting an eye. It was reassuring just speaking to him. Both Miss

title: A brief but extremely memorable staycation
desc: My wife and I experienced our first staycation at the Fullerton Hotel recently. The entire Fullerton team made our stay a very memorable one. My deepest appreciation to the team at the Straits Club - Nicholas, Siti, Jared and Ryan - for making us feel so at home and encouraging us to sample the excellent spread served at the club. Ironically, we were a short distance away from our offices - but the tranquility of the room allowed us to disconnect from the hectic work life and enjoy a different perspective of the Raffles Place area! Special thanks goes to Nicholas - Robby made my day - he now sits proudly in my study at home.

title: Love this hotel!
desc: Everything about this hotel experience was 7 Stars, from the assistance by Warren at reception through to the wait staff in the restaurant- we could not have improved on anything - lots of unique little touches which added to the experience

title: Helpful staff with great attitude!
desc: A staff named Chandra was quick on his feet, upon seeing me with bulky baggage, hurried to help lessen my load, and assist me to book a taxi. Ask to leave on floor but he Insisted on carrying my baggage.

title: Fantastic stay
desc: Very happy with our hotel stay. This is our second time to stay our anniversary ❤ All the staff were very attentive and provided very great level service. We will definitely return again! Thank you for making our stay so memorable.

title: Compliment For Mr. Shazwan (Senior Front Desk Manager)
desc: Dear Fullerton Hotel, We would like to express our thanks and appreciation for the service and care we received at your hotel from 10th to 13th August 2022. I was there for 3 nights with my family and for all these days I was attended with utmost warmth. I was impressed to see the prompt room service despite the peak season. To senior front desk manager Shazwan, who has been nothing short of phenomenal. He is warm, friendly & professional. The genuine smile on his face when we moved into the presidential suite express his true interest in wanting us to be happy! I would like to express my most sincere thanks once again to Shazwan for making my 40th such a memorable one. He went extreme miles to ensure the party was a successful one! Shazwan, continue to shine and to be

title: National Day 🍾
desc: Stayed at the Fullerton Suite for National Day preview. The suite was huge and gorgeous. Taking this opportunity to thank the outstanding team members such as Joshua Liu, Lisa and Kate from reception who had helped to make check in and out as seemless as possible. The staff from Straits Club were also very prompt and provided exceptional service. They also took note of our preferences very well. Thank you Nicholas, Siti, Lucy, Jared. Housekeeping was also very prompt in responding to our requests. Kar Wei, Mike and Simon were very professional and assisted us in their best way possible. Thank you Fullerton for the great memories formed.

title: Cordial and Satisfying Service
desc: Have been received by warm and friendly staffs at The Fullerton Hotel and is especially impressed by the service provided at the guest lounges. My partner and I were served by Crystal, Ryan and Marcel who have all been helpful and courteous the entire time we were there. Crystal was very knowledgeable about the hotel and surrounding areas which helped us in finding our way to MBS. While the atmosphere and beverages served at the lounge were wonderful, the food, however, was slightly bland for me but was alright for my partner. Given the chance again, I would come back for another stay.

title: Fullerton full of Fun
desc: We were apprehensive about our staycation at the hotel because there were 5 of us. Two adults and 3 kids. It’s hard to be discreet with such a large troop but Darshan (the front office manager) on duty and his team were ever so ready to make us feel right at home with ice cream, plush toys and colouring book for our kids. When we went for dinner later that evening, the kids were famished after their swim. We told the staff on duty to prepare something that was not on the menu as our daughter is a fussy eater. To our surprise they did as we asked and my daughter enjoyed her meal thoroughly. On the whole this was a great getaway and the staff who were ever so friendly played a monumental part in making our stay at the Fullerton an epic one.

title: Amazing service at an amazing place
desc: Spent a night at the Fullerton Hotel on National Day to celebrate an occasion with my partner. We were absolutely impressed from pre-arrival till departure. The staff were extremely thoughtful, alert, and friendly. Impeccable service rendered from the first inquiry I made to the hotel. The room was clean, view was amazing, and have promised my partner to be back. The room was exceptionally cosy, and you could immediately feel like home from the very first step you take when you enter the room. Overall, we were both very satisfied with the cleanliness of the room, and more importantly, all the service crew that attended to us. You all have been amazing, which made our celebration a memorable one.

title: Went to Fullerton Hotel at Singapore
desc: We went there for short stay. We meet one waiter name Ryan. He quite nice & friendly guy. He quite a charming guy we like him to serve us. Fullerton hotel we went for twice. We love the hotel services. All front desk to housekeeping. They very polite. Amazing services that I had said. Keep it up Fullerton. Well done!!

title: Location and rooms are superior
desc: We stayed twice in week in two seperate bookings. Our rooms where renovated and had views out over the bay. Room service was amazing and suited our palates after both flights where delayed. Our third night was a disaster, due to the airline cancelling our flight. The issue being we had to take the last room that seemed to be available, it was hot and unrenovated on level 4. Sadly the hotel was fully booked due to the Grand Prix lead up. The room was oversized and a window which if you stood on a chair it has a view. We just couldn’t resist to take a photo as my husband is ‘6.4’. Overall we liked our stay but the last night stay was substandard for the price tag. The stand out team member was Chandra at the door who helped with our room swap and front door.

title: Fantastic Hotel!!
desc: Amazing hotel with amazing service! Checkin was flawless and the room was well appointed. No refreshing needed in the room as everything was neat, clean, and not showing any signs of wear and tear. Mini bar and snacks were great. For breakfast, the cafe in the lobby was good. No complaints whatsoever ever. If you are looking for old world charm with newer amenities, this is the place to stay. For guests, two things to consider, there isn’t a hotel “gift” shop so if you need meds, drinks, snacks, there is a 24 Hr 7-11 less than 10min walk. Also, I did have a terrible experience at the Spa, but not holding that against the hotel given it is separate. Be very careful when booking any service with the spa. Never again!

title: Staff
desc: Chandra was very nice and his services were great. Excellent at his job. He offered to call taxis every time be saw us in the lobby and all the other staff had great recommendations as well. Cleaning services are excellent no need to worry.

title: Fabulous position and beautiful rooms
desc: This was a lovely hotel and very well positioned in Singapore. We stayed in a gorgeous suite with lovely amenities. I’ve given it 4 stars instead of 5 but only for one reason and I understood completely why there was an issue. There was no bar in the hotel to come back and have a drink in after dinner and we couldn’t get a cocktail pre dinner. This was peculiar for a five star hotel of this size. We asked a member of staff why the bar was closed and they explained that they were struggling to get enough staff post-covid so couldn’t open the bar. This is understandable in the circumstances but perhaps they could have deployed one or two members of staff from other areas or suggested we get a drink from the restaurant. It was only 9.30pm so it’s not as if we were looking to stay

title: Nice but forgettable
desc: It was a pleasant stay with our kids but nothing very memorable. The kids love the bed and bath tub, the tv channels and the breakfast spread like any other hotels. There isn't much activities for kids but this isn't a family friendly hotel to begin with. But our request for a small cake to celebrate their belated birthday wasn't attended to, even after asking about it twice. We learnt from friends that kids usually receive a mini Fullerton Bear during check-in and requested for 1 during check out but was turned down by being ignored by the concierge. It would have been a nice stay for couples but not for family. Probably won't come again.

title: Super Hotel with a few niggles
desc: On early arrival on a very damp September morning with high expectations we were slightly deflated not to get an immediate early check in but this was tempered by the coffee and cake provided by a very kind staff member. We were allocated our room at 10.30 and had to pay a £660 pre authorisation that I felt was a little unreasonable . However that was the downside as the remainder of our stay was memorable. Our room was luxurious and had super views of the Quay and every item one wished for was to hand. The concierge even provided umbrellas. The breakfast buffet was excellent and the whole team worked extremely hard. This is an outstanding hotel and there were niggles such as being told there were no tables available in Jade but to return a couple of hours later (looking much

title: Decent short stay, worth the money with great view from the hotel
desc: I would say one of the best 5 star hotels located in the Central District. Easily accessible via public transport. Possibly the best breakfast of any Hotel, surrounded by restaurants and the quay. I had a decent stay recently, been here twice last time few years back before covid, I realized that the room has been refurbished to have a newer feel yet still keep the majestic heritage charm which was indeed great. The hotel has rich history, no hassle check in and check out experience.. gives a feel of royalty with the kind of ambience it creates..and well appointed rooms, not forgetting, a comfortable modern outdoor pool. The service is excellent and the staff are very professional, friendly and helpful. Free parking for restaurant diners and guests. Only thing is that more meal

title: Excellent customer service and just a beautiful grand hotel!
desc: The Fullerton is a Grand hotel. The building is stunning, and in a great location. The bay view rooms are extraordinary and the customer service is excellent. In particular, Chandra was on top of every detail and made sure not only that we felt special, but well looked after while my husband and I were out and about. Thanks Chandra and the whole team.

title: Luxury overlooking the bay
desc: We loved the service and room at this hotel which is conveniently located to the train. We had a small balcony that overlooked the bay. The room was quiet, well appointed, and very comfortable. The pool was small so we skipped using it. The Town restaurant had a good breakfast buffet.

title: Great 3 nights stay - Straits Club
desc: Had an excellent stay in at the Fullerton for 3 nights in September, we enjoyed Straits club breakfast afternoon tea and evening cocktails and canapés! Crystal and Ryan were wonderful and very attentive throughout our stay - we can’t wait to come back with family at Easter time next year!

title: Daughter's 22nd Birthday
desc: My family staycation at the Palladian Suite is satisfactory. The staff are commendable and Strait Club privileges are excellent! We dined well at Town Restaurant & Courtyard ; Mr Kumar Duty Mgr at the latter went out of his way to wrap up our staycation with distinction by accommodating to our needs. The SPA was excellent too. An improvement to make is to ensure room amenities prepared for the number of registered adults upon check in. I wasted time requesting for the third of everything (slipper, bath robe & towel, tooth brush etc) for my family of 3 despite the same request made at reservation. I am open to visiting The Fullerton again!

title: Fullerton Singapore
desc: We have been to Singapore many times and really love the place. This time we treated ourselves to the Fullerton as on our other visits we would always come here for coffee. Our room was beautiful and comfortable and housekeeping were very good. We would like to give special thanks to Crystal, Ryan, Siti, Zep, Chiayi and Nicholas for their wonderful service in the Straits Cluba d of course the chef for the great food. The atmosphere there was very relaxing and friendly. Would definitely recommend a stay at this beautiful Hotel.

title: From Sabah, Malaysia
desc: Superb facilities, comfortable room and strategic location. Concierge service specially Chandra was awesome from guide to check in counters, introduced all the function in the room to carrying the luggages and bags with smile and care plus looking out for the cab while I sit back and rest. Well done

title: Fabulous stay with family
desc: My first stay at The Fullerton Hotel and I’m deeply impressed by the service, cleanliness and everything! Checkin was seamless and quick, and receptionist is considerate to ask me if my child is allowed ice cream before offering my 4 years old a name tag with lanyard (entitles her for 2 rounds of ice cream), crayons and activity book. My girl broke her crayons and was upset, and the receptionist happily offered her a new set together with the activity book much to her delight. When I called for a ‘flat’ pillow for my child, we were given a child pillow instead (which is exactly what we wished for), and we didn’t have to wait long for them to come over too. And impressively, we were greeted when we called for service. Wifi was speedy, although we don’t really need it. The

title: Fullerton Suite with family of four
desc: We booked a 1 night weekday staycation at the Fullerton for our family of four. The hotel is beautifully presented and the lobby staff are helpful and friendly. Check in was quick and easy. We received a upgraded suite on arrival (we were not told it was an upgrade at the desk but from the website pictures it looked like the Fullerton Suite). The suite had an very big balcony and a view onto the river and partially onto the bay/mbs. The main bed is very comfortable and my kids slept well on the sofa bed and additional roll out. The service at the straits club was excellent and i particularly want to commend Crystal and Ryan for their attentiveness and level of service. Tip for the club level: check-in is at 3pm but first seating for afternoon tea is 1:30-3pm so if you wanted to

title: Nice historic hotel. walking distance to tourist, business district and food area, expect nonhalal kitchen but can request halal
desc: A well maintained historic hotel in the heart of Singapore. We stayed here as a family of 4, driven all the way from Kuala Lumpur, the concierge were helpful and frontdesk made me felt that checkin is so effortless. When you arrived at the main entrance, a nice ambiance of serenity and friendliness greeted you. Among the few hotels I've stayed before with nice scent in the air. The breakfast was scrumptious, although the kitchen was not Halal certified. We opted mostly on vegetarian and seafoods, which still have a good range of selection. Kids were thrilled to be given colouring kits and free scoop of ice cream. Price wise a bit pricey, but then again I think it was the standard price for its class. The pool on the other hand was a bit small or nothing too fancy for kids to

title: Great location and grand hotel
desc: Stayed for 5 nights in a premier courtyard room. Room was refurbished. Bathroom was huge by Singapore hotel standards. I kept the curtains closed most of the time. I picked the Fullerton because I like hotels that have character. A lot of 5 star hotels in my opinion are soulless and the same. The location was fabulous for the things that interest me. Being so close to the Merlion and waterways was great. The train station is so close as well. The staff that stood out for me were the concierge and front door man. Sharing tips on quickest transportation routes etc. Breakfast was plentiful but I do wish it went to 11am instead of 10:30am. I like to sleep in on holidays. I was able to use facilities after check out such as showering which is extremely helpful when flights are late

title: Fullerton Hotel
desc: Lalikumar is of great service and friendly . Have a great day and enjoy ourselves here. Nice music and nice ambience. Good place to enjoy with friends and family. ........Thanks alot....................

title: Best for everything.
desc: Stay in Quay Room at 7th floor. Beautifull view from balcony (but I have to climb the chair for the best view). We can see the two legendary bridges, Boat Quay, Asian Civilitation Museum, Parlement House, Raffles Statue, UOB tower etc. Beautifull view from swimming pool. And thank you for Sall (pool guard) , you are a good man, give me some information about everything. The food, cakes are very delicious. The lunch buffet was so great. I love it. Thank you for give a slice cake for my husband (birthday slice cake). I love the herritage walk tour. Thank you for Linda, you are the good herritage tour guide. Will be back again for sure.

title: The best honeymoon start
desc: What a stunning hotel! The staff couldn’t have done more to help us. Our room was beautiful and the bathroom was huge! Such a lovely touch being given a delicious cake to celebrate our honeymoon. The location is fantastic- walking distance to Fullerton bay and the embankment overlooking Marina Bay Sands. The breakfast was unbelievable- we had it once as it’s quite a hefty cost, but well worth it. If we return to Singapore (which we hope to do as we loved it), we will be sure to stay here.

title: Wonderful staycation!
desc: The holistic service provided by Fullerton hotel was nothing short of perfect. From the restaurant (Courtyard) to the in-room dining service, you could tell that their staff were trained very well as it’s reflected in the impeccable service provided to me during my short stay there. Special mention to Lalikumar (pardon if the spelling is off) from the Courtyard. His attention to detail was highly commendable. Knowing that my family and I have certain dietary restriction, he went beyond his duty to cater to us by substituting the item in our high tea set. All and all, thank you for the awesome stay and I look forward to another superb staycation at the Fullerton hotel, hopefully in the near future ☺️.

title: If you want the best hotel in Singapore, this is it
desc: We have stayed at The Fullerton a number of times previously. Never disappointed. It is truly a fabulous hotel in every aspect. This time we stayed 9 days. Our room was very clean and comfortable with great views out over Marina Bay. The bathroom was spotless, had lots of space and amenities. Our room was on the same floor as the Straits Club, so access was easy. Nicholas, Siti and the Team at the Straits Club were as usual proactive, attentive and extremely helpful. Food and drinks were high quality and very tempting. Ryan, Chia Yi, Crystal and Zep provided exceptional service. They made our stay most enjoyable. We took the Fullerton Heritage Tour this time. Bill the tour guide was very knowledgeable. The tour brought back wonderful memories for us, as we used to post letters

title: Great location and decor. Terrible service.
desc: Came to The Fullerton Hotel Singapore for a business conference. The location is convenient and decor is immaculate. Would love visit this location again. However, the service staff can be quite unhelpful, preferring to tell you "I don't know" instead of giving some assistance - I was trying to find a charging port for work and one of their wall ports was not working. I tried look around the lobby and instead of directing my to any functioning ports, preferred to tell me that I am not allow to sit at this or that location. Not sure if this is the kind of service I would like to bring my clients to. I think Pan Pacific would have been a better choice.

title: Amazing Hotel!
desc: First time ever visiting Fullerton Hotel Singapore last week. was in awe, very beautiful and super clean rooms, very friendly staff, the breakfast buffet was out of this world! They even had a piece of birthday cake for me at my arrival of in my room..so thoughtful! I hope on my next visit to Singapore, i can stay there again, very recommendable!

title: Fullerton Hotel
desc: Lovely hi-tea set. Live entertainment with wonderful harp performance with movie and Disney soundtracks We were happy to be served by Mr Lalikumar. The hi-tea were exquisite and delicious with variety of tea and coffee choices.

title: Fullerton Singapore
desc: Lovely hotel. Pleasant staff. Comfortable rooms and very clean and well maintained. One of the best breakfast buffets in Singapore. The breakfast buffet had an enormous variety of food and beverage selections. High quality choices and great service. Will definitely come back especially the breakfast buffet.

title: Gorgeous views
desc: Room and view were great! There was a good blend of its heritage while still keeping it modern. Lots of space. Could do with more non pork options for food. We were staying at Fullerton Bay Hotel, in the Bay View Room.

title: Home away from Home
desc: Indeed one of Singapore’s finest. Thank you for being consistent in delivering excellent service and guest experiences throughout my stay. From the team in Town to the Housekeeping and Room Service team — I give you my heartfelt thanks and kudos. This will be my home for both my business and leisure trips whenever I am in town.

title: Trip of a lifetime
desc: I cannot rate the Fullerton Hotel highly enough. The staff are wonderful and the decor and rooms are first class. I would also rate the guided tours with Bill as a must both at the Fullerton and the Fullerton Bay a real insight into early Singapore and how it has grown from very humble beginnings

title: Our hotel stay at The Fullerton was superb Cunard Queen Elizabeth
desc: The staff were all amazing in-house & front desk , & Zian was so helpful. The whole experience staying in this majestic place was so wonderful. Art Deco is my favourite architecture so I couldn’t have been happier. A big THANK YOU!

title: Excellent service and wonderful stay
desc: We stayed in fullerton hotel for our wedding anniversary. We chose to stay in palladium suite with club access. The room was clean and spacious. The staffs here were friendly and especially I have to compliment one staff named Chandra who served us at the club access lounge. He was attentive and very helpful and polite. The excellent service makes our anniversary extra special. Thank you Chandra for making our stay a good and memorable one! We will definitely be back again for the excellent service!

title: Amazing hotel!
desc: The hotel was amazing. Staff was attentive and excellent. Location perfect. Rooms were large and beautifully finished. Bathrooms were clean with separate tub and shower. Amazing toilet and lots of amenities. We had tea which was delicious and dinner the salmon was cooked perfectly. No complains only complements.

title: My opinion about Fullerton hotel of Singapore
desc: The room is the most impressive part of this hotel in my opinion. It is very spacious, big. Not to mention the humongous bathroom with a bathtub accompanied with a shower and an automatic toilet. I feel like a million bucks every-time I enter. The bed is like a cloud, fell asleep like a baby. However I do wish that the breakfast should change it up every now and then. It’s the same types of food every morning. So a little bit of experimentation, diversity in terms of food would be nice. Otherwise, a very lovely, beautifully decorated and welcoming place. The staff is very kind and willing to help you whenever needed.

title: Exceeded Expectations
desc: Everything about this hotel exceeded our expectations. From the check-in to breakfast to the concierge to check out. The location of the hotel is super. It is very central and walking to Chinatown and along the Singapore River is no problem at all. The concierge desk assisted us with several recommendations and they were spot on. The staff at the town restaurant for breakfast went above and beyond. One morning I requested avocado toast, and they did not have any avocados. Approximately 20 minutes later, the staff returns, saying that the chef found it avocado in the basement! I would not hesitate to stay at this hotel again.

title: This hotel is the peak of luxury in Singapore!
desc: Spent three nights here as a stopover returning from Europe to Australia. Booked an esplanade view for a family of four and wow.... was not expecting it to be so amazing. Everything was perfect, from a very friendly and quick check-in process to the amenities in the room. A fantastic bluetooth speaker and an out of this world toilet that has to be seen to be believed (yes.... it is that good!). My children were so well accommodated too. Little welcoming gifts and a scoop of ice cream each day just added to the experience. My son is autistic and often has odd behaviours but the staff treated him with kindness and respect. The breakfast buffet is incredible and well worth the cost - overlooking the Singapore river and the fountains outside. The variety is incredible and has

title: First class, luxury hotel
desc: Beautiful hotel with impeccable service. Set within a historic and iconic building, the hotel looks fantastic inside and out. As you would expect, the interior spaces, including lobby, bars and restaurants are impressive, modern and sophisticated places, exuding an air of class and quality. Staff are helpful, friendly and consumately professional, resulting in great personal service throughout. Well located, close to Marina Bay and other attractions. It is also worth a stroll along Boat Key to Clarke Key to sample the many bars and restaurants in the area. My bedroom and bathroom were spacious, well appointed, decorated and furnished to a high standard, making it feel relaxing and very comfortable. The breakfast in the main restaurant was excellent, with a huge choice of hot

title: Bad value for money
desc: Unpersonal, unfriendly and boring hotel. In spite of the hotel not being fully booked, I got an really bad room with wiev towards a corridor where everybody walking by could look in. Not interested in heloing out, giving advice

title: Part of Singapore's History
desc: If you appreciate history and culture I would recommend a visit to The Fullerton Building. The Fullerton Building was opened in 1928 and named after Robert Fullerton, who was the 1st Governor of the Straights Settlements. The building originally had five founding tenants: the General Post Office, The Exchange, Singapore Club, the Marine Department, and the Import and Export Department. The building is currently used as a hotel and has a small museum with in, where I learned quite a lot of Singapores history.

title: Could be so much more
desc: There are a lot going for Fullerton and I really like it but fixable issues are preventing it from achieving a higher review. Its strength: 1) location is fabulous; it has easy access to many attractions. The Merlion is just across the road, Boat Quay and Lau Pa Sat are a stone's throw away and the subway is steps away and brings you to many places. Even Sentosa is within easy reach from the Fullerton. I do believe it has the best location in Singapore. 2) it has a great view of Marina Bay Sands from the room if you get the bay view rooms. I love the river view as much if the pool area is any indication. I had also stayed in Ritz Carlton and Mandarin Oriental which have fantastic views too but Fullerton has an addition river view of the quay side. 3) beautiful historic building

title: it was great!
desc: Words don’t do this place justice, enjoyed every minute of our stay here. We booked the Heritage bay view room with club access.. Food and service great – wi-fi great, beds and facilities just great ! Oh and did I say it was Great!

title: birthday celebration
desc: i so loved this place very accommodating friendly staff and good service 2 thumbs up👍👍plus the view to kill of time singapore river so nice😍 amazing selection of food breakfast western and oriental for me that is heaven 😍😍

title: Fullerton is the best
desc: Amazing experience. Stunning location. Very comfortable room. Beautiful pool and great food. A hotel with a lot of history! We spent 10 days, the only feedback is that they can have some different varieties in breakfast every day

title: Home in the heart of singapore
desc: It was a great feeling to be in a historical hotel. And be back in singapore! Staff were all friendly and accommodative to our requests. We took the bay room hotel and got to watch the marina bay light show every night!

title: Perfect hotel
desc: Very nice hotel, nice view, perfect hospitality, awesome staff especially senior duty manager mr andrew yip very helpfull nice person, for those people who wanted to stay this hotel, please find mr andrew, he will give perfect hospitality, and willing to fulfill your needs. Im sure will come again n stay here.

title: Memorable weekend for family
desc: I had a wonderful experience at The Fullerton Hotel. Amazing location and my room is facing Marina Bay with a balcony. The rooms were clean, very comfortable, and the staff was very helpful. I highly recommend this hotel for anyone visiting downtown.

title: Incredible building and service…
desc: …which made staying here such a treat for our first night in Singapore! The conversion job done here from governmental buildings to luxury hotel is incredible and it still all looks fantastic. The swimming pool has a wonderful view to make up for the limited space and all the members of staff were really helpful and friendly, especially the door staff. Even the choice of art work in our room and on our corridor was perfect! I wish we had stayed longer…

title: Incredible F1 Weekend
desc: We had a wonderful stay for F1 Weekend Newly renovated room with balcony overlooking Turn 13 and the whole of Marina Bay. Attentive staff, and excellent food. The pool deck has great views over Singapore river and downtown. Huge thanks to Terry and team for giving us an amazing weekend of memories.

title: A hotel that must visit in Singapore
desc: We visited the hotel during weekdays. Very elegant hotel. Clean and comfortable room. Breakfast service was good and we had a nice dinner in the hotel restaurant, Jade. Hotel staff are all friendly especially Shazwan from front desk has been very polite and helpful. Definitely will visit the hotel again and recommend to my friends.

title: the best hoytel ever highly recommand
desc: Make sure to go to Singapore, please must go The Fullerton Hotel! I strongly recommend it. I stayed here for two days to celebrate my mom's birthday. I was moved by the special experience and fantastic service. Especially Kate Joe is a very good hotelier! Thank you very much. She said it's the best hotel she's ever been to I'm so happy. It's an unforgettable trip.

title: Wow wow wow!
desc: Greetings from KL!, I received nothing but top notch service to summarize my 3 nights at this magnificent building! It was also the best time to stay there as it coincided with the F1!...Not only was the building and rooms in great state of condition, the staff at all levels, from the lobby to the rooms were immaculate. A few staff stood out above the rest mainly Zain at the concierge, Victor at the lobby and Jurianah at the front desk! All in all it was a memorable stay for all of us. You are now assured of a loyal hotel guests.

title: Nice food Nice hotel with excellent location
desc: Was with my friends having dinner in their chinese restaurant Jade. Their staff provide excellent service and one Thing that is a must to mention is their food!! Super delicious!! We ordered few dishes and all are very yummy, especially their Signature Pecking Duck, if you are a food lover, you shouldn’t miss this signature dish of theirs. Definitely will dine in again!

title: Great dining experience at Jade
desc: Highly recommend of the Chinese cuisine Jade. Love the great dining hall,ambience, food and staffing all excellent. Char Siew will be the dish that you don't want to missed. tastes better than expected.

title: Excellent service at Fullerton Hotel Singapore
desc: Excellent, professional and friendly service. Especially Mr Valent Tan, Joshua and Zep. Superb location and outstanding facilities. Easy access to attractions and amenities. Good security and traffic control. Beautiful decorations according to the different festivities of Singapore.

title: Excellent place to stay(M.JaNe)
desc: M.JaNe The amenities is very good and the staff are all very hospitable during our stay,we all love the food and the place is very hygienic.my kids even want to stay at the pool for the whole time..we will surely be back very soon🤍will give them a five⭐

title: A beautiful hotel with heritage vibe, and professional hotelier.
desc: I've arranged 9 vip guests to stay at Fullerton hotel during their 5 day business trip to Singapore. Whenever we've made some special requests, hotel director Mr.Tan always handled and accommodated the requests kindly and professionally. The building itself has quite a charm of heritage building, and room is nice after renovation. The colonial deisgn of the buildings and room has an European sense and Singaporean feel together, so it has a unique charm of the Fullerton hotel.

title: Fantastic Hotel
desc: If you've booked here, you've made the right choice. stunning hotel and staff. Wait till you try their breakfasts. Simply the best hotel I've ever stayed in, we were lucky to have the Esplanade room. One word of warning there's a restaurant a stones throw from the hotel on the Quay side called Harvest Seafood, avoid at all costs.

title: Dr
desc: Excellent service by Aaron and Hafiz at the Concierge desk. Aaron was very persistent in ensuring our flying tickets are in good order. He took hours to clarify issues. And Hafiz took care of our local trips to various places. We highly commend both for unbeatable service. Thank you.

title: Iconic building but not very welcoming
desc: Stayed here in November for a couple of nights. The building is undoubtedly impressive, it is in a great location and the rooms have everything you would expect of a hotel of this price. It is however very much set up for the business market. The breakfast is buffet style and you can expect to be kept waiting while walk ins get tables for meetings. Overall the hotel lacks some of the service ethic that can reasonably be expected at this price.

title: Best hotel, will return
desc: Our expectations were constantly exceeded during our 3 weeks at The Fullerton. The service was excellent throughout and in every department: housekeeping, restaurants, food and waitering, Straits Club, reception and concierge. Service was always attentive, uncomplaining and polite. The Fullerton has pitched its service level and style well, not over attentive but completely responsive. I cannot say enough how impressed my wife and I were. Singapore offers a fantastic choice of hotels but the riverside location of The Fullerton is unbeatable, with riverside seating in its Town Restaurant and swimming pool above, with views across the river and also beyond Marina Bay, of some of the best sights of Singapore city, from its most central location. The hotel inhabits an old and

title: Fantastic 5 star hotel
desc: This is probably one of the best hotels we have stayed in,it's not the cheapest but we'll worth the extra.Our room was upgraded and was spotlessly clean with great views across the bay.The hotel is in a great central location with many bars and restaurants within easy walking distance. All the staff were polite and friendly and nothing was too much trouble which made our 2 night stay unforgettable.We will definitely return.

title: Fantastic Hotel, great location and service, breafkast needs help
desc: Service, Hotel, and Room have been great. Super good service, clean, amenities, and everything is as you expect it from a hotel of this category. The location is fantastic both for leisure and business. The only part which I think needs some help is the breakfast buffet. Both the service has been mixed (Saturday insufficient staff (but Sunday was ok), fresh fruit is good, but breads, coffee, etc. aren't good - ended up going to the near by Starbucks for coffee (yes, yes). Yet, I would recommend the place and just look for a good place near by for a breakfast.

title: Beautiful Hotel
desc: Beautiful hotel, steeped in history, in very central location plus very close to metro (MRT) station. Staff very pleasant and friendly, which definitely enhanced the experience. Great choice of breakfast options.

title: Home away from home
desc: I had the privilege of staying at the Fullerton Hotel for 6 weeks when I moved to Singapore. With its downtown central location , I was able to explore my new found home and it’s surroundings. Mr. Valent Tan , my customer advisor, and the professional staff of the hotel went above a beyond my service expectations and ensured my stay was perfect. I once again had the opportunity of staying in the hotel over night on Jan 16th and again, felt the warm welcome and hospitality of Valent and his team. I strongly recommend if you come to Singapore, stay in the iconic Fullerton Hotel. Erik Vandegrift

title: Great concierge
desc: The concierge at The Fullerton Singapore were 5 stars. My son and I were passing through Singapore and were looking for a nice vantage point to see the city skyline early in the morning before MBS was open. The concierge duo couldn't have been more helpful. Thank you!

title: Wonderful
desc: Attention to detail, quick response, service with a smile - these are just a few examples of the wonderful experience we had with the staff at the Fullerton Hotel. We were greeted with a beautifully decorated room, and surprised with wine and cake during the turn down service - they must have remembered that I mentioned during reservations that we were celebrating our wedding anniversary. Special thank you to the duty manager Revathy, who acknowledged and wished us when we returned from dinner. You are leading a fantastic team! The Fullerton Hotel has exceeded expectations both in hardware and software, indeed a memorable stay.

title: Old world charm
desc: Will definitely return in the near future thank you Fullerton for a sensational way to celebrate my birthday Such a beautiful elegant hotel excellent five star accommodation and wonderful staff great location within walking distance to everything

title: Wonderful stay at the Fullerton
desc: Very pleasant stay in this very central hotel. Excellent central location, and I was able to have the excellent buffet breakfast outside each morning by the river. The rooms are very spacious and clean, WiFi worked well and the building itself is a wonderful old historic building with a superb lobby. Very helpful staff and good room service selection.

title: Incredible Singaporean hospitality
desc: Beautifully decorated hotel. Hi as amazed by creative teddy bear Christmas tree design. Had breakfast buffet. Incredible food and outstanding service. Everyone make you feel so welcome and taken care of. Would love to stay again here and will recommend it to others.

title: Happy and Memorable Stay
desc: Repeated visits to Fullerton for my special occasions...Feel at home upon check in and thank you for the birthday cake.. Kuddos to all staffs from front desk to housekeeping.. Giving us another memorable stay again.. Looking forward to my stay soon ☺️

title: 2 nites Staycation
desc: Very good and attentive service staff from check-in to check-out. The pool lady, the chambermaids, spa staff and everyone made our staycation extra special. Every service staff was outstanding. Special mention to Ryan and Chandra at the Straits Club. They were very attentive to our needs.

title: As expected
desc: Have stayed this hotel many times and they never exceed my expectations and they never disappoint me. Very nice hotel. The only negative point this time was check in took so long because they only had one staff at 11pm. Arriving hotel after a long flight and wait on a line for a while is not good experience

title: Fullerton hotel
desc: Been meeting clients and working here with our laptop and using the tables here and there. The wifi here is very strong for us to work here. Waiter, Lalikumar has been very accommodating. He help to provide tables for my colleagues and tables that are near electrical sockets. He remembers all of us everyday. Good!

title: Perfect we will be back to Fullerton again for sure.
desc: My partner arrived on early flight while I was only due in late at night. Joshua looked after Yaeli. He arranged early checkin with personal sympathy and did the outpost to provide the very best service possible. Thank you Joshoa on behalf of Yaeli

title: The best service we ever had!
desc: Our family stayed in Fullerton Hotel and ate at The Town Restaurant for my dad and cousin’s birthday celebration on Nov. 5, 2022. It was such a fun night and hassle free celebration for our family as we were assisted and accommodated by our server Ky and Sharol. Also, Annie, the auntie in the noodle section who served me the best laksa.

title: Staycation November - Bro birthday celebration
desc: Had 2 days 1 night stay in Loft Suite with my family to celebrate my brother staycation. Very nice. Had a good breakfast at club lounge as well. Service was very good and hotel staff generally were helpful. Wifi was strong. Thanks to hotel staff for decorating the loft suite. Balcony was huge, facing the main street with mbs in the background.

title: An Exquisite Stay at Fullerton Hotel in Singapore
desc: I had the pleasure of staying at the Fullerton Hotel in Singapore, and I am thrilled to share that my experience was nothing short of excellent. From the luxurious accommodations to the exceptional bathroom with a jacuzzi tub, this hotel truly exceeded my expectations. Location: The Fullerton Hotel boasts a prime location in Singapore's central business district. Its proximity to iconic attractions, shopping districts, and dining options made it a perfect choice for exploring the vibrant city. Rooms: The rooms at the Fullerton Hotel exude elegance, blending classic heritage with modern comfort. The attention to detail in the room decor and furnishings was impeccable. However, it was the bathroom that truly stole the show. The bathroom was spacious and featured a jacuzzi tub

title: Still one of our favourite hotels
desc: We visited The Fullerton many years back and loved it then. On our return we found the excellent customer service and fantastic hotel still remain. Our room was made available to us earlier than normal due to out early flight. It was very clean and looked as fresh as if it had just been renovated. Would highly recommend this hotel to anyone planning on staying in Singapore.

title: First trip to Singapore in 5 years!
desc: Excellent hotel at a superb price. Lively bar, great breakfast selection and a really great location with the bar and restaurant strip across the road over looking the marina. Rooms a really good standard

title: Simply perfect…
desc: I stayed here for a couple of nights in 2018 on the way home from Australia. This year I came for a week, and brought my elderly parents and a friend for a week. Everyone from check-in, concierge, bar/restaurant and housekeeping, is so so welcoming and friendly - but genuinely friendly and chatty. I have never known such obliging staff. The building is just stunning, and such a rich history that’s the hotel have embraced. Seriously comfortable beds, the rooms are as beautiful as the public areas, and superb bathrooms. The food quality is very high, amazing choice for breakfast. We had drinks in the restaurant one evening, the waiters were so lovely, had some great banter with them, especially “Jack” (we nicknamed him Jack as he said I was like Sharron Osborne as I have red

title: Very nice hotel - convenient located
desc: Of course it is a beautiful hotel. The rooms are perfect. The bed very comfortable. Breakfest was just great. If you like whiskey got to the bar! Things to improve: Elevators: takes forever. Check-in/out: Takes ages.

title: Great place to stay in
desc: Fullerton hotel rooms are all spacious. They have in house restaurant and bar. I love the cake shop inside Fullerton hotel. Bed is really comfy to sleep in and pillows are awfully fluffy and soft to lie on. I really love the ambience in Fullerton hotel. I really enjoyed my stay in Fullerton hotel. I would rebook again when I have the luxury of time again. Will be back soon Fullerton hotel. ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

title: Friendly Staff made me want to return to Fullerton!
desc: A very pleasant atmosphere, friendly smiling staff from check-in to check-out. The friendly staff at every corner of the hotel made me feel important and very welcoming. Though I made the booking at short notice after my flight was changed I did not have any issues at all when I arrived for check-in.

title: Good service, great location, helpful staff
desc: The room was comfortable and good to unwind after a long business day. As I was recovering from a broken foot, they were very helpful with my needs. I had a wheelchair available to me throughout my stay. The hospitality team was very pro-active towards my need.

title: A wonderful stay in so many ways!
desc: The hotel is perfectly located when you work in the Bay Marina. As a guest I had access to the Straits Club which was a is wonderful surprise and I loved going by the lounge every afternoon after a long day in the office. The service was impeccable and pleasant - every day for the entire week. Thank you, great staff of the Straits Club! I also want to mention the Concierge Mr. Aaron, he was the most helpful concierge you can ask for. He helped me with restaurant bookings, taxis and other things which is a hassle when you are first time in Singapore. Thank you, Aaron - see you again in April!

title: Excellent Service by Filipino Staff!
desc: The stay didn't start well because we booked for a King room but instead got a double bed and took 2 calls for housekeeping to reconfigure the beds. Saving grace are the spacious clean bathroom, scrumptious food at The Courtyard and best of all, the friendly Filipino maitre d' and wait staff at the resto. Thanks to the amiable front desk staff (also a Filipino!) who threw in the breakfast buffet for free, to make up for the earlier mix up. My husband and I relived memories when we first met here 16 years ago. Always a memorable visit in Singapore!

title: Wonderful Christmas Experience in the Hotel
desc: Came back again after the wonderful experience last time. Since is around the holiday, the hotel is filled with Christmas decorations. The teddy bear tree was the cutest! The kids LOVED IT!! Really enjoyed the Christmas feel the hotel provided for this holiday season. Nothing is better to wrap up the holiday in this hotel and enjoyed our Christmas buffet!

title: luxurious :)
desc: I would rate Fullerton Hotel as 5 out of 5. As soon as we arrived at the hotel, the bell hop greeted us and took care of our luggages and assisted us to the check-in desk. Check in was a breeze. I really love the scent in this hotel but i forgot to ask what it was as i wanted to know if they sell diffusers of the same scent. We spent the Christmas holidays in Singapore and Fullerton was well decorated for the holiday. A very tall Xmas tree made of their iconic stuff bears, among other beautiful Xmas decors they have. The breakfast is a buffet style and very generous with options. I peronally love the TWG tea! Our room is on the high floor facing the courtyard but still nice! bathroom is marble, toilet bowl is heated seat. Luxury toiletries too! I had a very good sleep! Try the

title: Best!
desc: Stayed at The Fullerton Hotel last December for a family vacation. We are very pleased with the warm welcome, special mention to Warren and Revathy, who assisted us with our check-in. It was a great start, as the saying goes “first impressions last”. Their service was very genuine. And yes, everything ahout our stay was wonderful. Our children were happy, and enjoyed their stay very much, though jetlag kicked in the second day. Thanks to the very comfy bed of the hotel, they had a good sleep throughout the day. The breakfast was amazing, and staffs were very welcoming too. Seeing them assisting us with a smile on their faces made our day even better. Thank you for this wonderful experience! You made our stay memorable!

title: Holiday
desc: Amazing hotel close to everything’s shopper and restaurants, the room is small for 3 people. The breakfast is great and services. We stay 4 nights and kids love it walk along the river. we love to come back again

title: Great Hotel and location.
desc: We met with our daughter at Changi airport on 27/12/22 as she has travelled from New Zealand and us from Manchester via Dubai.On arrival at around 1000 hours at the hotel we were pleasantly surprised that our Heritage double room was ready, this included a bed settee for our daughter. We unpacked and then wandered out explore the local area and along the riverside came across the large number of bars and restaurants we opted to have a drink in "Harry's" which must have had an impact as we ate or drank there most days/nights. The Fullerton has a fantastic heritage and is ideally located for everything you could want to do in Singapore. We did both the Hop on/off red and yellow routes which is most informative from then on we did a lot of walking to explore deeper. Taking in the

title: Not Coming Back
desc: Heard good reviews about the hotel so decided to try it for my holiday in Singapore. Had to say I was disappointed. Needed to wait and ask for help at the concierge. No initiative. Arrived in the morning and staff were quite unfriendly. Room was more on the older side compared to other hotels I have stayed at in Singapore. Breakfast variety was limited and taste was average. Will probably not return in the future, there are better hotels with better service for this price point.

title: Would totally come again!
desc: The beds and blankets were very soft and cozy. It was also very clean. And when i had breakfast there, the food was delicious! The hotel cleanliness is a 10/10. It also smells really nice there so I hope to have a stay there again soon☺️

title: Good location, spacious room, history and heritage.
desc: Had an great stay here with my wife and 5yr old son. Good central location, friendly staff, spacious room. There was a huge choice for breakfast which was tasty. The place has lots of history and heritage I would definitely visit again and recommend.

title: Excellent Hotel
desc: This hotel was recommended to us by friends who had lived in Singapore. Steeped in colonial history and proud of it, this hotel is ideally placed for visiting Singapore. We arrived on December 30th to bring in the new year, en-route to Phuket. A beautiful building architecturally, large public rooms, good cocktail bar. We had club rooms so ate in a smaller more intimate breakfast room, which suits us. Large bedroom with facilities you’d expect from a 5 star hotel. Friendly welcoming staff.

title: A touch of luxury
desc: My wife and I stayed over Christmas in a 7th floor Quay room, the balcony having a lovely view of the river and city, and which was a fair size and very comfortable. Christmas dinner was buffet style with truly international cuisine and far too much variety to sample everything. The Christmas decorations really entered the festive spirit, complimented by the friendly and helpful staff. Our only disappointment was that the hotel bar wasn't open, although there was a whisky bar, which I understand is independently operated on the ground floor. This is a fabulous building and we would certainly love to return.

title: Holiday season glitz
desc: My favorite hotel in Singapore. Our third time staying here and it’s always amazing. Especially during the holiday season. Refurbished room is lovely and the team is always tops. We especially enjoyed the Straits Club on this stay. Thank you so much for assisting us with our room change request.

title: A CLASSIC
desc: We spent 3Ns here. Very happy with the staff on club floor. Pleasant and courteous especially Crystal. The concierge was helpful too. The breakfast and evening cocktails were awesome.
