The room was spacious but still claustrophobic for me as the window was overlooking the inside lobby. Would recommend a room with view.

title: Great city hotel if that’s what you’re going for
desc: It’s a very nice city hotel. Beautiful building, but overall too big to offer top-notch service. Doormen barely said hi, no one helps with the doors for most of the time (= not top-notch service), it’s a busy place, which takes away anything “special”. Breakfast buffet was underwhelming, including its self-service standard coffee machines, which make for very mediocre anything. A hotel shouldn’t get 5 stars if you can’t make a proper latte. The club lounge is nice, but not really cozy. Offers no window views, very bland feel. Food is mediocre. Club staff is excellent though. If you’ve club access, you can opt for a limited breakfast there or go to the downstairs restaurant instead. Rate included free breakfast and with that visiting the restaurant downstairs was a no

title: All around best
desc: Most comfortable room i ever sat in. Had a room on the 7 floor with a gorgeous night view and beautiful sunrise of the bay. The staff was friendly and wonderful led by senior duty manager name Shazwan who was excellent throughout my stay

title: Staycation
desc: Did a 2 day 1 night family staycation at fullerton hotel Singapore. In terms of its dining, service was excellent and food quality was good. Room was clean and comfortable. Definitely coming back again.

title: Selladurai
desc: Good hotel.. good responsibility of hotel employees. Fullerton hotel restaurant employees are good responsibility and carring customer. Hotel neet and clean. They give some guide to Singapore tourists.

title: Great relaxing end to our Asia tour.
desc: Service is excellent, everyday is like the 1st day you arrived. All the staff are so friendly, nothing is too much trouble. Lent us umbrellas when it was raining, towels are so soft. Good gym and pool, great location, great view of the Marina Bay hotel.

title: Stunning
desc: After a 2 week trip in Singapore and Indonesia, we stayed here for the final night. Beautiful hotel with deep history (do the complimentary tour!), decadence, opulence and a real insight into Singapore's history. They even have their own trademark smell and you can post a letter for free home! The christmas decorations are something else!

title: Best service of all hotels in SG
desc: 200sgd dining voucher is insane. Can use for breakfast and all fnb services. Great deal and the room with balcony with super niceeee view. Much love. The kind staffs and attentive receptionist makes this place unforgetable for our honeymoom

title: Dec 2022 stay
desc: We spent about 18 days at the Fullerton Hotel, the first part of our stay between 12 Dec to 23 Dec 2022, we were in Loft Suite 279 which has a mezzanine floor with the main bedroom, the lower floor being the living and dinning area and the open terrace overlooking One Fullerton. During the first part of our stay, we have access the Straits Club. I thought the Straits Club is more quiet than the main breakfast area but unfortunately the variety of food is limited as compared to the main Town restaurant. The complimentary afternoon tea menu was sadly poor quality. The evening drinks were good. I think Straits Club could do with a more relaxing ambience with its decor and offerings. Fullerton needs to rethink about the Straits Club offerings. It's too 1980s mindset for me. We

title: An amazing stay
desc: Wow! What can I say about this stunning hotel? We arrived in Singapore at night and the first impression of the hotel in an array of lights and Christmas decorations will stay with us forever. The hotel is perfectly suited for exploration by foot or metro. The bedroom was amazing. So comfortable with everything you need for a luxurious stay. The staff were all polite and helpful and even though, as with most places, the staffing level wasn’t up to pre covid levels, everything was done to an extremely high standard. So we applaud the hard work of the staff who must be going above and beyond their duties to make the guests feel comfortable and welcome. The selection of breakfast was huge. All lovely and fresh and very temping to try everything! We would certainly recommend this

title: Birthday Staycay for Girlfriend
desc: Darshan was so warm n welcoming to me n my girlfriend,for her birthday! And what more the room was alreayd an hour early! Thankful for darshan n team! We will definitely come back next time for sure!!

title: Unhelpful staff
desc: The rooms are nice and generally clean but this time I found some restaurant staff were very rude and unhelpful. I just tried to order a takeaway coffee from the restaurant (which we had done the day before) this time I was told the restaurant was closed for lunch and to come back at 4pm if I wanted a coffee (3 hours away) I asked what had changed since I had ordered the day before and I was then told to order room service if I wanted a coffee. I said I just want a takeaway. Then she said I could order coffee but would have to wait 20 mins. Basically I couldn’t get a straight answer and found this member of staff ‘Hope’ grumpy, unnecessarily rude and unhelpful with a very condescending and dismissive attitude. She then appeared to be complaining about me to a fellow staff member

title: A must stay in Singapore.
desc: Impressive family stay at the Fullerton, nicely located to the main landmarks are within walking distance, hotel is well decorated for Christmas, stunning view of the river and Marina Bay, staff are friendly. Special thank you to @Rafi Patani at the concierge for your dinner advice. We enjoyed our stay.

title: Our Marriage-Anniversary Celebration
desc: We stayed and celebrated our Marriage-Anniversary Celebration from 11 Dec to 17 Dec 2022. Fullerton Hotel and Fullerton Bay Hotel always is our 1st choice :) We really enjoyed the FH and FBH team excellent services. Especially during Festive season. The Christmas decorations were beautiful, full of christmas spirits and the ambience were amazing :) With Sharon assistance. She arranged our 2 nights (11-12 December) in Fullerton Suites. The room is huge with balcony facing Marina Bay, cosy outdoor room with beautiful scenic. Another 4 nights (13-17 December) we stayed in Marina Bay View room. The full view looking at the bay, one fullerton and fullerton bridge were superb :) Our 12 December celebration, was well planned and organised by Paul. The Lighthouse Restaurant

title: One of the best hotel experiences
desc: My girlfriend and I had an incredible stay at the Loft Suite at the Fullerton Hotel. The only thing that was better than the hotel’s regal architecture and historical significance was the impeccable service. The hotel manager Shazwan was extremely helpful, knowledgeable and anticipated our needs even before we did. This is a must-have experience for tourists and locals alike.

title: Historical hotel outstanding Service
desc: The Fullerton hotel is an historical post office converted in a luxurious hotel. The building is quite old and frankly the design and the rooms are quite old fashioned. Maybe 20 years ago it would be considered luxurious.. However, the location is great and close to the MRT station. What really stood out for us was the level of service and professionalism provided by the hotel staff. When we checked-in there was a problem with our room and Joshua the receptionist in charge of us took the initiative to upgrade us to a better room and he personally went to inspect it to make sure we wouldn’t be disappointed again! He also made sure to send us a honeymoon present! Joshua definitely knows how to make guests feeling welcome and treat them with the best hotelier heart. We also had

title: Great experience! Thank you!
desc: It’s my third time staying in the fullerton. All never disappointed me. This round I went with another mother and two 5 years olds and a 1 year old toddler. At first I suspected it will be a stressful trip but for the kids’ bonding and experience the city area at night we just went for it. The accommodating and helpful staff from concierge to reception to dining place made our trip almost stressless (can’t be none with a toddler). There are numerous accounts I felt embarrassed by the kids’ behaviours but the staff just made me feel so much more at ease. P.s. the Christmas bears are cute! Thank you!

title: Fabulous Fullerton
desc: I had a fabulous stay in Jan 2023, check in was a breeze and service was attentive. I like my room, a bit on the small size, but it came with a fabulous balcony with a view of MBS. Comfortable and Cozy room. Breakfast was bit chaotic due to been very busy, i was expecting coffee to be serve instead of having to pour my own, this is the Fullerton after all. Huge variety of food to satisfy all taste and some traditional Singaporean breakfast items are available. Thanks for the fabulous stay, but serve me coffee please :P

title: Front Office Hero Saves The Day
desc: We had a view of the Sands Marina bay which really made our break. The hotel is a real grand dame and more traditional/classic than I would usually chose, but I loved the history. the scale and the breakfast buffet is second to none, replenished and plentiful. It was a bit crowded due to our stay and concierge made some errors which left our final night celebration in doubt, but Darshan Lionel appeared in cape with his clear experience + dedication to service, making our worries disappear. He found us an excellent restaurant and bar and personally drove us to the venue to ensure our evening was perfect. His attention to detail and concern at our disappointment really reassured us we had made the right choice with The Fullerton. He is a true asset.

title: Great hotel, uncomfortable bed.
desc: Lovely hotel with loads of history, great location and lovely staff, however the reason I have given 3 stars is that the beds are so uncomfortable. A comfortable bed is pretty much a requisite for a hotel and I found the Fullerton beds pretty much like sleeping on concrete. I’m sure it suits some people but not me I’m afraid, I didn’t get a good nights sleep for the duration of my stay. Apart from that it’s a lovely hotel.

title: Beautiful hotel, great location BUT......
desc: This is a fantastic hotel that we will visit again.... Room was good, hotel amazing BUT there seems in my opinion to be a problem with staff either not answering emails or trying to hard sell at reception. Maybe if they read the booking notes this wouldn't happen so a little disappointed! Booked as an I Prefer account client but did not get the room upgrade or the late check out although not full... We had afternoon tea in the room as part of our 5 night stay but I emailed 3 times to book this in and never received a reply - I tried both reception and dining emails... then received an email a couple of days before we arrived requiring time we wanted to eat and replied, then again next day and replied again.... on check in I was told I hadn't bothered to reply - hey guys I think

title: Quite honestly perfect.
desc: This is seriously one of the nicest hotels we have stayed in anywhere in the world. From the signature scent as we walked in, to the luxurious rooms and fantastic service. The staff are incredibly friendly and welcoming and we were made very welcome in the bar most nights for some excellent Singapore Slings (way better than Raffles) there are seriously not enough superlatives to describe it. The breakfast buffet is something else, amazing choices and again excellent service. We were sad to leave and will definitely choose a Fullerton hotel again. Such a shame there aren’t any in Europe. Special mention to the older guy working at the pool. So helpful and friendly. Thanks.

title: Singapore a revelation
desc: The hotel’s historic significance is apparent but you need to look at why, it is abundant in so many ways. Business and finance were centred here and understandably the location is key. Loved every moment exploring and the heritage tour that Sindy provided us provided a depth of insight that reading alone could not she was marvellous!

title: The Fullerton Hotel Singapore
desc: The hotel is in a old- fashioned big building. It has a lavish main lobby, and has beautiful chandeliers. It is also located near the Merlion, a big attraction of Singapore.The rooms are about 35 square meters, and has a flat screen television, and a 10 square meter bathroom. It has both a swimming pool and a gym. You can also order an in-room dine in.

title: Great stay in Singapore
desc: Beautiful Paladian Suite overlooking Marina Bay. Great room, nice ambiance and loved the Straights Club. Excellent service throughout. Particularly liked the harpist in the restaurant/lobby area. Location is perfect, with relatively easy walks to tourist destinations.

title: Excellent stay
desc: It was the best experience ever!! Chanla,Zep and Ryan were excellent. They were attentive, kind sweet and very very elpful. Superb and personalised treatment. Excellent whisky tasting offered. Will definitely be back!!!

title: High Tea at The Fullerton Hotel.
desc: Today we had an excellent High Tea at The Fullerton. Unbeknown to us this week is part of Chinese New Year and the High Tea was themed around this. The food was outstanding and the service impeccable. The ambience in the courtyard area of this historical building was wonderful. We would recommend both Singapore and Sydney Fullerton for High Tea for any occasion.

title: Incredible on every level!
desc: We stayed at the Fullerton for 3 nights on our way back to the UK from a 3 week trip of a lifetime to Fiji and Australia. I had planned to propose to my partner in Fiji, but plans went completely wrong out there for the proposal and I'd rearranged to propose at The Fullerton. Firstly, the Hotel is absolutely beautiful from an architectural perspective and is matched by the service. Having stayed in hotels all around the world I'm struggling to think of one that I felt happier staying in. It was all just perfect. An actual real 5 Start hotel Experience. I'd go back to The Fullerton every time we go back to Singapore, especially because it has such special significance to us after our engagement. One thing worth noting is that the pool is north facing so doesn't really get

title: *** OUTSTANDING ***
desc: Definitely a 5-star hotel. You can’t beat the location. You walk out the door and there’s the Merlion icon facing the Marina Sands Bay. The rooms are very spacious. The staff go all out to accommodate your needs. The breakfast buffet is outstanding, a bit pricey but worth it. Highly recommend The Fullerton.

title: Board Meeting Site
desc: The Fullerton Hotel, site of our April BoD Meeting is truly an amazing 5+ Star Hotel! The staff in the Straits Club are super wonderful, Ryan, Joshua, Crystal and the rest of the names I didn’t catch are as well. Our Housekeeper was the best service and I was in the hotel Biz for 40 years so I’m a tough critic. The F&B in all areas was so delicious and the service was great. Kudos to the GM, Mr Gino Tan on assembling such a wonderful staff. I cannot wait to return this April 23-26!!

title: Best experience ever
desc: Amazing service. The staff go extra mile to satisfy all of our needs. Especially in the lobby lounge, my favorite is Lalikumar is by far one of the best hotel staff I have ever met. Fullerton is not just about the rooms. The staff gives the hotel the stars.

title: traditional afternoon tea
desc: Service staff were nice and friendly and introduced the afternoon tea set to us patiently. The afternoon tea were delicious and nicely presented. It was an enjoyable afternoon tea in a relaxing ambience. We all had a good time at the courtyard Fullerton hotel.

title: Don’t miss staying at The Fullerton
desc: Most beautiful stay ~ gorgeous suite. Great staff, especially Chandra in the Straits Club. Breakfast, tea and evening cocktails with great appetizer selections. So close to Boat and Clarke Quay and Merlion. Cozier and not as busy as some of the larger hotels. View over bay is fabulous!

title: Thank you Ryan (Straits Club)
desc: We stayed for 3 nights and had Straits Club access as part of our booking. A special shout out to Ryan, Crystal and Jared who took time to ensure that our experience met expectations and more. They were genuinely delightful and made our stay that much more enjoyable. Thank you!

title: Professional and luxurious
desc: Stayed at the Fullerton for a long weekend to celebrate a marriage. From the point of check in to our final check out, the entire experience was professional and luxurious. The room was clean, bright, and comfortable. Special shoutout to Mr Md Shazwan, who went above and beyond to help us with every request and accommodation. Definitely recommend!

title: Enjoyable stay missing the polish I expect at Fullerton
desc: I enjoyed stayed by 4 nights at the Fullerton hotel in a Marina Bay view room. The hotel is as iconic as it is grand. The room, while a little dated, is luxurious and in good condition with very comfortable bed and good amenity. I enjoyed the small balcony area and ability to have fresh air. I have previously stayed at Fullerton on the Bay and observed the level of customer service to be lacking in comparison to my previous experience. I have not deducted a star as I appreciate workforce is difficult everywhere, but I hope Singapore and Fullerton recover and return to their previous high standard of service. The buffet breakfast, room service etc were great, I wasn’t a fan of the overcrowded pool or average gym amenities, but didn’t need those things to enjoy the stay. The pool

title: One of the best hotels in Singapore for Staycations
desc: Great stays as usual in the Fullerton Hotel. Would like to thank the team for delivering the outstanding service especially housekeeping who work tirelessly to keep our room neat and tidy. Thanks Von, Kar Wei, Daniel, Simon. Staff at Front office and Straits Club often delivered a personalised and consistent service throughout the stay. Thanks Andrew, Revathy, Warren, Lucy, Joshua, Zed, Ryan and Crystal. Thankful to the hotel management- Alan, Terry, Sharon for recognising my regular visits. Look forward to next stay next time!

title: Great service
desc: Beautiful hotel with excellent staff. Harpreet at the front entrance was extremely helpful - he helped me get a taxi quickly and gave me the history of the hotel while we waited. Great service for afternoon tea as well.

title: Fullerton Hotel Singapore - Straits Club
desc: We booked a Straits Club Quay room at the Fullerton Hotel, Singapore. This trip was our first overseas trip away since COVID. Had access to Straits Club floor which offered breakfast, pm tea and evening drinks. Food and drinks were fantastic, and we enjoyed the occasional champagne at breakfast! Staff at the club floor were, without exception, polite, friendly, helpful with day trip suggestions and nothing was too much trouble. Kudos to Club floor staff - Crystal, Jacob, Warren, Lucy, Ryan and Zep for their wonderful service. The Club Quay room offered lovely views of the Singapore River and historical buildings and was serviced daily to a high standard by housekeeping staff. All in all, the Fullerton is a great place to stay for a relaxing holiday.

title: Great downtown location
desc: The Fullerton is a 3.5 star hotel. It has a great location, the rooms were nice but not anything special (pillows were like rocks) and the staff was very nice. The room, however, got a mildew smell in it if the air was not running while you were out of the room. There was no place in the lobby for a drink after 5. The lobby is quite large and nice, so it would have been a great place to visit and have a drink. There is a nice bar separate from the lobby and not owned by the hotel that was nice for a drink and light food.

title: Dreadful, expensive, inflexible, dreary, dark, dirty, tiny. Trading off a buildings legacy - NOT 3 STAR
desc: Booked for 3 nights in the Fullerton. Courtyard view, nearly $1000 sing per night. Could not see where the child's cot (11yrs old) would fit. A dark tiny room. Open curtains and see other guests in their rooms. Bathroom had a full length mirror hinged open to a concrete wall. Expected a delux triple room - triple apparently means 3 people. Not like the pictures online. Offered a slightly bigger room, told but basically the same. Screwed with my pants on. Told them not acceptable and wanted a refund. Went to stay in Four Season and they were excellent. 3 weeks later still ko refund - travel agent and hotel not facilitative at all. Never ever ever again! Perhaps fine for 1 person travelling on business for the CBD area locally where a corporate pays. Not a luxury holiday

title: An Impeccable Stay
desc: We loved our stay at The Fullerton Hotel Singapore, it really was impeccable. Check-in: A great arrival experience. Virtuoso booking benefits all acknowledged and we so appreciated being accommodated with early access to our room; it was a wonderful start to this holiday. I loved the welcome card and gift and the beautiful fruit platter. Room: We loved our Quay room on level 6, overlooking the river, with a balcony! Just amazing. I loved being able to step outside to take in the beautiful views, each morning and evening. Location: I think this is absolutely prime. It is walking access to everything - you have the bridges, the museum, galleries and concert hall directly opposite the hotel, walks along the river, the amazing tunnel to the Collyer Quay area and The Fullerton

title: FIRST CLASS ALL THE WAY
desc: This is a 5 star hotel situated on the river close to the Merlion landmark. It is the old Post Office building established in 1922 There is nothing unsatisfactory about this place, It is excellent in every way. Rooms are extremely well appointed, large king bed (we were in room 741) Bathroom etc was marble lined, with all the accessories, toilet bowl illumination, self opening lid on approach and self cleaning at the same time. Bidet incorporated in the system Service throughout the hotel was excellent. This is not an inexpensive hotel costing round $A500 on, but hotels in Singapore all appear expensive

title: Fullerton is Special
desc: We had a wonderful stay at the Fullerton. When we arrived very early from our international flight (7am) we were completely surprised and delighted that our room was ready for us. The room itself was lovely: a great view of the bay and Sands hotel offered wonderful morning views and a light show from the Sands. The main restaurant was perfect for breakfasts and accommodated our dietary needs perfectly. We had a special dinner at Jade which was a great way to celebrate a birthday. The spa is also worth a visit; I had a rejuvenating massage there. The hotel’s location is ideal for seeing the city. Staff was across the board just superb! Highly recommend.

title: Great hotel and staff.
desc: Great location and facilities. Amazing front office and concierge staff. FOM Mr Ali was very professional and courteous. Nice bloke he is. Overall I would rate this 5 star. Breakfast was also good although the French toast was a bit disappointment.

title: A Hotel with caring and professional staff
desc: Check in was speedy. Asked for a firm mattress as I have a back injury. The mattress on the bed was fantastic. The hotel was decorated for Lunar New Year. The decorations were absolutely beautiful. Room was perfect. Breakfast great selection. Took unwell and colleagues had to enter my room. The hotel did all the security checks and called me on my mobile. Each day Kate would call me and ask how I was doing. A hotel that shows clearly they care about guests and go out of their way to make sure you have the best stay that you can. Thanks to Kate and some other staff, The Fullerton exceeded my expectations and the caring touch you just never see. Thanks Kate and to The Fullerton Hotel Management. Words cannot express my true gratitude. Thank you very much.

title: Buffet Birthday Celebration
desc: 60+pax, Buffet Birthday Celebration. The arrangement and occasion went well and smooth. Thank you very much In-Charge Mr. Rey and his staff.

title: Always good
desc: We enjoy staying at The Fullerton. In fact we stay in Singapore a few days at the end of our holiday because we look forward to staying. A good location in a historic heritage building . Attentive staff and good food.

title: Memorable night staying in Fullerton for our anniversary
desc: Spent a night celebrating our anniversary. We checked in the room with the MBS view, it was exceptional. The room was spacious and very luxurious. We had kids with us and there were kids amenities inside the room with the teddy bear by the time we walked into the room, my kids were so happy and loved the gifts a lot. It surely made them feel special. The hotel is in an excellent location, we can walk through the underpass to reach the bay front and we took a walk along the bay after dinner. We had a wonderful time and highly recommend this hotel for special occasions, sure will be memorable!

title: Beautiful hotel and great customer service
desc: Best hotel we have ever stayed in. We asked for a quiet room and never heard a sound. Perfect bed and lovely thick fluffy towels. Location is ideal. Amazing choice for breakfast. Service was excellent and staff were very helpful.

title: Very nice place to relax. Perfect atmosphere
desc: As always a perfect experience. The staff were excellent, especially Mr Chandra who helped with the charging of my phone whilst I enjoyed a lovely tea in the tea room. I was able to sit back and relax whilst reading a book. I can’t wait till my next visit.

title: Happy birthday trip
desc: it was my best friend birthday day trip. we planned a trip with intensive schedule. Luckily, hotel provide relax and luxury accommodation with good location. we definitely will come back. especially thank you hotel staff team gave us a big birthday surprise.

title: Sweet Daddy’s 86th and Mommy’s 80th Birthday at Fullerton Suite
desc: Celebrating my parents’ natal day at this very sweet Fullerton Suite is a delightful experience. Booked the Fullerton suite last month and informed the reservation team ,Ms. Lucy Jeon ,that it’s my parents’ birthdays the reason we are spending the night and they offerred some surprises to amazed the celebrants, in the form of Balloons, bouquet of roses and Fullerton bears , added to that is a bottle of Veuve Clicquot champagne, a cake with ‘Happy Birthday’ and a platter of fruits!!Needless to say that the room is superb with your own terrace facing the Marina Bay!!the view was just spectacular! I also booked another room for our surprise guest all the way from Canada which he got the Straits Club Marina Bay view just 1 floor below our 8th floor suite. Our stay made it more

title: Email responses need to be more timely
desc: It’s been tough getting timely email responses for pre-arrival arrangements. It typically takes about 3 days for a response from their Reservations email team if you need to make room arrangements or requests. We’re looking forward to our stay but expected a higher level of service from their front office e-mail team for a hotel of this caliber. Would recommend you email well in advance if pre-arrival arrangements are needed.

title: Such character
desc: Absolutely stunning iconic hotel which was a dream to stay in. The position on the river was great and made it easy to get everywhere. The raffles MRT stop right next door was very convenient too. The infinity pool was amazing for relaxing, watching the world go by after a long day's sightseeing. The hotel oozes luxury, but at the same time is very welcoming. My husband had advised in advance we were celebrating my 50th birthday and there were balloons and cake in our room on arrival. Talking of cake, the ondeh ondeh cake from the hotel bakery was the best cake I have ever tasted! Huge, tasty breakfast buffet and delicious seafood evening buffet sat out beside the river. Connection under the road in air con across to the Fullerton on the Bay was also very convenient too. Would

title: Singapore
desc: Great hotel, excellent service, convenient location! With a nice view of boat quay, close by restaurants. Singapore is an amazing city with great walking and food! Just wish the lighthouse at the top of the Fullerton was open!

title: Best Stay in the Most Beautiful Hotel with the Most Wonderful Staff
desc: We booked a two night stay in The Fullerton Hotel Singapore for my wedding night and boy was it worth the splurge. We were greeted so warmly and even congratulated on our special occasion by Mr Shazwan at the front desk after seeing that we had just come from our wedding, in a gown and suit. From our very first interaction with him, we could feel his sincerity and genuine happiness and care for us to make our special day even more special at the Fullerton, esp after a long and tiring day. Shazwan even went above and beyond to walk us to our room, showed us the hotel's amenities and checked in with us if we needed anything else to make our stay more comfortable. He even arranged a surprise wine and cake to the room to congratulate us! The room Shazwan had arranged for us was

title: Amazed and Satisfied
desc: Special mention to both Poppy and Riza for providing excellent service and made it a very memorable visit,

title: Delightful Afternoon Tea
desc: This was our second afternoon tea as we came here 12 months ago on another holiday. It was exceptional and the staff are very friendly and helpful. The afternoon went by at a lovely relaxed pace. There is a lot of history here. Will will return one day.

title: Perfection
desc: Outstanding in all aspects,the entire team at the Straits club including Jen are on point, welcoming,vibrant positive vibes,friendly service,attention to detail, the room and food wow amazing! The location is excellent for visiting the Merlion and surrounds super amazing all round definitely worth it!!!!!

title: Outstanding
desc: We stayed at this traditional colonial hotel for 6 nights in a Straits Club room. The room was spacious and well appointed. Choose a room with a view over the river or the bay and not the courtyard. We had a view over the bay and could see the Marina Bay in all its different colours both day and night. The best thing we found was that there was there was the Straits Club on the fourth floor, where we could have breakfast, afternoon tea and cocktails in the evening all inclusive of the price. So you could get all your meals there if you wanted to in a lovely quiet setting without having to go downstairs to the main dining areas on the ground floor. The staff were exceptionally helpful and friendly especially on the fourth floor. We also did the complimentary tour of the hotel

title: Wonderful high tea experience
desc: Service was prompt and staff were all friendly. Mr Kumar was very attentive to our requests. Loved the harp performance which was held between 3.30 - 4.30pm. Definitely an afternoon well spent at The Courtyard @ Fullerton.

title: This is a superb hotel choice in Singapore
desc: This was our third time to stay at The Fullerton Hotel in Singapore. Our stay this time was as enjoyable as the two previous times, and confirmed our judgment that this is the best hotel for us in Singapore. The Fullerton's staff is one of its strongest points -- they are very customer-service-oriented and very apparently well trained, and they go out of their way to make their guests' time in the hotel pleasant in every way. This is true of the doormen, those at the concierge desk, those at the front desk, those in the restaurant, and the housekeeping staff. Concierge Mohammad Hafiz was especially helpful. The Fuillerton's location is ideal -- it occupies a scenic and historic site on the Singapore River just upstream from its mouth into the Marina Reservoir,

title: Very nice ambience for couples to celebrate valentines day
desc: Courtyard have its unique charm with natural lighting from the see through glass roof to the huge column which makes this area really big and spacious. The staff is really attentive and patient. Special shoutout to Lalikumar thanks for your wonderful service!

title: Luxury break!
desc: After a few weeks trekking in Nepal, The Fullerton is a breath of (beautifully scented) fresh air. Can’t fault our stay. Great location with MRT just around the corner. Breakfast is excellent with an enormous selection. We stayed in a Heritage room. Very spacious and a bed you don’t want to get out of. Bathroom is huge with lovely toiletries and an electrician toilet which has all kinds of fun tricks. Will be back!

title: Luxurious relaxing break
desc: We are currently enjoying a four day stay at the Fullerton Hotel. Staying in a club room and enjoying the club benefits. Breakfast in the main restaurant is excellent- all the usual food choices as well as attentive service. In the Club Lounge we have enjoyed afternoon tea, which is quite comprehensive as well as changing food choices daily. Drinks and canapes in the evening are equally as enjoyable. What is not to like about Veuve Cliqor champagne? But the best part of staying in a club room is the excellent service of the staff in this hotel. We usually stay at the Intercontinental, but think we have discovered a new favourite in Singapore.

title: The day at the Fullerton Hotel was the best experience of this trip.
desc: I went to Singapore for the honeymoon and stayed at the Fullerton Hotel from February 9th to 10th, the last day of our trip. When we planned our trip, my wife was unhappy about our trip to Singapore. And she was very tired during the trip because of the hot weather and sometimes unfriendly Singaporeans. By the way, our stay at the Fullerton Hotel, which was our last day in Singapore, made a good impression on the entire honeymoon. In particular, I would like to thank Kate Joe of the Fullerton Hotel for helping us check in. She was very professional. We were exhausted because we had a tight trip that day. And we checked in late, around 9 p.m., and she was very kind to us. The day's tiredness melted because of her words and actions to be as considerate of us as possible. We

title: Great location and excellent service
desc: The Fullerton , Singapore is located right on the water. There are great areas to explore nearby. The MRT station is an easy walk. The room we had was very spacious with extra high ceilings. Although we had large windows it had limited views. If you can, get a river view as it looks right across the bay to Marina BAY sands. We had lounge access which was excellent. A good variety of food and great champagne. The staff were very attentive and always willing to help. The only down side were all the steps in the club floor which we managed happily.

title: Short Stop Over
desc: The Fullerton provided a wonderful 24 hour stopover on our way from Sydney to London. Excellent location, central to restaurants and a great view of Singapore lit up at night. Would recommend the Straits Club……we’d had a long flight from Sydney and didn’t feel like heading to a restaurant, the plentiful canapés and drinks at the Straits Club was perfect for us and gave us time to unwind before going for a walk to view Singapore at night. Breakfast the following morning was very relaxed as was afternoon tea. Obviously the Straits Club is not cheap but it’s so convenient if you’re only having a short stopover……….. probably the same cost as if you are at a restaurant outside of the hotel. We were able to use the facilities at the hotel on our check out day until our late departure

title: Just perfect
desc: We stayed here for two nights, with a Harhour Vuew room, which was stunning. The breakfast is first class, as are the staff, we had no complaints at all. The hotel is so handy for both Clark Quay and Boat Quay, Raffkes Place and of course the Harbour and Merlion. A stunning hotel in a fabulous location.

title: Brief layover stop in Singapore.
desc: Enjoyed our brief stay. Great location. Easy to take a walk to get a sense of a bit of Singapore. Very comfortable room. Helpful staff. Huge breakfast buffet was included in our rate which we enjoyed on the hotel terrace. Unfortunately we didn’t have time to enjoy many of the other amenities.

title: True Hospitality Service
desc: The high tea is highly recommended! A good range of selection and each pastry and sweet is finely detailed. The hotel itself is beautiful and sits on a historical site. Great ambiance. One of the best if not the best service in hospitality in Singapore. Special thanks to Mr. Lalitkumar who has been serving us year after year for our Valentine's 💝 here at The Courtyard. He makes every Valentine's we celebrate here extra smooth with his attention to detail. Thank you, and see you again!

title: Great Hotel!
desc: Really enjoyed our stay. Great staff, location & facility! Recommended by a friend who had lived in Singapore for a number of years & it was a perfect match for us. Toured SE Asia & stayed at 6 great hotels. The Fullerton was a perfect place to end the trip!

title: Great historic hotel but poor service
desc: 1st time trying this hotel and too excited coz its one of singapore historic place. My kids knows more about it. The room is good but can still improve. My daughter gets locked out in d balcony of d room coz difficult to open coz d door is old. The bed is very small compared to other hotels we've been. The breakfast very limited options. But the most disappointing thing is that we dont feel welcome here. We arrive w/ luggage and need to use stairs to go in but nobody offer to help carry the luggage. When we want to go out coz its raining we ask for umbrella but the staff that gave us doesn't seems happy serving us and even gave us broken 1. Also no guest recognition that creates personal and memorable experiences. Unlike other hotels we've visit always great and smile and can

title: Beautiful hotel
desc: We were here in March for 3 nights. We were able to check in early due to early flight arrival, which was certainly appreciated. It's a beautiful hotel with grand lobby. The breakfast was wonderful and service was even better. Location could not have been better, close to all the major attractions. The only suggestion I would have is to improve the receiving method. We flew over 20 hours in flight and came here, it would be nice have some welcome drink or simple lemon water. Also it would be nice for the bell man or a staff member to escort us to the room and explain the room features. Apart for this it was a wonderful stay

title: Great Hotel.
desc: This hotel has lots of character in its historic postal office building. Rooms are comfortable especially if you get the views of Marina Bay Hotel on the 6th floor. Great location , service , friendly staff , the lounge on the 2nd floor is worth it because of the delicious food and open bar.

title: Classy hotel in a fabulous city
desc: First time in Singapore so this was the perfect hotel. So central, attentive staff and huge breakfast choices. Only downsides were the freezing pool and the revolting buffet on our first night. We loved the son et lumiere every night - fantastic view. Very high standard of housekeeping- set the bar very high. A very early checkout was handled so well. Will definitely return next year.

title: My fav in Singapore!
desc: It’s more than hotel, it’s historical place opened in 2001 by the Prime Minister . It’s from the Luxury collection and it’s really stunning ! They organize also tour for the hotel guests around the palace . It’s in the Downtown of Singapore , love the location ! The hotel is elegant and classy , food amazing and gives me a feeling of coming back of time . It reminds me the Metropole hotel of Montecarlo , I really recommend this hotel for sophisticated guests with taste of elegance and not fan of big crowd

title: Avoid
desc: This beautiful historic building is in a great location but sadly it’s badly in need of a renovation. Rooms are dated. Quality is lacking and inside the vibe is dead. Price point is high and not competitive vs other newer product close by. Avoid.

title: Nice hotel
desc: I've stayed at the Fullerton Hotel a number of times. The rooms are comfortable. The location is great for exploring the Esplanade and One Fullerton areas. Service is generally good, although some of the reception staff seem quite new and unsure of procedures. Mica or Mira was excellent in guiding them. My stay on this occasion was unfortunately spoilt by a rude lady manager at the Town Restaurant.

title: Afternoon tea
desc: Together with my husband and daughter we had a lovely afternoon tea in The Courtyard. Food was excellent and a great selection of teas. My husband and I share the same birth date and were delighted by the surprise birthday cake. The staff were very attentive and professional. We could not have gone anywhere else to celebrate our birthdays.

title: Best luxury hotel in Singapore
desc: This has to rate as one of the best hotels we have stayed in around the world! Was everything we expected in a 5* hotel and more with an impressive location and view of the Marina bay in Singapore right next to the Merlion Park. Lots of history in this colonial building so take the time to explore it. Room was large and very comfortable with everything you could need for an extended stay. Bed and linen top rate and we found it so comfortable we wanted to sleep in but needed to explore. Hotel location means you can walk anywhere, but for longer trips metro station within just 5 minutes. Staff very helpful giving lots of advice on where to go and what to see. Restaurant large and well appointed serving delicious buffet breakfast and lunch, didn't try the dinner. As the hotel is

title: Excellent service + historical building a bonus
desc: The stay was wonderful. Staff specially at the Straits Club was superb! Christine , Liyana, Crystal, Zap and Jen are amazing. They recommended the best places to go and activities to do. Highly recommend ✨

title: Enjoying your business trip
desc: Staying here for 3 days and have a wonderful services from Fullerton team. When I arrived at the airport their concierge services already waiting outside the gate and assisted thru immigration clearance and thru the limo services. Check In was quick, room was great. Had a chance to try having breakfast at the Straits Club at the 4th floor and also at Town Coffee Shop, all great, although if you prefer more private services you could choose at the club. Overall a great experience

title: Luxury
desc: This was, for me, luxury. We treated ourselves to a club room and had a view overlooking the Marina Bay hotel and although the road was visible, it was very quiet. Booking a club room meant we had the privilege of using the Straits club room, quiet, personal service, nothing too much trouble, luxury! All the staff in there were polite, courteous and efficient, and both Ryan and Jen went out of their way to make our stay effortless, nothing was too much trouble, even providing suggestions of what to do and see. The concierge desk were wonderful, and as we were leaving late in the evening, they organised for us to shower and change before heading to the airport. We will be back and I hope to have a room on the other side, overlooking the quay. Thank you everyone.

title: We stayed before and after a cruse
desc: Top notch in every way. Raffles wasn't available when we booked, and we were totally happy with Fullerton. Waterfront setting is unbeatable; rooms are large and perfectly kept; Straits Club for breakfast and cocktails is comp, Every staff person we contacted was kind, conversant and helpful. Not inexpensive, but clearly worth it

title: Wonderful Hotel
desc: We stayed at the Fullerton for five nights and we couldn’t have found a better hotel in Singapore. The location and quality of this hotel make it a stunning choice. The service was exemplary and the colleagues were so friendly. The quality and freshness of the food in the restaurant was only matched by the service and ambiance. A big shout out to our UK travel agent Neil Maslen at ‘The Travel Counsellors’ who arranged this holiday……it couldn’t be improved upon!

title: 6 out of 5 Stars!
desc: We have stayed in many 5star hotels in Singapore including The Ritz-Carlton, The Westin, Mandarin Oriental, Kempinski etc. but our stay at The Fullerton Hotel really surpassed our expectations. The staff made all the difference. We had the awesome pleasure of checking in with Shazwan and seeing how we had our 3 year old son with us, he made sure that he was well taken care of, including kids amenities in the room without asking and even gave him a Fullerton Bear key chain which made his day! He also took the time to interact with our son and was patient with him. Since it was not as busy at the front desk, he offered to send us to our room and gave us a brief orientation. The room was amazing and luxurious, with a great view to boot. He left after making sure we were settled

title: Business Trip to Singapore
desc: I was here for a conference in the hotel, great conference facilities, beautiful historic hotel, excellent service and outstanding food in the Jade restaurant, also Pool are very nice, can highly recommend this hotel, staff very friendly and helpful

title: Wonderful stay
desc: We had a fabulous stay on the 6th floor with a marina Bay view. On arrival we were greeted by very helpful and attentive staff. We were treated to a complimentary bottle of wine as we were celebrating our anniversary. The rooms were spotless and everything we needed was at hand . We were within easy reach of hawkers markets and restaurants The hotels own restaurant and afternoon tea area near the check was delightful with lovely cakes etc Breakfast was a well served buffet type catering for all needs Concierge were also extremely helpful and patient with no issues getting a taxi when required I would thoroughly recommend this hotel as it lives up too its high rating.

title: Wonderful Stay at The Fullerton Hotel
desc: My husband and stayed at The Fullerton Hotel for a little respite between a holiday in Japan and returning to our lives at home. We decided to upgrade our stay and pay for access to the Straits Lounge for the duration of our stay and we were glad we made that choice. The food and staff were beyond excellent and, in our opinion was better value than going out regularly in Singapore. The service at the hotel was exceptional and a special thank you to all the staff at the Straits Lounge who we had contact with. A special thank you to Lucy and Ryan who made our stay that much more enjoyable! The rooms were amazing, plenty of space (especially after coming from Japan!) and easy access to sights and places in Singapore. Thank you Fullerton Hotel for a memorable trip!

title: Extraordinary Hotel, Great Location
desc: We enjoyed our stay there very much, top staff, nice rooms. This is a historic building in a unique location surrounded by skyscrapers. Great breakfast selection, spacious restaurant. Greetings to Edgar, a very helpful and kind restaurant manager!

title: Always Quality, a must stay in Singapore!!
desc: We love this charming hotel so much, it represents a link between old colonialism and modern Singapore. Each room is individual and has a unique quality of its own. There are plenty of restaurants and bars on offer and we would recommend a G&T in Town to while away the afternoon.

title: Fantastic Hotel for everyone
desc: The Fullerton Hotel Singapore is a spectacular 5-star hotel located in the heart of the city. From the moment you arrive, you can feel that you are in an extraordinary place. The hotel not only boasts its rich history but also its remarkable architecture, which makes it a perfect destination for anyone who appreciates luxury travel. The hotel has 399 rooms and suites, each designed with elegance and style, offering stunning views of the cityscape or the magnificent Marina Bay area. The rooms are spacious and bright, with high ceilings, comfortable beds, and luxurious bedding for a relaxing stay. The rooms have been equipped with modern amenities, such as a flat-screen television, a coffee and tea maker, a mini-bar, and high-speed internet access. One of the highlights of the

title: Amazing stay at the Fullerton
desc: The best hotel we have ever been privileged enough to stay at. Gorgeous building, and it only gets more breathtaking when you walk in. High quality rooms, and excellent service from all hotel staff. We would like to make a special mention about Zep and all the Straits Club staff who served us, they where amazing and nothing was too much trouble, even serving us breakfast before they were open so we could make our flight to Australia. Thank you very much.

title: Gets better with each stay
desc: There are many great hotels in the world - some even claim to be the best. But I firmly believe for a 5 star hotel - it doesn’t get any better than The Fullerton. From arrival to departure - the experience is amazing. This was our 4th stay and it never disappoints and I actually believe it keeps getting better and better. The rooms are amazing (even the entry level premier courtyard rooms) the pool is a place of relaxation. Sall the pool attendant was great - as were the guest service staff who facilitated a late check out and left us a bottle of champagne in our room for being a returning guests (my partner also shares his surname with the hotel so is always treated like a king!) The location is top notch - walking distance to everything. Food, shops and major attractions.

title: 2nd Home
desc: As if 2nd home, every hotel staff greeted and could remember and called your name as passed by. I felt proud and honored. Amazingly, they made it a point to do it as little thought means so much. Not forgetting their attentiveness to details and served with smiles and passions. Also the amenities arranged in my room. They are Reservations : Sharon Front Office : Nicholas, Ravathi and Kate Straits Club Lounge : Warren, Lucy, Zepp, Ryan, Wahida and Jan Town Restaurant : Abigal, Edgar and Rosa Fullerton Express : Norma Pool : Sallikin Internet Dept : Elmore Indeed a 2nd home with warmth and comfort. Last but not least strongly recommended their Burnt Cheesecake which is the best in town based on my tasted bud

title: Wanna come back again, Fullerton
desc: Fullerton Hotel Had an awesome birthday staycation at Fullerton Hotel. Booked the Premier courtyard room that comes with 200 dining credits. Room was upgraded to Heritage room with balcony and marina bay view. We loved the room! Found the Fullerton bears waiting for us in the room. Nice. We did not swim as it was raining but visited the steam room and sauna room instead. We received complimentary birthday cake and wine when back in the room. Used the dining credits at Town restaurant. Very decent food. This is our 2nd year coming back for birthday stay. Might just return every year for birthdays

title: Top notch
desc: My wife and I spent three days at The Fullerton Singapore. By far, it is the best hotel we have ever experienced. Above all, service from staff was superior in friendliness and accommodation in every way. It is in an older building, but is totally modernized. Our room was spacious, with luxurious amenities. Their breakfast buffet was fabulous, in variety and quality, as was their special seafood buffet nights. Location is excellent. For a top notch hotel, rates were more affordable for what is offered. We highly recommend it.

title: Excellent services all round!
desc: Brilliant experience at the Fullerton Hotel, Singapore. Delicious food, sensitive and caring services from the concierge, gorgeous and well-cared for decor and services. Big shout out to Christine for fantastic thoughtfulness.

title: Highly Recommended
desc: I recently had the pleasure of enjoying a high tea buffet at The Courtyard, and it was an absolute delight experience! From the moment we arrived, the service was exceptional, as we were greeted warmly by the friendly staff and shown to our table. The buffet itself was a feast for the senses with plenty of purple sensations, and what I like about them are the vegan/vegetarian friendly menu selections, where sandwiches were fresh, scones with jam and cream were a highlight, and the purple desserts were so on-point as everything was beautifully presented! One thing that really stood out to me was the attention to detail as table settings were elegant with beautiful china and silverware. The atmosphere was relaxed and welcoming with a live performance from the harp. It was clear

title: The best choice to a perfect staycation in SG!
desc: Hotel staffs greeted and immediately helped us with our luggages. Very warm welcome from the front desk staffs and checkin was instantaneous. We were also given a complimentary ice cream tag (1 scoop daily) and Postmaster Bear keychain for my young 3YO todd. Such thoughtful, gentle and kind gestures towards young children. Thank you Angel & Terry! Your commitment to giving us a great experience staying with Fullerton Hotel has been extraordinary and a memorable one. Cleanliness is one of the very best amongst other hotels from, in room, concierge, dining hall, utensils etc. We enjoyed the Straits Club Breakfast, Afternoon Tea and Cocktail very much during our entire stay. It was exclusive and private with great selection of breakfast and tea to kickstart the day. PS, they

title: Classic, well-run, beautifully renovated and appointed hotel with a perfect location in the heart of Singapore.
desc: We enjoyed a wonderful four nights at this classic, beautifully renovated, maintained and staffed hotel. There would be little that could improve our stay. I originally booked a Heritage Room, but upon checking in I discovered these rooms have balconies with very high walls that you cannot see over. Therefore these rooms have no views. I asked about paying for an upgrade and was offered a Marina Bay view room for $100 a night more. It was so well worth the extra money. The room had a great view of the Marina Bay Sands hotel and the balcony was covered by a roof, so we could enjoy the view and stay dry on wet days. The room itself - while not big - was one of the best designed hotel rooms I’ve ever stayed in. The bed, bathroom, closets, and desk area were very well

title: The Brightest And The Best In Service, Style and Elegance
desc: Its hard to know where to start...From the doorman Ian who is empathetic, funny and knowledgeable to the professional concierge team with Mohammmed Afiz who preempt your desires before you ask such as complimentary umbrellas rather than use your own and the use of a shower before your evening flight home. The reception team who were able to accommodate a room for us as we had disembarked early from our ship. The rooms deluxe garden terrace were large, clean and plush with even a heated toilet seat that could also clean you at the touch of a button and fluffy pillows you can dive Into for the best night's sleep ever! Impeccable food, service and style perfect for my 50th birthday!

title: Fantastic location, beautiful hotel
desc: Beautiful hotel in a great location. We had a lovely 4 night stay in a courtyard view room. We were really impressed with the pool and pool towels. Breakfast is definitely worth paying the extra for as a lot of variety. Would definitely choose The Fullerton hotel again when we return to Singapore

title: Perfect Hotel Choice for Singapore .
desc: This hotel is a lovely restored post office with all to character intact . Perfectly located with views on Marina Bay and access to boat and bus tours. . Rooms are comfortable, food is excellent, great service and it’s worth the access to the Straits Lounge.

title: Superb
desc: The crew and staff are very accomodating. Nice and super friendly. Assistance is 100% excellent. Service friendly. The food is ok as well. We enjoyed our time dining. Excellent job performance. Good deal and worth the money. Not our first,

title: Impersonal & terrible check in experience!
desc: Good location at Marina & sensational views from balcony in Marina Bay Rooms. Otherwise we felt during our brief 2 night stay that there was a total indifference from most staff and our check in experience was so bad that we had to complain. THe Duty Manager listened & got us timely room service. The lack of an in house bar was also surprising. Generally the worst experience of our month away!

title: Wonderful experience in The Fullerton Hotel of Singapore
desc: We have a wonderful experience celebrate my birthday in The Fullerton Hotel of Singapore. Thank you very much for the Manager of The Fullerton Hotel, Mr. Lalikumar s/o Manickam's excellent service.

title: Regular guest
desc: I have been staying at The Fullerton on and off since 2016. The hotel is iconic and feels as if I am coming home. Lovely the bell boys remember you, makes you feel so welcome. New reception staff but they found my old bookings and preferences and looked after me. The breakfast team remember me which is amazing as so busy. And my coffee arrives at my table. I look forward to coming back in August and thank you Fullerton team for looking after me so well.

title: Fulfilling stay at The Fullerton
desc: We were fortunate to stay a couple of nights at The Fullerton Hotel, the hotel has maintained its tradition and whilst still meeting the demands of the modern traveller. It is a really great location with an MRT station just a short distance away and within walking distance of Clarke Quay and the many restaurants and bars along the banks of the Singapore River. The staff were very helpful and easy to get a taxi by ordering via the concierge. We stayed in the Marina Bay View Room , which gives you spectacular views of the light show across the bay at night and were able to enjoy the excellent breakfast buffet in the Town Restaurant , great ambiance and service.

title: Spectacular hotel
desc: The Fullerton is absolutely brilliant. Impeccable service, fantastic comfortable and spacious room. The staff at the club were wonderful. Onsite restaurants are excellent. It is also very well located- you can walk to many attractions and restaurants.

title: ABSOLUTELY AMAZING! Thanks to Liyana, Wahidah and Mariia.
desc: I’m not one for writing reviews but The Fullerton Hotel has certainly earned this very strongly positive review. I could not fault the hotel, room presentation and most importantly the people! I cannot rave enough about their superior performance and genuine care, all attributed to the very impressive Liyana – Club Manager from start to end. I had booked a room for a surprise proposal for our close friend. From point of contact, Liyana was absolutely amazing. She suggested us to upgrade our originally booked room with an additional fee, and what a great suggestion this was, the room was perfect for the occasion. This was a very last minute plan and we needed to execute this in less than 24 hours. But not once did Liyana made us feel rushed or declined our request, she always

title: A great experience in Singapore
desc: We had the pleasure of visiting Singapore in April 2023 and staying at The Fullerton Hotel. The experience exceeded all of our expectations. The Fullerton is located adjacent to Marina Bay, so we were able to take advantage of numerous nearby attractions. The hotel’s amenities were of the highest quality, and the tasteful decorations and beautiful flower arrangements throughout the hotel added to its charm. The hotel's attention to detail extended even to its fragrant ambiance, as it always smelled delightful. We had an early morning arrival and had fortunately arranged to check in early to the hotel, which was ideal after traveling for the previous 24 hours. Arriving to a room with a welcoming note and fruit plate hit the spot. Our hotel room faced the Bay, so we were

title: Nice but pricey
desc: Good location, attentive service, amazing pool and breakfast. Overpriced in my view. Twin rooms are single beds, not doubles as is the case in other hotels. Some have bricked in windows (room 546 from memory). I was moved after complaining twice (as I was staying 6 nights), but you’d be unimpressed if staying any longer than a night in that room.

title: My Love Birthday Celebration
desc: Last May 2022, my wife and I as regular guests stayed at Fullerton Hotel. I celebrated my Love memorable birthday here. However, also begin to notice my health condition issue. After a year of treatment(Positive mind). My first thought was to celebrate her Birthday here again (27 April to 1 May 2023). Sincerely, thanks her as my Caregiver for a year of caring and enduring the stress of my journey to recovery : ) Sharon’s always assisted the booking for our favourite Marina Bay View room. Full view of marina bay was stunning. Cosy outdoor balcony with beautiful scenic. The housekeeper always maintain our room well organised, cleaned and tidy twice daily. : ) During our stayed, we met 2 new managers and a staff. Maria (Guests Relation Manager) and Liyana (Straits Club Manager),

title: Great experience by the river
desc: The service was great with friendly staffs smiling and helpful with my questions. The room was clean except the chair at the working desk. There were a few obvious hairs stubbornly stuck at the rim surrounding the seat and I have to use tissue paper to pull them out before I was uncomfortable enough to sit on the chair. Other than that it was a great stay in the room. I must compliment the bed and pillow - very comfortable. The massage at Fullerton Spa was great too. I like the high tea at the courtyard and having a drink at the outdoor dining area at night. Chilling and having breakfast at the swimming pool was great.

title: Happy Staycation In Fullerton Hotel Singapore!
desc: Gorgeous stay at this fabulous hotel in Singapore! My family enjoyed the staycation at here. I also achieved my dream hotel staying list in my life. Just a little unpleasant thing happen when we had the breakfast. The stir fried mushroom breakfast already had black charcoal stick together. Other than this all is perfect!

title: Wonderful hotel
desc: The toilet was absolutely outstanding as it was heated with a menu of wash and dry. The pillow that I had was amazing and the free ice cream was nice and soft. Andrew yip the receptionist was a ginormous help.

title: Service, ambiance, character with 5 star everything
desc: Why would you want to stay anywhere other than The Fullerton. Five Star luxury and five star service. Historical building oozing character and ambiance. Excellent location near Cavanagh Bridge, walking distance of many major attractions including the picturesque Clarke’s Quay, Garden on the Bay, Marina Bay, Raffles Square and much more. Close to a major MRT underground station with easy access to the wider regions of Singapore. Wouldn’t stay anywhere else.

title: Disappointing customer service
desc: We stayed at the Fullerton for 3 nights in February from the 6th-9th. On the last night we had the buffet at the hotel including shellfish. My husband contracted food poisoning and was very unwell. We were travelling to New Zealand next day and the manager Darshan Lionel kindly arranged for us to have a room until our flight that evening. However my husband continued to be unwell and investigations in New Zealand confirmed he’d contracted Vibrio Vulinificus. I contacted Darshan Lionel to inform him, but have had absolutely no response. We only are in the hotel that last day, so this was not contracted from any other source than the Fullerton hotel.

title: Satisfied
desc: Excellent customer service from the check-in to dining. The Courtyard restaurant offers a variety of delicious meals. Great location and easy access to many attractions.Quite historical place and well maintained. Highly recommended

title: A fallen great
desc: The experience wasn't great. Service average, staff seemed distracted, it looked tired and just not what you expect for the high price and reputation. Time for a change. This was one of the great hotels and now seems to be joining a chorus of hotels wanting to make money as quickly as possible as the world re-opens.

title: Excellent and impeccable service
desc: Definitely worth the visit. Service across the board was also incredibly impressive- particularly from manager Shazwan, whom I would like to thank for the exceptional service. Staff in general are also all very friendly, approachable, and accommodating. Truly one for the books.

title: Thank you Nicholas
desc: Thank you Nicholas (from town restaurant & bar) for going above and beyond to assist me for a kids event as I faced last minute registration challenges. The kids had lots of fun and this was made possible with his dedicated assistance! Many thanks and appreciate the prompt support.

title: the best view of singapore
desc: we traveled from Spain to Singapore with my family, we were very pleased, we chose the best hotel in the country, we liked it very much and the model of the hotel built in an antique way, we love you very much, we will come to visit again! have a good time!

title: Beautiful hotel & staff ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
desc: The Service was fantastic. Joey, Lali, thinn, were fantastic & they went over an above what our expectations⭐️🌟. I add the Bed could have had a topper for extra comfort apart from Perfect. Look forward to our return.

title: Impeccable Service
desc: This is the property that I have been recommending to friends and colleagues for its rich history and other words of mouth. A few occasions had been planned in the past, however, only this time was materialised as a one-night stacay. My family of four decided to stay at a Palladian Suite. We checked in at Room 777 which has some utmost stunning view of the Marina Bay with the Sands light show right in front of the living room and balcony. We were told this is the most popular Suite during F1 race. Although the Palladian Suite is not huge compared to suites offered by other high-end hotels in town, it is tastefully appointed with much pride of its history fused into the decorations while not sacrificing the modernity (ample USB charging outlets, powered curtain and blind control

title: Amazing Afternoon High Tea at the Courtyard
desc: Lovely afternoon tea at the Courtyard. We had the vegetarian set. Started with the fresh scones, butter and jam and thenon to the 3 tier set. And the ambience was enhanced by the live music by the harpist. The warm service with a smile, by Mr Lali Kumar and his team, were the best! And made the day for my wife's birthday with a lovely cake and the birthday day song on the harp! Definitely looking forward to coming back!

title: Thanks for accommodating our family to make the high tea memorable
desc: The staff accommodated the dietary needs of our family. One of our family members is vegetarian. The setting is in the main lobby. Which is very modern and yet reflects the British heritage. If there is one thing that could be improved is that they could include more savory items. Overall loved the experience

My sis and me first time here. Really worth for money, highly recommended & will definitely come back again. The staff here are very nice and warm too. Looking forward to my next visit here perhaps bring more people.

title: A wonderful hotel with very attentive and helpful staff.
desc: We so enjoyed our stay at the Fullerton in 2009 we had to return and found the hotel staff and service even more enjoyable than our earlier visit. Every thing was perfect. We had afternoon tea and were treated to a lovely and varied selection of sweet and savoury food the staff as always were attentive and helpful. I would highly recommend this hotel and the afternoon tea experience.

title: 5 star experience
desc: The room was very quiet, clean and spacious. Style-wise it’s old school, but being timeless is the point of this hotel. Breakfast is what you expect it to be at this level, however make sure your pancakes are fresh. The pool is very warm at 30C, so it doesn’t refresh you that much, but the view over Singapore river is nice. You can have access to the pool and showers even after checking out, which is very nice amenity if your flight leaves in the evening only.

title: A true 5 star experience
desc: I’d originally booked Marina Bay Sands but after reading reviews switched to the Fullerton. I did not regret it! Such a fab hotel - nice touch of luxury and have thoroughly enjoyed my stay here. The rooms are well proportioned and staff are wonderful. Special shout to Daniel who worked by the pool. Super friendly and professional. A wonderful experience all around

title: History, location and top notch service!
desc: I’ve stayed in Singapore a few times, including at Raffles twice, and the Fullerton was definitely our best experience. Great location, service, and I loved the historic element. Book the hotel’s heritage tour (complimentary), it’s really interesting. We had dinner at Jade (excellent) and ate breakfast in the buffet restaurant which was extensive and delicious. We also tried the cake boutique which was fun. The pool is lovely and I could have spent several more hours people watching from the pool terrace but we had a lot to pack in. Next time I will plan a longer stay. Despite this being my fourth visit to Singapore, two nights/three days wasn’t long enough. Our only disappointment was check out which was chaotic. An overcharge on the bill was quickly resolved but it took ages

title: Best massage I’ve ever had. Ask for Sara!
desc: Best massage I’ve ever had! Relaxing and re-energizing. You are greeted with tea . I had Sara as my masseuse and she asked a lot of questions beforehand to make sure the experience was personalized for me. It was absolutely amazing. I feel completely relaxed and refreshed after my massage. I will be back!

title: Tea on Friday Afternoon.
desc: Only went for Tea but the ambience was lovely! Very nice scones and sandwiches, beautiful harp playing and very good service. Would definitely recommend for a calm afternoon Tea. Try the pistachio coffee!

title: Top notch service
desc: The reception and service was top notch! They went above and beyond our expectations. We felt the air con was not functioning well but immediately they took our feedback and got the technician down.They served us refreshing drinks to combat the warmness while they are servicing the aircon .The manager was simply so friendly and accomodating.Thanks for the excellent service

title: Enjoyable experience because of warm staff.Food experience could improve.
desc: We booked 2 rooms for 6 days at the hotel. Our stay with family of 5 was enjoyable mostly because of the warm welcome by staff member - Christine at the reception.Her hospitality was top notch to make our senior citizen parents and brother(recently fractured before the trip) comfortable while handling early check-in process. For us Indians, staff behavior and kindness at times takes precedence over top service qualities .Her humane qualities of arranging hot tea for my parents and ensuring proper room allocation for us along with smooth check-in process had a great first impression for us .We enjoyed our 5+1 days stay at the Fullerton because of the convenient room allocations. We equally enjoyed warm welcome and chats with Zian and Mathew .Their joyful nature left a lasting

title: Professional service made my stay comfortable
desc: When I visited Singapore to see a concert, I considered either MBS or The Fullerton Hotel, and chose the Fullerton Hotel because it is a historical building. Actually, there was a slight problem with the room I had originally selected, so when I consulted with the front desk, they responded immediately. In particular, the manager, Ms. Revathy, was very attentive, and she immediately made me feel comfortable because she took care of me more than I expected. She is professional. During my stay, Ms. Crystal at the front desk always greeted me with a warm smile and made me feel at ease. She is professional, too. These two staff were very helpful. I will stay at Fullerton again when I go to Singapore next time.

title: Beautiful Iconic Hotel
desc: This was our first stay at this beautiful iconic hotel, we have visited Singapore before but stayed at a different hotel We had 3wonderful night’s stay in a heritage room with Straits club access , our room was large with a view of Marina bay sands , we were on the 4th floor The location of the hotel is excellent right next to Merilion Park and easy walking distance to many sights The club lounge was excellent, breakfast was a large buffet of hot and cold food also with a menu to order from too The afternoon tea was delicious, we only did this once during our stay as we were out sightseeing In the evening again there was a large buffet with hot and cold food and desserts, with cocktails, champagne and wines etc We found the quality of the food and drinks was excellent and

title: great hotel lovely staff
desc: Had a few days at this hotel super time was had by all, food absolutely fabulous and big portions. take care when using the pool as the steps are set in the wall of the pool which makes it a little difficult if like me your knees are not very good. but other than that great time, the staff are so helpful and very friendly. lots to do in Singapore and all close by, see the history of the hotel very interesting

title: Amazing stay
desc: We got married here 12 years ago and wanted to make this a special occasion. The Fullerton team, Sarah and Christine made is very special from the moment we stepped in until we leave. Thank you very much for all your efforts and kindness. We had a wonderful time at The Fullerton Hotel.

title: Great choice
desc: Incredible restaurant! Food superb and service even better! Good room. Had a snag with the coffee machine which was rectified within 15 mins of making the call. Great location in the city. Overall strong recommend!

title: Impressive Service
desc: I attended a wedding lunch at The Fullerton on 21 May 2023 at 12pm at The Ball Room. To cut the story short, a few moments after I was seated I spilled red wine all over my white shirt. Thought nothing much I could do but to either leave early or stay on and endure the embarrassment. To my pleasant surprise came Mr. Indra, who I understand was the Senior Assistant Manager for Banguet, to the rescue. He arranged for a shirt that fitted perfectly for me to change and sent my stained shirt to the laundry for cleaning. In a couple of hours when the wedding ended my shirt was ready without any hint of a disastrous accident and nicely ironed. A big thanks to Indra and the whole team who worked behind the scene to help me. Let me say that this incident did not just impressed me

title: Could Of, Should Of, Would Of
desc: Decided to take a quick long weekend trip to visit some family and friends in Singapore Opted for Fullerton as I have yet to experience this property. The direct reservation was cumbersome as I had to interact with four (4) different reservation associate. Which in turn made for some miscommunication and delays in reply. Check-In was standard My room request was honoured but was not informed that a slight staircase was within the room. Room was spacious and well appointed Breakfast had a good selection but some items was not replenished during peak hours Over a pleasant stay.

title: Great!
desc: Christine from level 4 is very helpful and nice,, enjoy the stay of 11 days here! There is a very good housekeeping guy at level 5. A bit sad that there is no toto washlet at level 4. Will definitely come here again! I got lucky that my room is facing the swimming pool. Didnt get the chance to enjoy sauna and steam room. Maybe next time!

title: SECOND TIME'S A CHARM.
desc: I had the pleasure of being guest at Fullerton to celebrate my small wins . The management and staff were impeccable, and the service was totally exceptional. Indeed. I would highly recommend to visit the Straight Lounge for anyone wishing to spent a me time like me, it's always good to be back in Fullerton. Fullerton lived up it's reputation. As one of the Luxurious Hotel in Singapore. Compliments to the team for making my experience so wonderful. Thanks to Jen, for serving my cup of coffee, Liyana for making sure that everything is fine and always checking if i need assistance. Zep, for taking my photos. I would definitely be back, hopefully with my family. Again, thank you for making my stay so memorable. Best, Achilles

title: Memorable anniversary stay
desc: My wife and I stayed at the Fullerton for our anniversary and we have always selected Fullerton since we tied the know at the same hotel in 2017. We were greeted with a pleasant surprise when the room was well decorated for us with balloons and flower petals. During every visit to the reception, including during checkin, the staff wished us happy anniversary which was a very welcoming gesture. We will definitely come back next year for our wedding anniversary.

title: Excellent service
desc: We had high tea at courtyard. Service by Lalikumar and team was awesome . He’s very friendly , smiley and go the extra mile for us . Ensuring that our experience is enjoyable. A huge thank you from us!! :)

title: Fantastic Stay
desc: We had a wonderful stay at the Fullerton - the staff are exceptional and it is our favourite hotel to stay at in Singapore. We had a wonderful Mothers Day celebration by also having high tea at the Fullerton with our son, the selection of food was excellent.

title: Wonderful experience which exceeded all of my expectations
desc: I've heard many good things about Fullerton Hotel and decided to book a night to use it as my wedding proposal venue. When I called in mentioning this prior to my stay, assistant front officer manager, Mr Shazwan actually surprised me by going the extra mile by trying to compliment my proposal experience through upgrading my room w a view of the fireworks since there was gonna be some due to rehearsals for the national day parade. Upon entering the room, we were given 2 complimentary sets of bear dolls - Lizzy and Henry; mascot of Fullerton Hotel as seen from the lobby entrance where they were dressed in their explorer and wedding attire to which my partner really liked it a lot. And let me elaborate on the amazing view given where we could see Singapore River along w the

title: High Tea at Fullerton Hotel Courtyard
desc: Had high tea at Fullerton Hotel Courtyard. The service by all the staff is fantastic, attentive to your needs and always willing to help. The food is also good although it is a waste that they have removed the semi-buffet option

title: Well deserved 5 stars…
desc: Stayed here for three nights as a stop-over on our way to Europe. We had a room on the atrium side and it was just fine. This is a class hotel - from the staff, to the heated auto toilet seat and every amenity in the room you’d require. Bed was comfortable. The breakfast buffet catered for every cuisine and the room service menu was extensive (though we didn’t use it). Once you orientated yourself it was a great location, with a number of access points on the B1 level that would get you to the station or Fullerton One on the marina without having to go outside. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Wonderful Stay & Experience
desc: Took my family for a Singapore getaway and I'm so glad we decided on The Fullerton.
