Staff services were superb, from doorman to housekeeping to Straits Club team whose efficiency and friendliness made for a truly memorable week. I have stayed in many wonderful hotels in Singapore but this one is my new favorite. Special thanks to all the club lounge team members (a lovely team set for success). Do yourself a favour and book yourself a room here.

title: Will come back again
desc: Had a short staycation at Fullerton hotel straits club room, room is nicely made and club lounge was amazing, I really enjoyed my time here, Christine from the lounge is a great host and she made decent gin and tonic, thank you for the hospitality

title: One of the greatest hotels in the world
desc: The title of this review tells you what we feel about this hotel. And yes we have been lucky enough to stay at some amazing places. But this hotel just has some thing intangible that enables us to make the claim in the title. Previously, we had stayed here as a couple; this time it was as part of a conference. The wonderful thing is that it doesn’t matter in what capacity you’re staying, you are treated as if you are the only people that matter. I was made to feel this particularly, as it was my birthday during our stay and it was lovely to have a card, balloons, cake and of course fizz! Small touches that really bring home what a quality hotel this is, and the generous spirit within them. As ever, the service in the Straits Club was outstanding. This truly is the jewel In The

title: Understated Elegance
desc: My granddaughter and I arrived from Australia and had the most wonderful stay at The Fullerton Singapore and I just wanted to thank all the staff who looked after us so well. Reception, The Concierge and the man who stood in the heat, dressed beautifully to get us our taxis. We dined in our room twice and just had the most relaxing and enjoyable stay. The Hotel is beautiful and understated elegance but it’s the staff who make the experience, so Thankyou, each and everyone.

title: Best hotel in Singapore
desc: Staffs are so heartwarming . Take good care of your needs. Very strong team 🥰 Krish, liyana, Zep, rhea, Ryan, Maria . Thank you so much we feel so much love and care. Will be back 🥰🥰🥰💪💪 See you soon 🥰🥰

title: Simple luxurious - perfect stay at the heart of Singapore
desc: I have been greeted from the moment I got off from my airport transfer. (Feel very welcoming !) then I proceeded to check in which was so smooth and quick. My room is on the second floor, same level as the pool and easy access to the spa. Very convenient for my mum so she doesn’t need to walk so far. The room is so spacious, simply luxurious. The amenities : TWG tea and Nespresso. Filter water also is ready. The bed is also comfortable. Everything work well in the bathroom too, strong water for shower, big tub (would be good to have bath salt ) the toiletries are so well prepared. I don’t think I need to pack my own stuffs if I stay here for a few nights. In the morning, I wet for the breakfast at town restaurant. Mum and I truly enjoy the local spread from kopi, teh all

title: 5 Star Experience
desc: this is the perfect hotel. good location, extremely nice and professional staff, very well maintained hotel with great facilities. we have stayed in different hotels during our travels in singapore in the past but once you experience the quality that this hotel offers, you won't look anywhere else

title: Amazing experience and a friendly staff
desc: I had the pleasure of staying at the Fullerton Hotel in Singapore and it is one of the best hotels I’ve stayed in. Room was spacious and luxurious. Delicious breakfast buffet and a very polite and helpful staff. Daniel from in-room dining was very friendly and always greeted with a smile. I had very pleasant interactions with him. June from housekeeping was also very friendly, dedicated and proactive and kept checking if I needed anything. I had a very pleasant stay here and looking forward to my next stay here.

title: Amazing and wonderful customer service
desc: Special thanks to Connie Keung Pui Fan, who greeted us at the front desk and decorated our room for our child's first birthday. She even went out of her way to surprise our eldest daughter as well. We appreciate her efforts in brightening our children's days, as well as her support and assistance in our check-in process. Our check-in experience would not have been as pleasant and smooth without her. Thank you so much, Connie! :) We also had a great time at the Straits Club Lounge. Jen and Christine's excellent service is deeply appreciated. They are amazing people that provide lots of joy to our children. My eldest child is always asking if she can go back and look for them. Thank you so much, Jen and Christine! :) Thank you so much to Thu Thu as well for his positive attitude

title: Excellent service with Ms Lin
desc: I had an excellent time at Fullerton Hotel. Especially Ms Lin in Courtyard, she is very friendly and gives me good service. I enjoyed myself there. Highly recommendation for everyone! It’s deserved to spend our holiday there. Thank you again for your good service

title: Amazing customer service
desc: I had booked a room many months before travel and, taking advice from Tripadvisor reviews, I requested a room on the highest floor possible to be able to appreciate the views. When we arrived we were told it had not been possible to give us a top floor room so we had been upgraded to a suite on the second floor instead. It was magnificent, spread over two floors and beautifully decorated. We had a shower and waited for our bags, and waited, and waited. I could not work out how to ring reception so my husband was forced to get back into his grubby clothes to go down to investiage. Meanwhile I got a call from reception asking if our bags had arrived. I admit that I was a bit shirty with them because we had been waiting over an hour. The bags then arrived extremely promptly,

title: Beautiful 5 star hotel with exceptional service
desc: The staff, accommodation and food at the Fullerton are exceptional. The facilities are well cared for and extensive. Highly recommend booking rooms in the straits club lounge where you have champagne breakfast and cocktails with dinner all included

title: Excellent choice for your Singapore holiday
desc: Very close to several tourist spots, convenient to just hop, skip, and jump away from bus stops and must-see sights like the National Gallery and the shops along the Singapore River. It made it easy for us to explore the city. The suite was fantastic and the views of the iconic Marina Bay and the landmark Singapore skyline across was a delight to see at night and a welcome treat every morning - the vista from our room was simply breathtaking. An added treat was the majestic lobby interiors of the inner courtyard. The property is truly amazing and a Singapore design icon! Your team really made the entire experience feel like our home and the personal touches like the welcome cake, a bottle of wine as well as platter of fruits, really made us feel welcome and were very much

title: Fabulous customer service
desc: What an incredible experience we had at The Fullerton Hotel in Singapore Beautiful hotel & pool area. But most of all wonderful customer service by Andrew Yip. Friendly, very accommodating and going above and beyond to make sure that we have a great experience. We look forward to coming back again

title: Luxury in the centre of Singapore
desc: A superb, iconic hotel that is centrally located. From check in to check out our experience was seamless. The staff were professional and helpful. The room, though slightly on the small side (but it is Singapore) was at the high standard we expected. The lobby and interior areas are impressive. The location is perfect, right by Marina Bay and close to public transportation. We booked a special deal that included dining credit, which we were able to use at the nearby Lantern restaurant (part of the Fullerton Bay Hotel). Of course this isn't one of the most economical hotels to stay at in Singapore, but if you're only in the city for a day or two and want that bit of luxury and convenience, it's a great choice. I can't think of anything to complain about.

title: Excellent hotel
desc: I accidentally left my necklace in the hotel room when I checked out.On the next day I contacted the manager and they kindly helped me find it.Much appreciated.We will be back if traveling in Singapore next time.

title: Amazing hotel and staff
desc: My husband and I stayed at the Fullerton for 10 nights for our wedding anniversary. From the moment we walked into the beautiful hotel we were greeted with such friendliness from all the staff, nothing was too much trouble. After we had checked in we went up to our room where we were greeted with the iconic fullerton teddy bears, balloons and a cake. Our room and view was perfection, loved all the eateries and history that was part of this iconic hotel, the pool was very relaxing with gorgeous views of the river. Highly recommend staying at this beautiful hotel.

title: The perfect experience
desc: The food is very delicious The staff are very polite The surrounding is very peaceful with a very chill vibe with the relaxing music with brings the very traditional vibe of Singapore Overall a very good experience and 100000000000% worth it

title: Amazing stay at the fullerton, excellent service, impressive room
desc: Stayed in a massive and luxurious Palladian Suite that far exceeded my expectations. The suite is easily among the best (if not the best) hotel suites that I have stayed in and was extremely spacious. View was great, although it would have been nice if we were allocated a suite with similarly clear/distinct partitions, but also with a nice balcony for clearer view and pictures of the fireworks. The hotel was also very kind to accede to our birthday request of cake and even provided us with a bottle of Veuve Clicquot champagne for the occasion. Also loved the balmain bath amenities and bacha coffee. The room was also nicely decorated and the hotel certainly spared no expense in attempting to make the stay as memorable as possible Gym was also very large and well-equipped.

title: A wonderful return visit
desc: We haven’t been able to return to Singapore since pre covid and once again we have been able to enjoy the Fullerton. The location is perfect, rooms have been refurbished wonderfully over Covid and the staff are plain excellent. Singapore is blessed with many high end hotels to choose from so it comes down to preferences. This reminds us of a high quality European hotel with the indulgences of Singapore. Who can top that? Like everywhere, prices are up substantially since the start of Covid, but again, where hasn’t this happened? If you want to be pampered in a classic way, treat yourself to a stay here. We had a Marina Bay room and it is definitely worth it.

title: Bagus
desc: Just stayed at heritage hotel THE FULLERTON. Service was impeccable at the front desk as well as at the Straits Club where the staff remembered us as guests and were thoughtful in their service. Special commendation to staff Christine at the Club. Enjoyed our evening dip in the Infinity Pool overlooking the Singapore River. Location was good for its proximity to tourist attractions like Merlion and shopping havens MBS and Marina Square.

title: Exceptional guest experience
desc: The staff were the absolute best. We celebrated my mum's 75th birthday. Every need was cared for. Connie,Joshua,Ryan, Christina from the Staits Privledge Club were extremely kind,professional and exceptional. This is our second trip and it will not be our last. Excellent service and attention to detail Best Hotel and staff in Singapore.

title: Wonderful service in Fullerton Hotel
desc: I take great pleasure in writing the following in appreciation of the wonderful stay my partner and I had at the Fullerton Hotel situated at Fullerton Square in Singapore. The professionalism and hospitality shown to us by all, made our stay in June 2023 truly memorable. While I am unfortunately unable to remember the names of everyone, I would like to take this opportunity of thanking Liyana Said, Christine Loong and Joshua from the Straits Club Lounge for their hospitality and Senior Concierge Zain Salleh for his assistance with the Airline early check-in. We highly recommend this hotel to anyone planning a visit to Singapore. Gilbert Solomon

title: Must try Club Lounge at The Fullerton
desc: Stayed at the Straits Club. It’s been the best Club Lounge we’ve experienced-professional and personalized service, all staff are very friendly and attentive, great food and clean rooms. But I have to say this, thanks to the great team of the Club Lounge that are professional, courteous and will make you feel you’re home. A real must try!

title: A big thank you to the Staff st The Fullerton Hotel.
desc: My wife and I enjoyed a wonderful two night stopover in Singapore on our way to Europe. Our junior suite at the Fullerton hotel was exquisitely appointed with captivating views and the hotel location on the waterfront meant that we could enjoy a number of walks in the vicinity. However, the highlight for us was the courtesy, kindness and desire to please shown by every staff member we encountered; from the attentive doorman who found us an umbrella, to Andrew, the front office manager who arranged a 12 hr. checkout extension so we could remain at the Hotel for the day rather than leave early for our 2am flight to Rome!

title: It’s not even my Birthday and I’m still as excited as the birthday friend!
desc: I did a 1-night staycation to celebrate a friend’s birthday! The service and loyalty recognition here were simply more than I could expect! From a complimentary late checkout to many surprising elements such as an upgrade and nice interaction, It has been one of my all-time favorite hotels to stay at, even when living in Singapore. It’s really great that iprefer having Fullerton as part of the extensive network! The Straits Club was a gem and the highlight of the stay. The experiences were double that during the COVID days. Both my friends and I enjoyed the champagne breakfast, afternoon tea, and evening cocktail. They serve authentic scones that are moist, soft on the inside, and crusty on the outside. The lounge team made a huge difference in the entire experience! Siti,

title: Great experience
desc: Great experience: exquisite service, great food, great location, very nice rooms, beautiful swimming pool. One of the oldest buildings of Singapore, the old post office. We would love to come back! We would recommend it to everyone (and the members club as well) Special thanks to Siri and Krish.

title: Loved the Fullerton, would definitely come back again!
desc: The hotel is classy with wonderful staff - the room we stayed in is super nice with a balcony view of Marina Bay Sands. The pool is quite nice as well - and the hotel offers shower rooms in the mezzanine for guests who already checked out to use before your flight when you come back to pick up your luggage, because it can get quite humid in Singapore which is super thoughtful and a first in my experiences.

title: My 1st amazing stay with The Fullerton Singapore
desc: It was my first leisure stay but it turned out to be very enjoyable with my first stay experience. Big KUDOs to the team at the Straits Club Lounge. My stay was made memorable from the exceptional personal service from the moment i stepped in to i leave. Please convey my sincere thanks to the staff: Crystal at Reception, Liyana, Siti, Zep, Christine, Joshua, Jen. I want to commend Christine for wowing me every time she saw me at the lounge giving me surprises with all the WOW moments. She truly is a service start to the hotel. I will definitely be back again for my many stays.

title: Great
desc: Great hospitality. Front desk Christine attended to me quite well and fast. Concierge was great and helpful esp the uncle doorman was superb in greetings us and welcoming. Food was good and staff was attentive

title: Fullerton SG
desc: I love the rustic and luxurious feel of the hotel.. The room is homey, has huge space and has a very nice view... I also love how calm and peaceful it is to go home to at night..The food and service is great 🥰 I definitely would love to come back ❤️

title: Perfect stay at the Fullerton hotel.
desc: The hotel is stunning, beautiful with perfect location for business and leisure. The staff was very attentive and kind. Especially, the front desk and the concierge team. I would like to mention Rafi and Aaron! The rooms are spacious and comfortable. My only comment would be about the breakfast that was good but didn’t meet the hotel high standards. Can’t wait to come back.

title: Memorable hi-tea
desc: We enjoyed the traditional hi-tea (3 persons, with one person's a vegetarian type/version). The staff - Lin, Natt, and Rose - were attentive and pleasant, the food and coffee were very delicious and aromatic, beautifully presented 💕

title: Stunningly grand
desc: Stunningly grand hotel. The building is certainly eye catching but the inside is lovely as well. Our room on the 5th floor had the most amazing view of the bay. The room was spacious and comfortable, modern and clean. The breakfast buffet was great and the pool was glorious. Loved every minute of our stay here

title: Rhea and Liyana made our trip a fairy tale ❤️
desc: Had the opportunity to stay in a straits club room at the Fullerton recently. Obviously we can’t say enough about the beauty of Fullerton itself, but I’d like to take a moment to give a special and whole hearted commendation to the wonderful Rhea, and her manager Liyana at The Straits Club. Right from the moment we checked into our room, Rhea was there with the most stunning smile and the most helpful comments. Within 30 minutes, she made The Straits Club feel like home. Upon chatting, we discovered she had only been working here for a grand total of 5 days!!! The Fullerton has an incredibly high standard for customer care, and Rhea carried on their values with effortless grace and ease. I would come back just to have the chance to interact with her again. In addition to Rhea,

title: Lunch to remember
desc: Delicious lunch Wonderful service Fantastic ambience in the refurbished building that once housed the GPO. An oasis by the mouth of the Singapore river to escape the oppressive humidity and relax. Overall a memorable experience

title: Uniquely wonderful.
desc: Once again, a wonderful stay. The building is unique, the staff are delightful and surely the pool has one of the best views going. Easy, convenient and just makes you feel good. A late dinner at The Twon restaurant was great too. Sugu at the front door was especially lovely. We’ll be back.

title: A hotel that is more then a blast from the past
desc: Have ran and cycled past this hotel on numerous occasions. My Granddad work as a postal officer at this very location in the 50s. As fate would have it, I was receiving an award at the Fullerton Bay. Wife and I decided to stay a night. It was a great decision. Wonderful deco, reminiscent of the old days. Great service by ever attentive staff. Room was good, the F&B outlets served good local fare.

title: An unforgettable experience
desc: It's always pleasant to be greeted with warm smiles and to enjoy the brilliant services offered by the Fullerton's hotel staffs. The staffs were professional and attentive, tending to our every requirements. As it was also my birthday, one of the staff - Christine who served us, had taken special care to accommodate to our requirements, and kindly offered us an upgraded stay. The room was pristine and came with a splendid view which we really appreciated. In short, the service was great. Food-wise, the food offered at the Straits Club was authentic to the Singaporean taste and we really enjoyed the ambience in the club, one that was tastefully decorated to fit the colonial theme offered by the Fullerton Hotel Singapore. The amenities (the gym) was also spacious and well

title: Excellent hotel and location
desc: Excellent service, excellent people, fabulous location, very comforatble rooms and good food. Bar a couple of little hiccups on check out (the mobile checkout service wasnt working and I got sent someone elses invoice as well as my own), it's a really good location and I have to say, having popped in to the Fullerton on the Bay, this hotel was far better as it had a better atmosphere and more character. Whether you're staying for business or pleasure - even if it's just a few days, I would very much recommend this hotel!

title: AMAZING AMAZING AMAZING
desc: We stayed at The Fullerton Hotel for 2 weeks in a Quay Room (687) with a brilliant view over Marina Bay. This was our second time staying at the amazing 5* hotel and wouldn't think of staying anywhere else! The room was comfortable with immaculate presentation. The location is excellent for walking to Marine Bay Sands, Gardens By The Bay and Boat/Clark Quays with amazing restaurants. The MRT Station is also just around the corner. Food-wise The Straits Club offers good authentic Singaporean foods along with evening cocktails. The ever friendly staff are always ready to share their knowledge and recommendations of the many sites to see around Singapore. A great big thankyou to Joshua, Christine, Liyana, Krish, Jen, Anais, Zep, Ryan, Rhea - all who tendered to our daily

title: Staycation
desc: Received an upgrade to a Straits Club room instead of the normal room that we got, the Straits Club benefits were amazing, though the room was slightly dated, but the perks surely made up for it. Thanks Malo at the reception for helping me with the upgrade, would definitely recommend a stay there

title: Impeccable services!
desc: Dear Kate Joe Thanx for the amazing surprise birthday arrangements. You had made my business trip very memorable. The attention to details and the amazing hospitality under your team was impeccable. I look forward to the outstanding services again on my next visit:) Thanx Brian lee

title: Beautiful and a super charming Hotel with the best and attentive staff!
desc: A very beautiful hotel and the best staff ever! I just would like to highlight the professionalism and efficiency of Mr. Lalikumar from the Restaurant and Mrs. Pei Pei. Looking forward to coming again soon.

title: Memorable stay 🌞
desc: We decided to have a staycation in the same location where we had our wedding because it was such a fantastic experience. We planned our stay around the National Day preview period and were pleasantly surprised when we had a perfect view of the fireworks from our balcony. During our stay, we enjoyed the comfort of a loft suite and had access to the straits club, which added to the luxury of our time there. Christine, the staff member attending to us, made our stay even more enjoyable by taking care of our breakfast and afternoon tea needs. She was attentive, regularly checking on us, and provided valuable recommendations on the best dishes to try. Our stay was so delightful that we've decided to make it a tradition to come back every year for our anniversary.

title: Beautiful 5-Star Iconic Hotel near the river.
desc: We stayed for 3 nights and booked 2 rooms for our family. Location is good and view around the river nearby is very nice and pretty. Room size is ok and clean but compared to other 5-star hotels in SG, this room is smaller in size. Room rate was quite pricey but majority of SG Hotels room rates have increased quite significantly.

title: Good service
desc: To celebrate my friend's birthday, I visited Fullerton Hotel singapore Town Restaurant for dinner. The food explanation and service were excellent from the moment they were guided to the seat to the time they ordered. Especially, Miss Cherry gave us a birthday cake as a surprise and it became a memorable event for us. The food is really good and I want to visit the town again to celebrate my anniversary.

title: Amazing stay @ The Fullerton
desc: Despite the long wait for the room. The service from the front desk was amazing. From the setup to the membership to birthday arrangement. Thanx you Malo for making my business stay memorable @ the Fullerton sg Merci Brian Lee

title: Good to stay comfortable, good service.
desc: I like this hotel. Is convenient to go many place. easy to walk to the marina bay, hotel is comfortable good service I have a good time with a service. of 2 person waitress make me impressed. she name thinn. and monni both of she had a service mind. excellent choice to come stay this hotel. I recommend

title: Great Stay
desc: I stayed at the Fullerton hotel for a week from 7th to 14th July. The hotel was booked by my company as part of the my 5 day training in Singapore. I had 2 different bookings so I stayed in 2 different room. The room for the initial 2 days was huge without a balcony and not a great view. The room for the following 5 days was astounding. The room was smaller compared to the earlier room but had a balcony and a beautiful view of the Marina Bay. The entire staff at the hotel were really courteous. Everyone from the concierge to front desk, housekeeping and room service staff took pride in their job. The rooms were super clean and the food at the hotel is really good. You can actually use the underground tunnel in the hotel to go across to see the Merlion. The boat quay is barely 5

title: Great stay
desc: We stayed 3 nights at this beautiful hotel! Love the history behind it(being an old post office) The views from our balcony were beautiful. The breakfast was delicious. So many options to choose from. Omelettes, yogurt, fresh fruit, fresh juices, noodle dishes, salads, cereal, cheese, an assortment of meats, doughnuts, pancakes, waffles and the list goes on. Even an ice cream bar! Cappuccinos lattes. Service was great. Beds were comfy! Easy walking area to food and site seeing. The only thing I will say is the room was kinda small for three of us. We had a king and an extra bed for our 18 year old. He’s at the age where it’s nice to have privacy for him and for us! The room was listed as quay room and booked by our Audley travel agent. I think it would be perfect if you had

title: Regal and classy
desc: Very nice hotel. The room although small is extremely clean and cosy All necessary items found in room from safe, fridge, iron with board, Nespresso machine. Tv has some cable and room comes with free wifi Toilet has a nice Toto throne and the bathtub has good running hot water. There is also a filtered pipe for drinking water. Overall very relaxing stay and recommended

title: Heroic Effort !!!
desc: I always have a great experience at the Fullerton thanks to the well-trained customer-focused staff, but the true test is how people react when things go wrong. On this trip they did. Unfortunately, I booked with a third-party (mistake) and needed to make some last minute changes to my reservation. The booking company refused to help me. However, Shazwan, the manager at the Fullerton, stepped in and saved the day. In spite of the hotel being almost full he did some excellent negotiating with the booking company on my family’s behalf and was able to get us a last minute room at no additional costs. The room was fabulous, the service was great and of course the location is excellent. It’s just hard to go wrong with the Fullerton. Many thanks to Shazwan and the rest of the

title: Great hotel on the river for families
desc: Very good stay at a hotel with bags of charm and character. The history and preservation is really impressive and it is a very well run and finished hotel. Great for families and business as well. Rooms a decent size for city hotel and good value for the location and class of hotel. We travelled as a family and asked for adjoining rooms and were split across the floor in the end, so be really clear in advance else you won’t be together. Only other thing they need to do more with is their whiskey bar…could be SO much more with a bit of thought to the decor…but is just a basic bar. Otherwise a great place in Singapore.

title: Our Nation 58th Birthday
desc: Dear Sir/Mdm, What a memorable days for us during the stayed from 8-11 August to celebrate our Nation 58th birthday on 9 August. Warmth welcome by Boon, Kari and Maria. The management and team always provided superb friendly and warmth service. Jade dinner on 8 August was marvellous, Chef Alex, Kyo, Fred really made our evening so enjoyable. On 9 August morning, at the hotel courtyard there were a mini Singapore old school food, drinks, games organised by the hotel was a amazing memories. Evening dinner at Lighthouse and Rooftop Bar was amazing, everyone were watching the National Parade, parachuting, fighters jet. The last show was to admiring the stunning fireworks at Marina Bay. Never forget to thanks Straits Club Manager (Liyana) and team the 4 days caring and excellent

title: Excellent hotel and service!
desc: This hotel went beyond our expectations. The most pleasant and hospitable staff! They all go above and beyond expectations. Warren at the check-in desk was fantastic with local recommendations. Room was clean and updated. Highly recommend this hotel.

title: Overall terrible.. waited at least 20 minutes for frozen and dry breakfast per day and Service was overall just awful
desc: Overall a nice looking hotel.. from the outside! We went in and didn’t even get greeted, everything fine because “no one” will ruin our vacation, but they still somehow managed to.. The people there where rude and hated their jobs clearly.. First night I had a cramp in my shoulders because the pillows were hard like bricks and the room was freezing cold. The view was a window facing a wall and that in both rooms we had. Breakfast was a real shock.. we had to wait in a line for about 20minutes just to get frozen ham and dry pancakes.. The people their didn’t care if anything was empty, for example we never got milk (to the point where the neighbors table borrowed us the milk they bought at the store the day before :@ It’s just really disappointing and nothing there went anywhere

title: An iconic hotel in Singapore
desc: We returned to Singapore as a stopover from Europe after 10+ years, to stay at The Fullerton, and were not disappointed. Our Straits Club room was brilliant, but the service from the staff was exceptional, and special mention must be made of Liyana, Zep and Christine who went above and beyond to make our stay memorable. We will be back as soon as we can.

title: All Went Well and more
desc: All went well or even exceeded expectations for the services extended during the stay. Credits must be given the following staff who consistently provided the great service and made the guest feeling welcome and appreciative. Indeed, it's a comfortable and and satisfied staycation experience. Hotel Manager : Alan Reservations : Sharon Straits Club Lounge : Liyana and the Team; Zep, Ryan, Krish, Jen, Christine, Rhea, Joshua and Anaise Front Desk : Boon and The Team; NIcholas, Warrem, Wahida, Connie and Lucy. Town Restaurant : Hope, Raj and Roza Concierge : Fafi Cake Shop : Jia Hui ad Camelia Special mention of the cheesecake in the hotel whether burnt or original; is one of best cheesecake in Singapore. It is rich, smooth, flavorful and fresh which one would enjoy and tend to

title: The most memorable birthday experience at fullerton !
desc: Special shout out to LUCY from reception team ! From check in till check out everything was outstanding. The stay was for my partner’s Birthday celebration, and I had many items that has to be placed in the room. Lucy had make sure everything was placed according to my request, and offered suggestions to make things better. Thank you Fullerton for the exception service, but LUCY made a difference to our stay. She is an asset of this beautiful Hotel !! !!!!😆

title: Great hotel will come again.
desc: Excellent hotel with lots of interesting history, very nice room which was clean and well appointed, extremely helpful and friendly staff always eager to support us. And the location is perfect to enjoy the heart of Singapore and all that it has to offer. We will definitely come again. Thanks Fullerton.

title: Excellent service!
desc: The hotel is well located within walking distance of many major sights and transportation, and the service is excellent, especially in the Straits Club. I particularly want to thank Christine for her kind, helpful care and attention every day.

title: Possibly the best hotel I have ever stayed at...
desc: This has to be one of the best hotels I have ever stayed at in my life. Big compliment ...but I do not exaggerate. Let me explain-- yes the hotel is old-style gorgeous with a red carpet, incredibly beautiful lobby, doorman, luxurious rooms, a breakfast that was out of this world and literally had dishes from every part of the world... but what made it incredible was the unbelievable attention to detail ... from the moment you enter, until the moment you leave. The afternoon tea was a delight... Christine would make sure we would access to everything, provided information on local areas to get souvenirs/food, brought us umbrellas as she noticed it was raining as we headed outside, provided hand held battery operated fans on a hot and humid day, we said we liked the snacks

title: Kudos to Albert, Angelina, Lin, Natasha for a wonderful birthday celebration for us watching NDP at the same time.
desc: What a extraordinary outing! This is one of the unforgettable event of my life with a great celebration for a birthday treat! 素晴らしいですね👍 ありがとう　アルベトさん、アンゲリナ　さん、りんさん、ナタシャ　さん。 ほんとうに　いつも　ありがとう　ごうざいます

title: Excellent
desc: Beautiful hotel, Very courteous staffs, directly opposite the Marina Bay Sand Got the best view for watching the music fountains at night, and also the Singapore national day celebrations. Ensure to try their cakes, so good, especially the Singapore national cake which is a panda chiffon cake.

title: High Tea at The Courtyard
desc: High tea was fantastic. Amazing service and very sweet staff, especially Lin. She was patient and went above and beyond to make our experience a fantastic one. The food was decent and the coffees and teas were delectable.

title: Wonderful stay at the Fullerton
desc: This was our 3rd time staying at the Fullerton and it is a truly wonderful hotel, extremely friendly and helpful staff, nothing is too much trouble, the rooms are a very good size and have great facilities. The swimming pool is excellent and is ran by Sall who is a very attentive, kind and all round awesome person, he has looked after us every time we have visited and is always super helpful. The hotel is in a perfect location for getting around all of the main bars, restaurants and tourist locations. 10 mins walk from raffles, 5 mins from boat Quay and Clarke Quay, 15 mins from the shops at MBS and a 5 minute underground walk to one fullerton bars and restaurants. If you are with a family and fancy a day at the beach or to do some activities, Sentosa is only a 15min

title: Many thanks to Malo and June!
desc: The hotel is welcoming and everyone is quite kind. I arrived on July 5th, rushing to join an online meeting. Malo from the reception helped me a lot and helped me with the luggage all the way to room 516. The WiFi signal is strong ani works perfectly for zoom. On the second day, I met June, a very kind lady cleaning room for me. She is professional, kind, warm and introduces so many delicious food and tourist destinations to me. June, Malo and the other staff make my stay at Fullerton very pleasant. The building itself is a relic and is quite close to Merlion. On Saturday night, I was soooo lucky to see the shining fireworks!

title: Fantastic trip!!
desc: We stayed at the Fullerton Singapore for 1 week and had a wonderful stay. From the moment we arrived we were escorted to our room and the experience at the Club Lounge was second to none. The hotel and staff have exceeded our expectations. Thanks Christine and team

title: Lady Revathy Ganesan
desc: I stayed for 2 nights at The Fullerton Hotel Singapore. My room Premier Courtyard Room (42 m²) was elegantly designed and comfortable. The check in experience was smooth and lady Revathy Ganesan from front desk was super friendly, super professional and super accommodating. By the way, the distance between The Fullerton Hotel and Merlion is 250 meters only, I really loved the location, you can go walking to The Shoppes at Marina Bay Sands. The toilet experience was interesting. It is Japanese and Korean smart (automatic) toilet. There are buttons to push for cleaning, washing and drying! in addition, to heating function of toilet seat. However, the only problem was that the water stoppers in the bathroom, were broken. Please note that The Fullerton Hotel (Classic style) is

title: Excellent!
desc: The concierge staff members were friendly and helpful. For example, Matthew was helpful in arranging our luggage to be transferred to our room and obtaining a taxi with short notice. He was also friendly and made us feel welcome at the Fullerton Hotel.

title: Amazing trip and stay and the Fullerton!
desc: Amazing service and experience!! We stayed at the Fullerton Singapore for week and loved it. Club lounge was fabulous!! Christine and team were amazing and made our stay special! Thank you!! We’ll definitely stay again!

title: Returned to stay with Best Hotel in Singapore! The Fullerton Hotel
desc: Returned 2nd time of the year for the Perfect Staycation in Singapore! I would like to extend my heartfelt appreciation to The Fullerton Hotel Singapore and its dedicated Straits Club staff for delivering an exceptional staycation experience. From the moment we arrived, the warmth and attentiveness of the staff made us feel truly valued. Our toddler was given a complimentary ice cream tag (1 scoop daily), just like the last visit. Cleanliness is one of the very best amongst other hotels from, in room, concierge, dining hall, utensils etc. We enjoyed the Straits Club Breakfast, Afternoon Tea and Cocktail very much during our entire stay. It was exclusive and private with great selection of breakfast and tea to kickstart the day. PS, they also serve very delicious Nasi Lemak

title: Great experience
desc: We stayed at Straits club room for my husband's birthday. It was celebrated in style with birthday cake, card, presents and balloons by staff. Special thank you to Christine for organising the night.

title: Beautiful hotel, great location
desc: Great location and a beautiful hotel, nice comfortable room and great service on the whole. However I’m deducting a star because they accidentally maxed out mother in law’s credit card by overcharging, and didn’t sort it out until we’d left 🙈

title: Beautiful, but staff service stood above the rest.
desc: We stayed August 12-13 (Saturday night). This hotel was beautiful, clean and well-located. Most of all, every staff member we met was helpful, kind and service-minded, willing to do the little extra things that separate good service from amazing service. In particular I want to mention Lucy, who helped us check in. She spoke Korean to my (Korean) wife, took care of all our needs and questions, and as a family of 3 in a room with 2 beds, she sent an extra cot to our room without even being asked. In many years, she was the first to do this for us without a special request, and I slept better than ever. Great experience, and special thanks again to Lucy.

title: Great hotel
desc: Fantastic hotel. It isn't cheap, but this is one of those occasions when you spend a lot of money and it is worth every penny. The rooms are lovely, the staff are great, and the breakfast spread is wonderful. Special thanks to Mr Andrew Yip from the management team. We had a bad experience in the Jade restaurant on our first night and he went to great lengths to make amends. We appreciate his help and hope we can return to thank him again. One tip: We stayed in a Marina Bay view room. At first we were on the higher floor and it was rather disappointing as the room was small with an awkward layout. We were then moved to the same style room the floor below which was so much bigger. I understand why the rooms are different as this is an old building and on the higher floor the

title: Awesome & amazing experience
desc: Awesome service. All of our needs were taken care of, it was a wonderful stay. Clean rooms, toilet was big, bed was comfortable, aircon was great. Everything was just perfect. Definitely recommended for everyone. Shoutout to straits club. Wonderful service given by the waiters & waitresses there. Remembered our usual drinks and even our usual seats. Chatted with us about our stay, the food, the drinks and made sure we are very well take care of. Really went above the standards I expected and love dining at the straits club

title: An Exceptional Stay at The Fullerton Hotel SG: Comfort, Luxury, and Memorable Moments.
desc: *The hotel room is fantastic, boasting cleanliness and comfort. It's well-equipped with all the necessary amenities, and they even use the luxurious Balmain brand, which adds to the overall experience. ***My 3-night stay at The Fullerton Hotel was exceptional, with a warm welcome and excellent hospitality from **'Siti' and **'Boon Chun Khai'. The hotel's proximity to MRT Raffles Place and the convenient underground walkway to see the Merlion made it even better. The breakfast options, featuring both Asian and European choices, were more than satisfying. I want to thanks to **'Johan' for his assistance in arranging taxi services and handling all the necessary details.

title: PERFECTION
desc: My husband and I are frequent travelers to Singapore and having stayed at the Marina Bay Sands has always been a nice experience, however looking for a more exclusive, yet comfortable, place to stay we tried Fullerton Hotel, it didn’t disappoint, not at all, we were absolutely impressed with the compromise of the management staff as well as their concierges. We have traveled over 70 countries, and the attention we received from Mr. Boon (guest relations Assistant Director) and Clarisa (front desk) was beyond amazing, something that no matter where we haven’t had find until there. Boon is certainly a world class executive leader and his compromise is reflected in all of his team, he knew our travel was for business reasons and he made us feel he was one of the team, he took our

title: Had a great time in Singapore at the Fullerton
desc: Singapore Fullerton was excellent. We had a fantastic time staying there for a week in August. Christine and the rest of the team at the Straits Club were lovely. The rooms were excellent as were the facilities.

title: Fullerton Top notch experience
desc: Fantastic experience at Fullerton Had a great Solemnization event Jade Restaurant private room. Fabulous food along with the superb customer service. You just got to try their Peking Duck which was one of the highlight of the food we had. The hotel staff were also friendly and offer their assistance when ever we call upon them.

title: A True Celebration in this Landmark Property
desc: A fabulous stay, greatly enhanced by the service and the lovely team. Reviews I had read guided my decision to go for a Straits Club room. We were delighted to find that our 7th floor room enjoyed sweeping City and River views and a comfy king-sized bed. Club access gave you a harmless start to the day and I’m only sorry that we only enjoyed Evening cocktails thanks to a busy schedule with our fellow travellers. 4 nights went way too quickly and if we’re back in Singapore we will definitely return to this landmark property where authentic and friendly service is paramount

title: Such a beautiful culture in this hotel!
desc: The most beautiful hotel entirely because of the staff and the service. The staff in every department are friendly, smiling, happy, respectful, helpful and such a pleasure to be around. They ALL made us feel like they really cared about our comfort and our needs. Could not fault any of them.

title: Singapore: where east, meets best, and that’s un understatement !
desc: Arriving at the hotel, following a 15 day motorcycle adventure in India with ‘Ride the Himalayas’, the immediate impression is outstanding. Attentive lobby and check-in personnel, immaculately presented and welcoming ensured an extremely smooth transition to my Courtyard room - facility in which included very a generous living/bedroom with king sized bed; an impressive bathroom, and an at first somewhat daunting toiletwhich - as soon as I reached the door - automatically the lid ! Room sorted, I headed to the open plan ‘Home’ restaurant featuring an expansive selection of specialty dishes, and a pleasing wine selection. My rib-eye steak was cooked to perfection, and the accompaniments of black garlic jus, truffle infused mashed potatoes, and an assignation of vine tomatoes with

title: Wonderul experience @ Fullerton Singapore
desc: The hotel is well located and the service was excellent. In particular the service at the straits club was exceptional. I would in particular name Ms Liyana Said and Christine who made my stay memorable

title: Great Choice Over MBS
desc: The Fullerton hotel was an outstanding choice for our family stay in Singapore. It is truly first class stay - super high quality rooms and wonderful service. We wondered whether to pick this over MBS. So happy we did! The pool is wonderful and not crowded - it was so relaxing each day. The family LOVED the breakfast at Town restaurant, with so much high quality choice. This was a great value for first class stay in a very convenient location.

title: A wonderful Fullerton experience that never disappoints!
desc: Was there to celebrate my birthday and my boyfriend’s new job; and also how he had always wanted to stay at the Fullerton. When the assistant manager, Mr Boon knew about the reasons, he showed us what great hospitality was about! We had a truly wonderful stay at the hotel. An awesome experience as always. Thank you, Mr Boon and team!

title: The Fullerton much more than a hotel ,look into its history.
desc: My wife and me have been to Singapore many times and have taken to staying ,at what we class ,as our home away from home,that is The Fullerton Hotel. When you enter this magnificent hotel it seems to wrap its welcoming arms around you. We cannot find enough words to express how we were greeted once again meeting up with the people we call friends who care for our every need within the hotel. The Fullerton is the centre of Singapore all road numbers start from there and is also where Singapores national heritage was made so the Fullerton has history to walk through. Thanks go to Boon and Warren management of rooms and their incredible and caring team , Also we would like to thank Ela,Lalanie ,Raj and the staff of the Town restaurant together with Chandra in Concierge and all the

title: Great Service! Check In Process for Improvement
desc: I had a not so good check in experience. I had to wait more than an hour for my room even though I already made the online registration. Considering I was with my two little boys (2 and 11 months) and coming from a long flight, this was really frustrating. But their housekeeping team made up for it. Given I’m with my 2 little boys, I can be considered a demanding guest as I’m requesting everything! From baby cot, to liquid detergent to bottle steriliser and all. But they made sure these are all provided! Special thanks also to Daniel from the inroom dining team for being an extra help. Aside from providing our requests, he would extend an extra help to make our hotel stay with 2 little kids bearable, easier and comfortable. Thanks again!

title: The Fullerton Hotel- Excellence in service!
desc: Excellent service from registration till check out. 08-09aug.23. The straits club lounge service was excellent. The food was good. Poolside experience was good after my I got to order food and drinks. Room service provided more water when asked. I asked for extra 3 and was given 4. Too good. The best part was the deco with balloons surprise done by Lucy and team! My girls were totally surprised. I will recommend The Fullerton Hotel to locals and foreigners too. We were on a Europe tour dec2022 and the hotel service in other countries can never be compared to The Fullerton Hotel! An experience that should not be missed in Singapore! Book now!!!

title: Wonderful experience
desc: The best hotel we’ve ever been! The room is fantastic, the bed is nice. We stayed in the room all day because the bed is very comfy! The toilet is really good. The staff is also helpful, kind and polite. We went during the national Singapore day and there were food stalls. We also had a free cake.

title: Great attitude even for non customers
desc: I have never stayed at the hotel, but they have several pedestrian walk throughs open to public. They are very welcoming and courteous to non customers too. Their staff is always smiling, and at times even opening doors for you when they really don't have to. It also always smells nice, everytime I walk in. I love the hotel!

title: Perfect hospitality
desc: Mr. Mathew Rajaxarma was a really fantastic concierge. He helped me a lot while my stay at the hotel. I lost my phone at the airport and he helped me to find the phone. He called the lost and found center in the airport for me. The phone was found at the airport. He also called the restaurant to reschedule the reservation time for me. Anytime I met him, he asked me if everything was going well. It was so kind and efficient . Thanks to Mathew, my stay at the hotel was very comfortable. I would like to thank all the Fullerton Hotel staff members.

title: Amazing Experience
desc: My husband and I had an amazing experience staying at the Fullerton Singapore for our 11th wedding anniversary. The checkin experience with Connie, making us feel so special with early check in, early lounge access to the touches in our room, was 5 stars. We had straits club access which was a 5 star experience. Christine was extremely attentive and made our stay very special. All the other staff were as fabulous and made us feel like nothing was to much. The lovely man working at the pool was a gorgeous character and made us smile each day. We can’t wait to come back and experience the Fullerton again. Thank you

title: Great service at the Club Lounge Fullerton Hotel
desc: Had an anniversary stay at Fullerton Hotel. Special accolade to the club service team and especially Ryan for remembering us as retuning guests, making our celebratory stay comfortable with excellent service at the club lounge!

title: Extraordinary Service by Malo!
desc: Thé location was superb! The historic building is outstanding! We arrived very early morning at 6.30 am. After a 16 hours flight from SFO .. a little bit exhausted … They already knew our early arrival because we booked a limo way in advance with the service of limo of the Hotel. Our rooms (2) were not available…. During our 6 hours wait in the courtyard nothing was offered to us or any communication was done. To our disappointment .. we learned one day later that we could have enjoyed the Spa .. showers ..etc.. For people staying 10 days ..they could accommodate a bit better..!! The Quay room was very small but charming. The housekeeping MARY on the 3 rd floor delivered an outstanding work everyday and we appreciate their professionalism and their friendliness. A Gem

title: Disappointing staycay
desc: We were supposed to enjoy a weekend getaway after our wedding. However, the experience with Fullerton Hotel was rather disappointing. Our bathroom was not exactly clean - one of the bath towels had brown stain on it, there was a piece of used toilet paper hidden in the toilet roll and there were hairs in the bathtub and shower area. The bathtub shower head was not working at all. Location is good. The breakfast was amazing and another plus point is they have smart tv in the room. The rest of the room was generally pretty ok but could be better in terms of the cleanliness.

title: Excellent Location with Quality Service
desc: Just spent 11 days at The Fullerton and stayed in 4 different rooms, from the Palladium Suite, River Quay View, Marina Bay View & the River Pool view rooms. Each of the rooms shared their own experience in a unique way. Yes we had a favourite room....... This classic building has a lot to share for the explorer with connecting underground airconditioned subway for convenience getting to The Fullerton by The Bay a Hotel. The service from the staff was excellent, always wanting to go that extra mile to help. Get in nice and early for buffet breakfast with a choice of inside or outside dining. The pool is great though of coarse certain parts of the day are the busiest. Taxis are accessible via the front entrance, just ask the Valet. Eating out requires a vast choice.....

title: Sall...the man at the pool!
desc: Sall was so kind and thoughtful every time I went to the pool. He was able to anticipate what I wanted, at the exact moment that I thought about it myself. A wonderful, energetic man and an asset to The Fullerton Hotel.

title: An excellent hotel and her employees.
desc: It is rare to stay in this unique hotel. It is indeed a cultural and architectural heritage. Not only that, the staff here are excellent, especially Christine at the restaurant on the 4th floor. She is kind and considerate, making you feel at home. The other staff are no less generous. , thank them.

title: Another great weekend at Fullerton Hotel
desc: Spent a weekend at The Fullerton hotel again. Everything went well. The room was clean and the staff were quite friendly. We spent the whole afternoon by the pool, it was very relaxing and the view was awesome. What’s better than having tea time after swimming. We tried the cake from the cake shop at the lobby and chilled in the courtyard for the rest of the afternoon. It was a wonderful experience. Highly recommend this hotel of its environment, historical architecture and service!

title: good restaurant
desc: We have a great time at town restaurant good experience. In particular, Cherry was professional attitude and quick. Also her bright smile and perfect service made We'll come back again in town. Thanks to cherry at the town who helped us make a great moment with great hospitality.

title: Appreciation for consideration
desc: It was first time to visit Singapore. And it was best choice staying the Fullerton hotel. Even though something bad happened, i was moved by your treatment and consideration after that. Thanks to you, my trip to singapore became the best expereince. 비록 안좋은 일이 있었지만, 그 후에 당신의 대처와 배려에 감동했습니다. 당신 덕분에 싱가포르 여행이 최고의 경험이 되었습니다

title: Beautiful luxury in the historic part of Singapore
desc: Gorgeous room and great staff the club lounge drinks and high tea were fabulous and Christine was a lovely staff member. Only fault was that , with a five thirty am checkout , they forgot to deliver our preordered pastry basket for in room breakfast.

title: Singapore stop over
desc: My husband and I stayed for 3 nights on our way to London. From pick up service at the airport to room service delivery within minutes, nothing was too much trouble and everyone was very polite, especially at the Straights lounge. The spa was fantastic, recommend Sara for a hot stone massage. Will visit again.

title: Business in Singapore
desc: Great location for walking, dining, and work. Beautiful hotel facilities & rooms with great service. Dining along the river in Boat Quay and Clark Quay within close walking distance. Bar and restaurant in the hotel provide elegant and casual options.

title: Wonderful Service by Fullerton Hotel
desc: Have a very warm and lovely services provided by Fullerton Hotel throughout my 2 nights trip. Everything is just excellent and feeling impressed. Thank you Cherry from Town restaurant given us a surprise birthday cake with photo as sweet memory. We will definitely come back again on our next anniversary staycation!

title: A warm welcome from the hotel
desc: I had a business trip and got a flu when I arrived the hotel. Christine, a staff I met at Fullerton Straits Club on Tuesday (19 Sep) sent me lemon honey and ginger tea when I was coughing so hard. The professional services and care touched my heart. And it really gave me confidence to choose Fullerton next time when I travel to Singapore.

title: First time in Singapore and The Fullerton Hotel didn’t disappoint me
desc: First time in Singapore and The Fullerton Hotel didn’t disappoint me. I loved it! GREAT LOCATION, surrounded with shops, restaurants and cafes. Not far from Marina Bay Sands Definitely, coming back again. Thanks to Boon Chun for making our our stay extra special

title: Singapore’s Finest!
desc: The Fullerton is unequivocally Singapore’s very best hotel. The rooms are spectacular, the pool is unrivalled, the location is ideal for seeing the main attractions and most importantly, the staff are truly exceptional! We had a most enjoyable stay and look forward to returning soon.

title: Elegance, history and great service combined
desc: I usually don’t leave reviews, but this hotel deserves one as it is one of a kind. The standards are very high, the staff are very professional, respectful and friendly. Food was amazing. And the venue is so iconic, it is a pleasure to be inside. I also used the infinity pool and the view is great.

title: Good service
desc: Nice design and architecture, service in the club room is satisfying. I like the room freshener used in the rooms. Things need to be upgrade: 1. Cleanliness in the room, especially carpet, need to be cleaned thoroughly. 2. Service in the restaurant

title: Amazing experience at the Fullerton Hotel
desc: Beautiful place! Located just a few minutes away from the nearest MRT station and Marina Bay Sands, the Fullerton is a great place to stay. I had a great view too. I would like to thank Anais, Rhea and Liyana for the wonderful service at the lounge. I had a great time.

title: Great foods and service
desc: It was great! The environment, foods and service! It was a wonderful experience with lovely music and a nice surprise for my wife’s birthday. The waitress has provide excellent service with birthday song , cake and photo in envelope. Will definitely come back again !

title: Special
desc: We celebrated my birthday with afternoon tea. It was wonderful, food was delicious, service was on point and the hotel was stunning. Thank you making my day so special. Would definitely recommend this if you are looking to celebrate a special occasion.

title: Fantastic, friendly, professional service
desc: We had a fantastic stay and would highly recommend The Fullerton. Every staff member we interacted with was friendly, professional and efficient which made our stay really pleasant. In particular, Liyana and her Straits Club team -- Anais, Zep, Ryan, and Rhea -- looked after us exceptionally well. They're all super friendly, attentive, and all around nice bunch of people. 10/10 experience!

title: Best experience and
desc: Kind staff and always there to help and greeting to guests. Lovely swimming pool, and you can also use Fullerton bay facilities. We will defiantly come back in a month time to celebrate our kids birthday!

title: Really great place to get over jet lag and get your bearings
desc: I was solo pre work and stayed to get over jet lag for two nights. I was on the club level and they took terrific care of me at breakfast and tea and remembered my water and tea orders- greeted me with such warmth. I felt safe and cared for. The concierge was also helpful, as was the tour guide, who was so knowledgeable on both complimentary tours of the harbor and the hotel. It was a fabulous start to the business trip! I strongly suggest staying here for a treat of a weekend.

title: Kind employee
desc: I also had meal in this hotel after checkin. For my dinner manu, she kindly explained the recommended dishes. I selected beef and rice. The dish was very good with high quality of ingredient, i think. And other employees explains whatever i asked about room and spots.

title: My second time around
desc: It's been my second time to come this place and still I'm so amuse.to this place the view is so relaxing and wonderful at the night time.the employee are so kind and helpful.hope I can come back again next time 🥰

title: Very feeling welcomed about the food.
desc: Stella helping us a lot during our high tea on 21 September 2023. We feel welcome during our visit. Recommended high tea choice of food and cakes. Very pleasant and helpful when requesting the request,

title: Satisfied Guest Keeps Coming Back
desc: As if 2nd home to meet family members, the staff were responsive, courteous and welcoming. The feelings were warm, lots to catch up and last but not least, comfortable and satisfied. This was made possible by the following staff besides the comprehensive facilities and easily accessible to public transport, F & B outlets and places of interests. Also specially mention of mooncakes made ad offered by the hotel for the Mid Autumn or Mooncake Festival which a little thought means so much. Fullerton Bay / La Brasserie - Nicholas and Wayne Reservations - Sharon Straits Club Lounge - Liyana and The Team; Siti, Ryan, Jen, Rhea and Anaise Front Desk : Mariia, Revathy, Warren, Shazwan, Kate, Wahida and Connie. Cake Shop : Jia Hui Town Restaurant : Nicholas, Lailani, Raj, Rosza

title: “Like having a winning lottery ticket”
desc: Choosing a hotel, which will be your home for the duration of your holiday, can be difficult. With the Fullerton it was as the title of this review says. Every member of their multi cultural staff are geared to ensure your stay is as comfortable as possible and meet the exacting standards of service the Fullerton offers. In addition their willingness, enthusiasm and professional courtesy is evident in every area of this hotel. The dining room in particular is run with the utmost courtesy and personal service. The rooms are well decorated, modern and comfortable. The hotel offers a “club facility ” called The Garden Court Room and allows guests to take afternoon tea along with cocktails in the early evening in a relaxed and intimate room. Positioned right on the harbour front

title: Wedding luncheon 2023
desc: Joyce the coordinator for our wedding is wonderful and hardworking. She is prompt in her replies and always goes the extra mile to accommodate us. The banquet manager Nana is very proactive in dealing with guest needs. Overall, the staff at The Fullerton Hotel are well trained and courteous. They often go the extra mile to make your stay special.

title: Excellent hotel and centrally located
desc: Hotel is a excellent piece of architecture, centrally located, next to parks and easy walk to city locations, Room was excellent, most amenities were covered in room, Breakfast was included in room rate and it was excellent, Other dining area was a little disappointing , staff were not attentive to replacing drinks and food , Had to have hand up to seek attention, Reception staff and front of house were excellent, it was the week leading up to Grand Prix so they we’re busy but still A1

title: Fine dining at the Fullerton Hotel - a great choice for authentic food!
desc: We decided to dine in the hotel instead of heading out into the city. It was a great choice. The food was amazing - such a mix of flavours. Staff were wonderful and did all they could to make sure we enjoyed our meals. Be ready for lots of chilli - some like it hot!

title: Exemplary style and service.
desc: First class hotel with amazing amenities, great food and such generous and polite staff. Johnny was the man that served us at the Town restaurant and bar in the outdoor area overlooking the Singapore River and he went out of his way to ensure we were satisfied.

title: Service is impeccable and very traditional hotel
desc: We stayed in a collyer suite and the room was lovely and a very good size. Very well kept togther! We enjoyed access to the club room (by booking a suite), the main disappointment was there was no view in the club room or from the balcony, the food selection was good for the limited space they had available. The complimentary cocktails / champagne also went down well. We couldn't fault the service, throughout the hotel it was fantastic and they even offered us to take a shower after our long flight before the room was avaliable. We also took advantage of the complimentary tour of the hotel, which was also fascinating, sadly our boat trip was cancelled last minute due to the weather. If your looking for a historical experience, I'd highly recommend booking here.

title: One of t Best Hotel in Singapore.
desc: Stayed over the weekend during F1.From day 1 Chief Concierge Mr Kari and his prossfessional Team made me feel at home.Easy access to 1 Fullerton and nearby pubs and eateries.Would recommend others to feel the history of the Old Post office and its cleaniness.

title: Very warm and friendly service
desc: Service was awesome by Lin. She served our high tea and hot drinks and also introduced the tea and coffee to us. Also gave us an extra portion of the savory bites. She even helped us pack the small cakes as we could not finish plus help us take photos too. Very good service!

title: Friends of the Fullerton for Grand Prix Weekend
desc: What an amazing bespoke experience provided by Mr Gino and Mr Boon (and their highly attentive and creative staff) for a unique Grand Prix experience. Thanks guys, we’ll be back! The location, food, drinks, atmosphere was excellent. Thanks for introducing us to more Friends of the Fullerton!

title: A great start to our honeymoon
desc: We had a very short stay at the Fullerton. What a fantastic and modern hotel which is steeped in history. And in a fantastic location. Our room was beautiful and they made a big fuss of us as we were on our honeymoon. The staff were great and arranged a take away breakfast for us on the morning we left. Unsurprisingly, it is expensive but worth the treat.

title: Courtyard Fullerton
desc: Came to celebrate my mum’s birthday at the Courtyard for weekend afternoon tea. It was great atmosphere, beautiful harpist with such a soothing music. Special mention to Natt was very accommodating and such a pleasant looking lady. Always cheerful and ready to help anytime needed. My mum enjoyed the afternoon tea birthday with a complimentary slice of cake and the tier of savoury and sweet tier was scrumptious. Will definitely come back here again for another special occasion.

title: A wonderful stay at an exceptional hotel
desc: We visited as a Mum and daughter 7 night holiday and loved our experience staying at The Fullerton. The location is perfect - a hawker market, lots of restaurants, galleries, etc in easy walking distance as is Merlion Park. Our room was lovely, very comfortable beds, etc.. We had a courtyard view and would ideally seek a view next time. In saying that we knew exactly what we’d booked for and didn’t spend much time in the room, instead making the most of the amenities the hotel has to offer including the beautiful swimming pool. It’s also worth noting the reciprocal benefits in being able to use The Fullerton Bay hotel swimming pool which is also gorgeous and has a stunning view. Our package included the buffet breakfast which was fantastic. It really had everything you could

title: Fullerton Hotel - Exceptional service
desc: Fortunate to receive exceptional service at the Fullerton Hotel over the Grand Prix weekend. Mr Gino, General Manager and Mr Boon, Assistant Director, provided an incredible VIP experience at Fullerton One with free flowing champagne and delicious food of the highest standard. Truly memorable occasion with unparalleled service attending to every detail and need - faultless! Sincere thanks to Gino, Boon and their incredible team. Look forward to being with you next year!

title: Amazing service at straits club!
desc: I had a holiday at Fullerton hotel and I spent most of my time at straits club. For my 2 days of holiday, service from Rhea, Anais and a manager Liyana was amazing and made me to come back to the lounge. They recognised me and took care of me a lot. Thanks for team and I hope I can see you guys next time!

title: Really great food and service!
desc: Amazing service and atmosphere, staff is so friendly and accommodating, going the extra mile for my girlfriend's first time visiting Singapore. Great experience from start to finish. Will highly recommend

title: So satisfactory
desc: We fell in love with the Fullerton hotel when we found it. We changed our reservation to stay in this hotel instead of JW Marriot and luckily received a dining voucher which I can use wherever restaurant in the Fullerton or Fullertonbay. The view at the quay room was perfect and the swimming pool at both hotels were wonderful. On top of that, a guy at the reception was super kind!!!!! He offered us an opportunity to take a shower at the spa after we checked out. Since we had to take a plane at 10pm, this experience was so satisfactory. I wish I could come back again:)

title: Simply Excellent.
desc: A spectacular hotel that offers a sanctuary from the rush and heat of Singapore. Gracious colonial charm in a building steeped in history with exceptional staff who are so friendly a ready smile is never far from their lips. From arrival to departure service is excellent, the rooms spacious and extremely comfortable and the public areas light and airy.

title: Wedding weekend of our dreams!
desc: My husband and I held our wedding dinner banquet at The Fullerton Hotel in September. Joyce, Wani and team took excellent care of us and our loved ones, and made sure we didn’t have to worry about a thing for the entire function. Our Bridal Suite was amazing — we were there during F1 weekend and we were blessed with an amazing view of the track and the post-race fireworks. Truly a memorable weekend and it wouldn’t have been possible without the amazing Fullerton team.

title: Hotel Fullerton Singapore is not just a place to stay, it's an experience.
desc: Hotel Fullerton Singapore is a true gem among the city's luxury accommodations. The suites at Hotel Fullerton Singapore are nothing short of spectacular. The spaciousness and attention to detail are evident, with plush furnishings and a soothing color palette that creates an oasis of relaxation. The panoramic views of the city skyline from the suite windows are simply breathtaking, especially at night. What truly sets Hotel Fullerton Singapore apart is its exceptional staff. Their commitment to guest satisfaction is unparalleled. From the moment you check in, you're made to feel like a VIP, and the attentive, friendly, and knowledgeable staff members go above and beyond to ensure your every need is met. Our experience at the Straits Club of Fullerton was exceptional, and we owe

title: Birthday treats
desc: I and my friends stayed here to celebrate my friend's birthday. They arranged Robby and Lizzy (the hotel bear mascots) to welcome us in our room. To top it off, they were gracious to give us complimentary dinner complete with a birthday cake and a song.

title: Having a greatful memory in traveling
desc: I had a reservation for my father’s birthday in traveling period. The food was so nice that we could get an exprience about Asian food. Moreover, Cherry and Lua kindly gave information about enjoying our lunch, so we could use the service easily even though we are foreiners. My father also liked the special birthday cake and photo service that they gave to us. Thank you for the good service, Cherry and Lua!

title: Superb service from the director of reservations
desc: The director of reservations assisted us with our bookings and provided us an absolutely seamless and great service. We had the most amazing wedding weekend spent, with complimentary celebratory welcome gifts prepared in the room for us, as well as early check in + late checkouts. We were super comfortable during our stay, and all of our needs were catered to. After checking out, we were also graced with an entry to the Straits club, experiencing the full fullerton experience. We are extremely blessed and are appreciative of the services!:) we will definitely be back.

title: Experience of a lifetime - best location in Singapore to get married
desc: Grand and historic building, impeccable service for the bridal suite (including proactive making up of the room). Kudos to Joyce for her consistent help throughout the wedding planning process, and Wani (event manager for wedding banquet held at Straits Room). We held our wedding at Straits Room and tea ceremony at Level 5 Roof Garden. The ambience did not disappoint, and Wani was prompt and professional in assisting the bride and coordinating the event sequence with our wedding coordinator. Service at the Level 4 Straits Club by Krish was attentive as well, and he clearly took pride in engaging clients. Will return.
